# notes:                
40001001	Egai evi na-tos-gati-an sua hǝn nǝbathuyah siYesu Kristo , topat len nǝpasusan siTevit , topat len nǝpasusan siApraham :
40001002	AApraham evi atǝman aIsak . AIsak evi atǝman aJakop , tovi atǝman aJutah mai aṽan aJutah gail .
40001003	AJutah evi atǝman aPeres mai aSerah , analaru tovi aTamar . APeres evi atǝman aHesron . AHesron evi atǝman aRam .
40001004	ARam evi atǝman aAmminatap . AAmminatap evi atǝman aNahson , tovi atǝman aSalmon .
40001005	ASalmon evi atǝman aPoas , anan tovi Rahap . APoas evi atǝman aOpet , anan tovi aRut . AOpet evi atǝman aJesse .
40001006	Ale aJesse evi atǝman aTevit tovi kiŋ . Ale aTevit evi atǝman aSolomon , anan tovi asoan aUriah a m̃o .
40001007	Ale aSolomon evi atǝman aRehopoam . Ale aRehopoam evi atǝman aApijah . Ale aApijah evi atǝman aAsa .
40001008	Ale aAsa evi atǝman aJehosafat . Ale aJehosafat evi atǝman aJoram . Ale aJoram evi atǝman aUsiah .
40001009	Ale aUsiah evi atǝman aJotam . Ale aJotam evi atǝman aAhas . Ale aAhas evi atǝman aHesekiah .
40001010	Ale aHesekiah evi atǝman aManasseh . AManasseh evi atǝman aAmon . Ale aAmon evi atǝman aJosiah .
40001011	Ale aJosiah evi atǝman aJekoniah mai aṽan gail len nǝboŋ lotomap̃ip̃iriah vi Papilon .
40001012	Husur nǝmap̃ip̃iriahan vi Papilon : aJekoniah evi atǝman aSealtiel , ale aSealtiel evi atǝman aSeruppapel .
40001013	Ale aSeruppapel evi atǝman aApiut , tovi atǝman aEliakim . Ale aEliakim evi atǝman aAsor .
40001014	AAsor evi atǝman aSatok . Ale aSatok evi atǝman aAkim . Ale aAkim evi atǝman aEliut .
40001015	Ale aEliut evi atǝman aEleasar . Ale aEleasar evi atǝman aMattan . Ale aMattan evi atǝman aJakop .
40001016	Ale aJakop evi atǝman aJosef tovi asoan aMeri , topas aYesu , lotokisi hǝn aKristo , aGot totabtabuh lan .
40001017	Imagenan , tub̃at len aApraham vǝbar aTevit ikad naur lotovi 14 p̃isi , ale tub̃at len aTevit vǝbar nǝmap̃ip̃iriahan vi Papilon ikad naur lotovi 14 am , ale tub̃at len nǝmap̃ip̃iriahan vi Papilon vǝbar aKristo , aGot totabtabuh lan , ikad naur lotovi 14 tǝtas .
40001018	Nǝpasian siYesu Kristo evisi magegai . Anan aYesu , aMeri ikel gati ke tilah mai aJosef , be a tahw hǝn arb̃ib̃on , isab̃i ke etian , aNunun aGot togole .
40001019	Husur ke ahaṽut san , aJosef tovi nǝvanuan tonor , nǝboŋ tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn aMeri totian , emǝtahun b̃igol nahurun aMeri b̃isa , ŋa isab̃ sǝhoti len nǝnauan san ke teriŋ aMeri , be emǝtahun avan ideh b̃elǝboii .
40001020	Nǝboŋ tonau natgalenan sal , aŋel sua siNasub̃ evisi hǝni len nab̃ǝb̃er . Ike , “ Josef anatun ulum̃an siTevit , sagemǝtahw hǝn gǝb̃esǝhar aMeri hǝn b̃evi asoam̃ , bathut natǝtai totian hǝni , aNunun aGot gatolavi maii .
40001021	Alitenan dereh tipas anatun ulum̃an balai , ale geriŋ nahǝsan aYesu lan , husur gai tilav kuv nǝvanuan san gail dan nǝsaan salit balai . ”
40001022	Natgalen p̃isi evisi hǝn b̃igol nǝsa aGot tokele len nabuŋon ahai kelkel ur b̃isarpoh . Ike :
40001023	“ Mǝteris ! Navensus dereh tetian , ale tipas anatun ulum̃an , ale lekis nahǝsan aImmanuel , ” namilen tovi “ AGot itah mai gadito . ”
40001024	Nǝboŋ aJosef tolele , igol nǝsa aŋel siNasub̃ tokel maii . Esǝhar aMeri tovi asoan
40001025	be sagol naitian maii van vǝbar nǝboŋ topas anatun ulum̃an sua . AJosef eriŋ nǝhes Yesu lan .
40002001	Husur nǝboŋ lotopas aYesu len naut a Petlehem a Jutea , len nǝboŋ aHerot tovi kiŋ , alalum̃an namitisau hǝn nam̃eso luyar dan Nais vi Jerusalem
40002002	luke , “ Atenan lotopasi hǝn b̃evi kiŋ seJu gail , atenan gai be ? Husur namtoris nam̃eso san nǝboŋ tovisi ale namtogǝm hǝn namtb̃ilotu hǝni . ”
40002003	Nǝboŋ aHerot aKiŋ tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan , nǝlon etuhatuh , mai alat a Jerusalem p̃isi lumagenan .
40002004	Ekis ab̃iltihai tutumav p̃isi mai ahai p̃usan p̃isi hǝn nalo lub̃onb̃on ale eus galit ke , “ AKristo , aGot b̃itabtabuh lan , dereh lipasi a be ? ”
40002005	Ale lukel maii ke , “ Len naut a Petlehem a Jutea , husur ahai kelkel ur itosi maiegai ke :
40002006	“ ‘ Be gaiug , a Petlehem , len naut a Jutah , gǝsavi namǝkot len alat lotokad na-il-a-m̃o-an len naut a Jutah , husur len gaiug , nǝvanuan na-il-a-m̃o-an sua dereh tegǝm balai hǝn b̃eil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan sagw gail , alat a Israel , hum nǝvanuan nasipsip toil a m̃o hǝn galito . ’ ”
40002007	Beti aHerot igol nab̃onb̃onan tosusuah mai alalum̃an namitisau hǝn nam̃eso . Eus galit hǝn nǝboŋ mai namityal nam̃eso tovisi ale lukele .
40002008	Esǝvat galit vi Petlehem ale ike , “ Mitivan , doŋ vahvahur natǝtai . Nǝboŋ mǝtb̃isab̃i , kel uri mai ginau hǝn ginau am nǝb̃ivan valotu hǝni . ”
40002009	Nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nakiŋ tonoŋ , loriŋ naut enan , ale nam̃eso lotorisi nǝboŋ tovisi , eil a m̃o hǝn galito van vail mǝhat hǝn naut natǝtai totoh lan .
40002010	Nǝboŋ lotoris nam̃eso lukemkem masuṽ .
40002011	Nǝboŋ lotob̃is lohoim loris alarminan , aMeri mai natǝtai , ale lotǝŋedur , lulotu hǝni , ale losǝŋav hǝn naviolan salit hǝn lǝb̃eviol mai natǝtai hǝn nagol , nafraŋkinsens mai namǝr .
40002012	Nǝboŋ lotoke livan , aGot ikel nalǝlǝgauan mai galit len nab̃ǝb̃er ke saletǝlmam van hǝn aHerot , ŋa lotǝlmam vi lan nǝkantri salit len nap̃isal tile .
40002013	Nǝboŋ alalum̃an namitisau hǝn nam̃eso lotovan tia , aŋel sua siNasub̃ evisi hǝn aJosef len nab̃ǝb̃er ike , “ Gile mǝhat , sǝhar alarminan , gam vi Ijip , ale toh ei vir nǝb̃ikel mai gaiug hǝn gǝb̃etǝlmam , husur aHerot dereh tekǝta doŋ amas hǝn b̃igol b̃imat . ”
40002014	Ŋa aJosef ile mǝhat , esǝhar alarminan len mariug ale eriŋ naut enan vi Ijip .
40002015	Itoh ei van vǝbar nǝmatan siHerot . Imagenan , nǝsa Nasub̃ aGot tokele isarpoh , len nabuŋon ahai kelkel ur ike , “ Nokis anatugw ulum̃an dan naut a Ijip . ”
40002016	Nǝboŋ aHerot tonau lǝboii ke alalum̃an namitisau hǝn nam̃eso lotogǝrasi , nǝlon ipaŋpaŋ masuṽ vǝsa . Esǝvat alalum̃an hǝn lǝb̃igol alathutai p̃isi , nǝdam̃ halit toru vi pan , lǝb̃imat len naut a Petlehem mai naut gail lotodar visi . Natenan inor hǝn namityal tosab̃i len alalum̃an namitisau hǝn nam̃eso .
40002017	Beti nǝsa aJeremiah , ahai kelkel ur tokele , isarpoh , ke :
40002018	“ Ikad nadoldol sua len naut a Ramah , totaŋ , tois habat len nalolosaan , ARakel itaŋis anatun gail , emǝtahun avan ideh b̃etǝŋov nǝlon vi pan husur lob̃uer tia . ”
40002019	Nǝboŋ aHerot tomat tia , aŋel sua siNasub̃ evisi hǝn aJosef len nab̃ǝb̃er len naut a Ijip
40002020	toke , “ Gile mǝhat , sǝhar alarminan , gevi lan naut a Israel , husur alat lotodoŋ natǝtai hǝn lǝb̃igol b̃imat , lumat tia . ”
40002021	Ŋa ile mǝhat , sǝhar alarminan ale evi lan naut a Israel .
40002022	Avil nǝboŋ tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke aArkelaus tovi kiŋ , tolav namilen aHerot tovi atǝman , len naut a Jutea , emǝtahw hǝn b̃ivan ei . Nǝboŋ aGot tokel nalǝlǝgauan maii len nab̃ǝb̃er , eriŋ naut enan , evi Kalili .
40002023	Ibar navile sua , a Nasaret , ale itoh ei . Beti nǝsa ahai kelkel ur gail lotokele isarpoh ke , “ Lekisi hǝn auleNasaret balai . ”
40003001	Len nǝboŋ galenan , aJon Baptais egǝm vi lan naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw a Jutea . Etub̃at kel ur napisulan siGot .
40003002	Ike , “ Mitipair dan nǝsaan samito husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav egǝm pǝpadaŋ . ”
40003003	Husur gai boh , ahai kelkel ur aIsaiah tosor husuri ke , “ Nadoldol sua satokai len naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw , ‘ Mǝteutaut hǝn nap̃isal m̃os Nasub̃ , gol nap̃isal san gail linor . ’ ”
40003004	AJon m̃au esun nahurabat lotovaii hǝn nasivurhǝt nǝkamel , mai etutuṽ hǝn nǝhau tutuṽ hǝn nahurhub̃uluk .
40003005	Beti alat a Jerusalem mai a Jutea mai naut todar vis Nawisel Jortan , luvan van hǝni .
40003006	Ale ibaptais hǝn galito len Nawisel Jortan nǝboŋ lotokel vǝhot nǝsaan salit gail .
40003007	Nǝboŋ toris naFarisi mai naSattiusi gail lotosob̃ur lotogǝm hǝn lǝb̃ibaptais , ikel mai galit ke , “ Anatun nǝm̃at gail !
40003008	Len nǝmauran samito mitiṽan hǝn naṽite tinor hǝn nǝpairan samito dan nǝsaan .
40003009	Samtinau ke mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃ikel mai gamit gabag ke , ‘ Asike datupanis , aApraham evi atǝmadato ta sutuai . ’ Husur nukel mai gamit ke , aGot elǝboi b̃ilav nǝvat galegai ŋai , ale gol ke legǝm vi pasusan siApraham !
40003010	AGot esum̃an naulum̃an toutaut tia hǝn b̃itai nǝkadhuhai gail hǝn nakuvkuv ; nǝhai p̃isi lǝsǝṽan hǝn naṽit tovoi , gai dereh titaii , bar hǝn gail vi lan nǝhab .
40003011	Ginau nubaptais hǝn gamit hǝn nǝwai sil nǝpairan dan nǝsaan samito . Avil avan sua satogǝmai tohusur ginau , idaŋ am sǝhor ginau , ginau novi naut kǝmas ŋai , nǝsanor kasi hǝn nǝb̃isah rub̃at nǝhau hǝn naributbut san .
40003012	Gai esum̃an naulum̃an topat nǝhai rivrivhai hǝn b̃epǝpehun namisurhuwit dan nasugut nawit tomasmas . Dereh tib̃on hǝn namisurhuwit len natuhim han , be tepǝŋas nasugut nawit tosa len nǝhab todǝdas nǝmatan . ”
40003013	Beti aYesu egǝm len naut a Kalili vi lan Nawisel Jortan hǝn aJon b̃ibaptais hǝni .
40003014	Avil aJon isor tasi , ike , “ Satimaienan , nǝsanor hum gaiug . Ivoi am ke gaiug m̃au gibaptais hǝn ginau , gol ke gogǝm hǝn ginau mabe ? ”
40003015	Ris aYesu tosor vari ke , “ Gidam̃ hǝn nǝb̃ibaptais gagai , husur inor hǝn darb̃igol natit p̃isi tonor , aGot tolǝŋoni . ” Beti aJon idam̃ hǝn b̃ibaptais hǝni .
40003016	Nǝboŋ aJon tobaptais hǝni tonoŋ , vǝha-sua ŋai aYesu evi mǝhat dan nǝwai . Nǝmav esǝŋav m̃osi ale eris aNunun aGot togǝm vi pan hum nǝtav ,
40003017	Ale nadoldol len nǝmav ike , “ Anatugw ulum̃an bogai notolǝmas buni . Nohǝhaṽur masuṽ hǝni . ”
40004001	Beti aNunun aGot esǝhar aYesu vi lan naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw hǝn natǝmat b̃italtal ke tigol nǝsaan .
40004002	Len nǝmariboŋ tovi 40 mai nalenmariug tovi 40 aYesu sǝhan , gol ke nǝmal ihati .
40004003	Beti natǝmat egǝm hǝni , ike , “ Gǝb̃evi aNatun aGot , kel mai nǝvat galegai ke legǝm vi bǝta . ”
40004004	Ris tosor vari ke , “ Natosian siGot ike , ‘ Nǝvanuan edǝdas b̃imaur len nabǝta ŋai , be imaur len nasoruan p̃isi aGot tokele . ’ ”
40004005	Beti natǝmat esǝhari vi lan nab̃iltivile siGot , a Jerusalem , ale eriŋi eil gilgile a mǝhat buni len naim siGot .
40004006	Ale ikel maii ke , “ Gǝb̃evi aNatun aGot , gigol gaiug gabag giteh vi pan . Husur natosian siGot ike , “ ‘ AGot dereh tikele hǝn aŋel san gail husur gaiug ale lipat gaiug vi mǝhat len navǝlalito hǝn asike nariem̃ b̃esǝhot nǝvat . ’ ”
40004007	AYesu isor vari ke , “ Natosian siGot ikele am ke , ‘ Sagitaltal kitev nǝdaŋan siNasub̃ aGot sam̃ ke timabe . ’ ”
40004008	Ale natǝmat esǝhar tǝtas hǝni van hǝn naṽehuh tosahsah habat , ale eṽusani hǝn nǝkantri p̃isi len navile a pan len nǝyalyalan salito .
40004009	Ale ikel maii ke , “ Dereh nilav natgaleg p̃is mai gaiug , gǝb̃etǝŋedur , lotu hǝn ginau . ”
40004010	Beti aYesu ikel maii ke , “ Setan gevi tut ! Husur natosian siGot ike , ‘ Gilotu hǝn Nasub̃ aGot sam̃ m̃au , ale gigol nalotuan van hǝn gai sǝb̃on . ’ ”
40004011	Beti natǝmat eriŋi , ale aŋel gail logǝm vi tarhǝt san .
40004012	Nǝboŋ tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke lototah gat aJon , riŋi len naim bǝbaŋis , aYesu eriŋ naut enan , evi Kalili .
40004013	Elul dan naut a Nasaret a Kalili van vatoh len naut a Kapernaum tarhǝb̃iltiwai . Kapernaum ipat len naut sinahǝmar gǝlaru , a Sepulun mai a Naftali .
40004014	Imagenan , nǝsa ahai kelkel ur , aIsaiah , tokele , isarpoh . Ike ,
40004015	“ Naut sinahǝmar Sepulun mai naut sinahǝmar Naftali , metp̃isal vi lan nab̃iltiwai , tarhǝwisel Jortan , len naut a Kalili simetb̃os gail ,
40004016	nǝvanuan gail lotobǝtah len nǝmargobut loris nab̃iltim̃ial ; len galit lotobǝtah len naut hǝn nǝm̃ol hǝn nǝmatan , nam̃ial siGot evisi , em̃ias galito . ”
40004017	Len nǝboŋ enan van , aYesu etub̃at kel uri ke , “ Pair dan nǝsaan samito husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav egǝm pǝpadaŋ ! ”
40004018	Len nǝboŋ sua aYesu iyar husur nǝtarhǝt nab̃iltiwai lotokisi hǝn Nab̃iltiwai Kalili . Eris alarmiṽan , aSimon , nahǝsan togon aPita , mai aAdru aṽan . Arubar hǝn nalevlev vi lan nab̃iltiwai , husur arovi vanuan nǝsahiehan .
40004019	Ale ikel mai gǝlar ke , “ Gǝm husur ginau , ale gamǝr mǝrtosah hǝn naieh , dereh nigol mirisah hǝn nǝvanuan gail . ”
40004020	Vǝha-sua ŋai aroriŋ nalevlev sǝlaru , arohusuri .
40004021	Nǝboŋ toyar van am , eris alarmiṽan am , nahǝsalar aJemes anatun aSepeti , mai aJon , aṽan . Arutoh len nab̃ot mai atǝmalaru aSepeti , lobutan nalevlev salit gail lunor . Ale aYesu ekis gǝlar gǝmai .
40004022	Vǝha-sua ŋai aroriŋ nab̃ot mai atǝmalaru , arohusuri .
40004023	Ale aYesu iyar turtur len naut a Kalili p̃isi . Ep̃usan len naim nab̃onb̃onan seJu gail , ikel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan aGot , ale igol nǝvanuan gail lotokad namǝsahan tiltile gail o nibelit tomatmat , lumaur .
40004024	Na-kel-uri-an husuri ibar naut a Siria kavkav . Ale nǝvanuan gail losǝhar alat lotomǝsah gǝm hǝni : alat lotokad namǝsahan tiltile , alat nibelit topǝŋas , alat lotokad natǝmat gail , alat lotokad nahumatmat mai alat nahudhubelit tomat , ale igol galit lumaur .
40004025	Nab̃iltiluṽoh gail lohusuri , alat a Kalili , a Tekap̃olis , a Jerusalem , a Jutea mai alat tarhǝt Nawisel Jortan .
40005001	Nǝboŋ aYesu toris naluṽoh gail , etǝṽehuh , ebǝtah . Nǝboŋ tobǝtah , ahai susur san gail logǝm hǝni ,
40005002	ale etub̃at ṽusan galit ke :
40005003	“ Alat lotolǝboi len nǝlolito ke lotopar Got , be lotolǝŋoni , navoian siGot igol gagai lukab hǝni , husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav evi salito .
40005004	Alat lototaŋ , navoian siGot igol gagai lukab hǝni , husur dereh lelǝŋon tivoi am len nǝlolito .
40005005	Alat nǝlolit tomǝdau , navoian siGot igol gagai lukab hǝni , husur aGot teviol hǝn navile a pan mai galito .
40005006	Alat lotomalkǝkat , lotomaduh hǝn nanoran , navoian siGot igol gagai lukab hǝni , husur dereh lihanukub .
40005007	Alat nǝlolit totaŋis avan ideh , lotovi tarhǝt san , navoian siGot igol gagai lukab hǝni , husur dereh aGot tilolosa hǝn galit balai .
40005008	Alat nǝlolit tomasil , lotolǝŋon aGot sǝb̃on ŋai , navoian siGot igol gagai lukab hǝni , husur dereh leris aGot balai .
40005009	Alat lotogol nanoŋan hǝn nǝb̃alan gail , lotogol natǝm̃at , navoian siGot igol gagai lukab hǝni , husur dereh aGot tekis galit hǝn anatun gail .
40005010	Alat , nǝvanuan gail lotomǝdas bun galito sil lotogol nǝsa tonor , navoian siGot igol gagai lukab hǝni , husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav evi salito .
40005011	“ Nǝboŋ nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃isor viles gamit vǝsa , lǝb̃emǝdas bun gamit gol ke mǝtb̃elǝŋon b̃isa vǝsa , lǝb̃elibliboŋ ke mǝttogol nǝsaan tiltile sil mǝttovi esagw , navoian siGot igol mǝtukab hǝni .
40005012	Len naṽide tomaienan lomǝdas tabtab hǝn ahai kelkel ur gail ta m̃o . Mitikemkem , mǝtehǝhaṽur husur aGot ikad nakonp̃urp̃uran totibau m̃os gamit len nǝmav . ”
40005013	AYesu isor kǝta ke , “ Gamit mǝtohum nǝtas
40005014	“ Gamit mǝtohum nam̃ial m̃os navile a pan . Nab̃iltivile topat mǝhat len naṽehuh edǝdas b̃esusuah . Nǝvanuan p̃isi lolǝboi lǝb̃erisi .
40005015	Ale avan ideh asike epigau nam̃ial , riŋi pipit nǝhad . Aoa ! Eriŋi a mǝhat hǝn b̃em̃ias galit p̃isi lototoh len naim .
40005016	Tomaienan , nam̃ial samit tem̃ial m̃os nǝvanuan p̃isi hǝn lǝb̃eris navoian mǝttogolgole , ale sal suh nǝyalyalan seTǝmamit len nǝmav .
40005017	“ Samtinau ke notogǝm hǝn nǝb̃ikaskas nalo o nǝsa ahai kelkel ur lotokele . Ao , nǝsagǝm hǝn nǝb̃ikaskasi , nogǝm hǝn nǝb̃igol b̃isarpoh .
40005018	Nokitin mai gamit ke , van vǝbar nǝboŋ nǝmav mai navile a pan arb̃imasig , sǝkad nǝmap̃irhǝt natosian b̃imasig dan nalo siGot , vir natit p̃isi b̃isarpoh .
40005019	Imaienan , avan ideh b̃ilab̃ur b̃esua tokǝkereh len nalo , ale toṽusan nǝvanuan gail hǝn lǝb̃igol tǝtoṽ hǝni , dereh tevi ut kǝmas balai len galit lototoh pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav . Avil avan ideh togol husur nalo , toṽusan nǝvanuan hǝn lǝb̃igol gail , dereh tetibau balai len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav .
40005020	Be nukel mai gamit ke , mǝtb̃ike mǝtb̃eb̃is len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav , mitimasnor sǝhor ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo mai naFarisi gail .
40005021	“ Mǝtosǝsǝloŋ tia hǝn nǝsa aGot tokele mai naur gail ta sutuai ke , ‘ Sagigol avan ideh timat ’
40005022	Be nukel mai gamit ke , avan ideh nǝlon topǝŋas aṽan , tipanis . Ale avan ideh tosor viles aṽan , dereh tevi lan nakotan hǝn nǝSanhitrin . Ale avan ideh toke , ‘ Gumelmel , govi hoṽon ! ’ inor hǝn b̃evi lan nǝhab naut nǝmatan .
40005023	Imaienan , gǝb̃ilav naviolan sam̃ van hǝn nǝmel tutumavan ale gǝb̃inau tǝlmam hǝni ke , gotogol natesua togol aṽam̃ tokad nǝsasaan mai gaiug ,
40005024	b̃imaienan , riŋ naviolan sam̃ ei . Givan hǝn aṽam̃ hǝn mǝrb̃inor , mǝrb̃ikad navoivoian tǝtas . Beti gǝm , lav naviolan sam̃ mai aGot len natutumavan van hǝni .
40005025	“ Avan ideh b̃ikot hǝn gaiug , len nǝyaran sam̃ mai atenan tosor tas gaiug , len nap̃isal vi lan nakotan ŋai , gisaṽsaṽut hǝn mǝrb̃ikad natǝm̃at tǝtas . Asike gǝb̃igole , dereh teliv gargar gaiug vi lan nǝmatsistret , ale nǝmatsistret teriŋ gaiug len navǝlan nalipah , ale nalipah tibar hǝn gaiug len naim bǝbaŋis .
40005026	Nukel nakitinan mai gaiug ke , asike govivile dani vǝbar gǝb̃eṽur p̃is nǝvat hǝn nǝpain nǝmatsistret toriŋi .
40005027	“ Mǝtosǝsǝloŋ tia hǝn nǝsa aGot tokele ke , ‘ Sagigol naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan , ’
40005028	ris notokel mai gamit ke , avan ideh tokǝta husur napǝhaṽut hǝn b̃elǝŋoni , len nǝlon , gai igol naitian maii tia .
40005029	Namǝtam̃ nǝmatu b̃igol gaiug gǝb̃igol nǝsaan , kis kuvi , bar hǝni . Nahudhubem̃ b̃eb̃uer enan esǝhor lǝb̃ibar hǝn nibem̃ kavkav len nǝhab nǝmatan .
40005030	Navǝlam̃ nǝmatu b̃igol gaiug gǝb̃igol nǝsaan , ta kotovi , bar hǝni . Nahudhubem̃ b̃eb̃uer enan esǝhor nibem̃ kavkav b̃evi lan nǝhab nǝmatan .
40005031	“ Nalo ike , ‘ Avan ideh totiṽos hǝn asoan , atenan timaslav nalob̃ulat hǝn natiṽosan mai alitenan . ’
40005032	Avil nukel mai gamit ke , avan ideh totiṽos hǝn asoan , naut kǝmas alitenan sagol naitian tosa , atenan igol ke asoan igol naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan .
40005033	AYesu isor am ke , “ Mǝtosǝsǝloŋ tia hǝn nǝsa aGot tokele mai naur gail ta sutuai ke , ‘ Sagikel na-kel-gati-an gǝgǝras , be gigol na-kel-gati-an sam̃ van hǝn Nasub̃ aGot , tisarpoh . ’
40005034	Avil nukel mai gamit ke , samtikel nǝhes ideh hǝn b̃ita gat na-kel-gati-an samito . Samtikel nǝhes nǝmav husur aGot ebǝtah len nǝmav topat pipihabǝlan .
40005035	Samtikel nǝhes navile a pan husur ehum nakes aGot toriŋriŋ narien lan nǝboŋ tobǝtah len nǝmav . Samtikel nǝhes naut a Jerusalem husur evi nab̃iltivile seKiŋ toyalyal , tovi aGot .
40005036	Sagikel nǝhes nǝkadum̃ hǝn b̃ita gat na-kel-gati-an sam̃ husur godǝdas gǝb̃igol nasivur ideh b̃epǝhw o b̃imermer .
40005037	Len nǝsa gotokele , ‘ Evoi ’ sam̃ timasvi ‘ Evoi ’ ŋai , ‘ Aoa ’ sam̃ timasvi ‘ Aoa ’ ŋai . Nasoran ideh am egǝm len atenan tosa vǝsa masuṽ tovi tǝmat .
40005038	“ Mǝtosǝsǝloŋ tia hǝn nǝsa aGot tokele ke , ‘ Gǝb̃igol namǝtan o nariṽon avan ideh b̃imasig , namǝtam̃ o nariṽom̃ timasmasig . ’
40005039	Avil nukel mai gamit ke , samtesisil hǝn avan ideh togol tosa hǝn gamito , be avan ideh b̃iṽos nǝtarhom̃ nǝmatu , pair hǝn nǝtarhǝte van hǝni .
40005040	Ale avan ideh b̃ikot hǝn gaiug , b̃ilav nǝhai susun sam̃ hǝn b̃isar gel nǝkabut sam̃ , gidam̃ hǝn nahurabat naut susus am maii .
40005041	Nasoltia ta Rom
40005042	Avan ideh b̃eus gaiug hǝn natideh , lavi maii , ale gai b̃ike b̃ikabut sam̃ , sagipair dani .
40005043	“ Mǝtosǝsǝloŋ tia hǝn nǝsa aGot tokele ke , ‘ Lǝmas bun alat lototoh pǝpadaŋ hǝn gaiug , ’
40005044	Avil nukel mai gamit ke , mǝtelǝmas bun aenemi samit gail , ale alat lotomǝdas bun gamit hǝn mǝtb̃elǝŋon b̃isa vǝsa , mitisor tuṽ m̃os galito .
40005045	Mitimaienan hǝn mǝtb̃esum̃an aTǝmamit len nǝmav bathut igol nǝyal tovisi , tovi mǝhat , tosun alat lotosa mai lotovoi , ale esǝvat naus van hǝn alat lotonor mai lǝsanor .
40005046	Husur mǝtb̃elǝmas bun ŋai alat lotolǝmas bun gamito , aGot asike ilav nakonp̃urp̃uran ideh mai gamit sile . Nǝvanuan nǝtaks am lugol tomagenan .
40005047	Mǝtb̃ike , ‘ Ivoi , ’ mai alat lotosum̃an gamit ŋai , gamit mǝtotile mabe ? Alat lǝsavi Ju lotovi metb̃os gail , galit am lugol tomagenan .
40005048	Imaienan , gamit m̃au mitimasnor kavkav hum aTǝmamit len nǝmav tonor kavkav . ”
40006001	AYesu isor am ke , “ Mǝtelǝlǝgau ! Samtigol nagolean tonor samito len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail hǝn lǝb̃isal suh gamito . Mǝtb̃imagenan , nakonp̃urp̃uran aTǝmamit len nǝmav tokade m̃os gamito , eb̃uer .
40006002	“ Imaienan , nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eviol mai alat lotom̃idol , samtiwal hǝni hum nǝvanuan gǝgǝras gail . Galit lugole len naim nab̃onb̃onan mai len nametp̃isal gail hǝn nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃isal suh galito . Nokitin ke asike lukad nakonp̃urp̃uran ideh am hǝn nǝsa lotogole , be nǝ-sal-suhi-an enan ŋai .
40006003	Avil nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eviol mai alat lotom̃idol , gole hǝn avan ideh asike b̃elǝboii .
40006004	B̃imaienan , nǝsa mǝtb̃igole tesusuah . Ale aTǝmamit len nǝmav , toris nǝsa tosusuah , dereh gai tilav nakonp̃urp̃uran mai gamito .
40006005	“ Nǝboŋ mǝtb̃isor tuṽ , samtesum̃an nǝvanuan gǝgǝras gail ! Lolǝmas lǝb̃eil sor tuṽ len naim nab̃onb̃onan gail mai tarhǝp̃isal topasil gail hǝn nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃isal suh galito . Nokitin ke asike lukad nakonp̃urp̃uran ideh am hǝn nǝsa lotogole , be nǝ-sal-suhi-an enan ŋai .
40006006	Avil nǝboŋ mǝtb̃isor tuṽ , b̃is len naut tosusuah lohoim samito , ale nǝboŋ mǝtb̃ekǝkol hǝn nabopita b̃inoŋ , sor tuṽ vi tǝban aTǝmamit tosusuah . Ale aTǝmamit toris nǝsa gotogole tosusuah , dereh gai tilav nakonp̃urp̃uran mai gamito .
40006007	“ Nǝboŋ mǝtb̃isor tuṽ , samtiwal tavtav hum nametb̃os gail lotonau ke nagot salit gail losǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasorsoran tobǝlav ŋai .
40006008	Imagenan , samtesum̃an galito , husur aTǝmamit elǝboi nǝsa mǝttom̃idol hǝni , naut kǝmas mǝtsausi hǝni sal .
40006009	Imagenan , mitisor tuṽ maiegai : “ ‘ ATǝmanamito len nǝmav , nahǝsam̃ tiyalyal tabtab .
40006010	Gegǝmai hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi lǝb̃itoh pipihabǝlam̃ , Nǝsa gotolǝŋoni m̃au tevisi , len navile a pan hum ŋai tovisi len nǝmav .
40006011	Viol hǝn nǝhanian husur nǝboŋ ṽisusua mai ginamito ,
40006012	Rub̃at nǝsaan sinamit gail , sum̃an ŋai namttorub̃at nǝsaan silat lotogole hǝn ginamito .
40006013	Sagidam̃ hǝn natideh hǝn b̃italtal ke namtigol nǝsaan , be lav kuv ginamito dan navǝlan atenan tosa vǝsa masuṽ , tovi tǝmat . ’
40006014	“ Husur mǝtb̃erub̃at nǝsaan gail silat lotogol tosa hǝn gamito , aTǝmamit len nǝmav dereh terub̃at nǝsaan samit gail .
40006015	Wake asike mǝtb̃erub̃at nǝsaan gail silat lotogol tosa hǝn gamito , aTǝmamit asike erub̃at nǝsaan samito gail . ”
40006016	AYesu isor am , ike , “ Nǝboŋ mǝtsǝhan m̃os mǝtb̃inau aGot , samtesum̃an alat lotokel natesua be gol natsua tile am , lotosar batut , gol nǝholit tomǝraŋraŋ . Lomǝdas nǝholito , hǝn nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃eris lǝboii ke lǝsǝhan . Nokitin ke asike lukad nakonp̃urp̃uran ideh am hǝn nǝsa lotogole , be na-ris-lǝboii-an sinǝvanuan ŋai .
40006017	Be gamito , nǝboŋ mǝtsǝhan , mǝtevǝhas nǝkadumit gail ale kǝkas nǝhomit gail
40006018	hǝn nǝvanuan gail asike lǝb̃eris lǝboii ke mǝtsǝhan , avil aTǝmamit tosusuah ŋai dereh telǝboii . Ale aTǝmamit len nǝmav , toris nǝsa tosusuah , dereh gai tilav nakonp̃urp̃uran mai gamito . ”
40006019	Beti aYesu ike , “ Samtisah tuan nakontit gail m̃os gamit gabag len navile a pan . Husur len navile a pan egai nametǝlai itaŋ , nahurabat , nǝbarm̃om
40006020	Aoa , mitigol nǝsa aGot tolǝŋoni ale dereh tetǝgau nakontit gail m̃os gamito len nǝmav , len naut enan naviolan asike itaŋ , asike nǝbarm̃om emǝdasi , asike nǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah eb̃ur naim , vi lohoim hǝn b̃evǝnohi .
40006021	Husur , naut nakontit sam̃ gail lotopat lan , dereh nǝlom̃ tu tipat tabtab lan .
40006022	“ Namǝtam̃ ehum nam̃ial tolav nam̃ial mai nibem̃ . Imaienan , namǝtam̃ b̃imaur , dereh nibem̃ kavkav tepul hǝn nam̃ial .
40006023	Avil namǝtam̃ b̃isa , dereh nibem̃ kavkav tepul hǝn nǝmargobut . Imaienan , nam̃ial gǝb̃inau ke gotokade b̃evi margobut , dereh nǝmargobut enan tevisivis masuṽ !
40006024	“ Naslev ideh edǝdas b̃evi slev simasta toru len nǝboŋ tosua , husur dereh temǝtahun bun tesua ale telǝmas bun togon , o dereh tidaŋ len tesua ale tinau ke togon tovi naut kǝmas . Gǝsalǝboi gǝb̃evi slev siGot mai slev sinǝvat len nǝboŋ top̃itoṽ ŋai .
40006025	“ Husur tomaienan , nukel mai gamit ke , samtinau tuhatuh hǝn nǝmauran samito . Samtinau masuṽ hǝn nǝsa mǝtb̃ihani , nǝsa mǝtb̃emuni , samtinau masuṽ hǝn nibemito mai nǝsa mǝtb̃esuni . Nǝmauran esǝhor nǝhanian , ale nibemito esǝhor nahurabat mǝttosuni .
40006026	Mitinau nǝman namǝsav gail . Lǝsǝmabul natideh , lǝsǝlav kukuv nǝhanian , lǝsatuani lohoim gail , be aTǝmamit len nǝmav evǝŋan galito . Avil len nǝnauan siGot gamit mǝtosǝhor masuṽ hǝn nǝman galenan .
40006027	Mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃igol nǝmauran samit tebǝlav am len nǝ-nau-masuṽ-hǝni-an samito a ? Aoa , sǝmagenan !
40006028	“ Ale husur nǝsa mǝttonau masuṽ hǝn nahurabat samito ? Mitinau napusihai mai naṽide hǝn natovan han len naliol marireu . Saum , sasod nahurabat .
40006029	Be nukel mai gamit ke , napǝhasan hǝn napusihai enan esǝhor napǝhasan siSolomon tosun nahurabat bilbil tokab .
40006030	AGot b̃igol naliol b̃epǝhas maienan , naut kǝmas totov damǝŋai ale pelan han tomasmas , topaŋ len naoven , a mǝhat hǝn natenan dereh tilav nahurabat mai gamito , gamit mǝttokad nadǝlomian tokǝkereh ŋai !
40006031	Imagenan , samtinau tuhatuh hǝn mǝtb̃ike , ‘ Datihan nǝsa ? Datukad nǝhanian a ? ’ o ‘ Datemun nǝsa ? Datukad nǝwai a ? ’ o ‘ Datesun nǝsa ? Datukad nahurabat ideh a ? ’
40006032	Husur nametb̃os gail lǝsalǝboi aGot lugol tomaienan . Ale aTǝmamit len nǝmav elǝboi tia natit p̃isi mǝttom̃idol hǝni .
40006033	Be a mǝhat hǝn natit p̃isi am , mǝtelǝŋon nǝsa aGot tolǝŋoni len natohan pipihabǝlan , mitidoŋ kitev nanoran len nǝhon . Ale dereh tilav mai gamito natit p̃isi mǝttom̃idol hǝni .
40006034	Imagenan , samtinau tuhatuh hǝn nǝsa b̃evisi len nǝboŋ pelan , riŋi vir nǝboŋ pelan . Husur nǝmariboŋ p̃isi ikad na-lǝŋon-isa-an han , ale nǝmariboŋ p̃isi ikad naut todaŋ han sagesuhud hǝn natgalen ideh hǝn nǝboŋ pelan hǝn b̃egǝm b̃ipat len nǝboŋ damǝŋai .
40007001	“ Samtisab̃ sǝhoti ke nǝvanuan tile timaspanis , hǝn asike aGot b̃eriŋ gamit mǝtb̃ipanis .
40007002	Husur aGot dereh tisab̃ sǝhoti ke mitimaspanis p̃itp̃itoṽ hǝn nǝpanismen mǝttosab̃ sǝhoti ke nǝvanuan tile timaskade . AGot dereh tenǝnoṽ hǝn nǝsaan samito len naṽide top̃itoṽ hǝn mǝtb̃enǝnoṽ hǝn nǝsaan sivan tile gail .
40007003	Imabe gotokǝta kot nakumashǝhai len namǝtan aṽam̃ be gǝsǝnau nab̃iltitarhai len namǝtam̃ ?
40007004	Imabe gotolǝboi gǝb̃ikel mai aṽam̃ ke , ‘ Eee , nidakuv nakumashǝhai dan namǝtam̃ bai , ’ be gaiug , gukad nǝtarhai len namǝtam̃ sal ?
40007005	Gaiug gotovi vanuan gǝgǝras , geliv kuv nǝtarhai dan namǝtam̃ a m̃o , beti dereh gekǝta timasil b̃inor hǝn gǝb̃idakuv nakumashǝhai dan namǝtan aṽam̃ .
40007006	Samtilav nǝsa tovi siGot mai nalipah gail . Ehum gotolav nasoruan siGot mai alat lotomǝtahuni . Samtebubulan nanesnes samit gail len nǝhon nabuai gail . Mǝtb̃imaienan , dereh lipal kisom gail , beti lipair van hǝn gamito , kat pǝpas gamito .
40007007	“ Usi van , dereh aGot teviol hǝni mai gamito ; doŋi van , dereh mitisab̃i ; deldel van , dereh nabopita tesǝŋav m̃os gamito .
40007008	Husur nǝvanuan p̃isi lotousi , dereh likade ; avan ideh todoŋi , dereh tisab̃i ; ale avan ideh todeldel , dereh nabopita tesǝŋav m̃osi .
40007009	Ikad gamit ideh tǝlav nǝvat mot mai anatun nǝboŋ tous nabǝta hǝn b̃ihani a ?
40007010	Ale b̃eus naieh sua , gamit ideh tǝlav nǝm̃at maii a ? Aoa !
40007011	Naut kǝmas mǝttosa , gamit mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃ilav naviolan tovoi gail mai anatumit gail . Be aTǝmamit len nǝmav eviol habat sǝhor gamito , dereh teviol hǝn naviolan tovoi gail mai alat lotous gai .
40007012	Imaienan , natit p̃isi mǝttolǝŋoni ke nǝvanuan gail ligole m̃os gamito , gamit m̃au mitigol timagenan m̃os galito . Egai evi nap̃usanan kavkav hǝn nalo siGot , aMoses totosi mai natosian sihai kelkel ur gail .
40007013	“ B̃is tur len nametlǝkau tomagugun , husur ikad nametlǝkau top̃osp̃os , nab̃iltip̃isal tomalum̃lum̃ , tovi lan naut nǝmasigan ale nǝvanuan isob̃ur luyar tur lan .
40007014	Avil nametlǝkau tomagugun , natuhp̃isal tohab̃ taṽtaṽor , evi lan nǝmauran , ale evis ŋai lusab̃ lǝboii .
40007015	“ Lǝlǝgau ! Kǝtkǝta gol gamit dan ahai kelkel ur gǝgǝras gail . Logǝm hǝn gamit hum nasipsip lǝsalǝboi lǝb̃emǝdas natideh , be lǝsǝmaienan . Len nǝlolito lohum nalipah katkat tosa lotomǝdas bun nǝvanuan gail .
40007016	Mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃elǝboi galit len nǝsa lotogole tohum naṽit nǝhai . Nǝhai tosa sǝṽan hǝn naṽit tovoi ; nǝhau tosa tokad nasunite sǝṽan hǝn nakrep , nǝhai tosa tokad nasunite sǝṽan hǝn nafik .
40007017	Len naṽide tomaienan , nǝhai p̃isi lotovoi luṽan hǝn naṽit tovoi avil nǝhai lotosa luṽan hǝn naṽit tosa .
40007018	Nǝhai tovoi edǝdas b̃iṽan hǝn naṽit tosa , ale nǝhai tosa edǝdas b̃iṽan hǝn naṽit tovoi .
40007019	Nǝhai ideh sǝṽan hǝn naṽit tovoi , nǝvanuan tokǝtkǝta tǝban nǝhol ita kokotovi , bar hǝni len nǝhab .
40007020	Imaienan , len nǝsa lotogole , len naṽit nǝmauran salito , dereh mǝtelǝboi ahai kelkel ur gǝgǝras gail .
40007021	“ Len alat lotokis ginau hǝn Nasub̃ , savi galit p̃isi lǝb̃eb̃is len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav , be alat ŋai lotogol nǝsa aTǝmagw totoh len nǝmav tolǝŋoni , galit dereh leb̃is lan .
40007022	Len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan , dereh tisob̃ur like , ‘ Nasub̃ , Nasub̃ , len nahǝsam̃ namtukel nasoruan sam̃ , len nahǝsam̃ namtohut natǝmat gail , len nahǝsam̃ namtugol namerikel todaŋ gail ! ’
40007023	Beti dereh nikel p̃arp̃ar hǝni mai galit ke , ‘ Ginau nǝsalǝboi gamito boŋ ideh . Mǝtevi tut dan ginau , gamit mǝttogolgol nǝsaan ! ’ ”
40007024	AYesu imaris kotov nasoran san ke , “ Imagenan , avan ideh tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan galen sagw ale togole , gai ehum naulum̃an tokad nǝkadun , toum hǝn naim san len nǝvat mot .
40007025	Ale naus eus , nawisel ilev , nǝlan eṽuv , iṽas naim enan , be sateh husur eil gǝgat len nǝvat butitan .
40007026	Avil avan ideh tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoran galen sagw be sagole , gai ehum naulum̃an tovi hoṽon , toum hǝn naim san len nabion .
40007027	Ale naus eus , nawisel ilev , nǝlan eṽuv , iṽas naim enan , ale iteh vǝmasirsir . ”
40007028	Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmagenan tonoŋ , naluṽoh gail lup̃aŋ len nap̃usanan san ,
40007029	husur sahum ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo , gai ep̃usan lǝboii hum tokad na-il-a-m̃o-an hǝn namitisau .
40008001	Nǝboŋ aYesu tomariŋ vi pan dan naṽehuh , nab̃iltiluṽoh gail lohusuri .
40008002	Beti naulum̃an tokad naleprosi egǝm pǝpadaŋ hǝni , iteh bathurien , ike , “ Nasub̃ , gǝb̃elǝŋoni , golǝboi gǝb̃igol nǝb̃imaur , nǝb̃iveveu .
40008003	Ale aYesu isar hǝn navǝlan , ibari , ike , “ Nolǝŋoni . Gimaur , giveveu ! ” Vǝha-sua ŋai , naleprosi san emǝkaskas , gai iveveu .
40008004	Beti aYesu ikel maii ke , “ Sagikele mai avan ideh , be gia ṽusan nibem̃ hǝn ahai tutumav , ale getutumav hǝn naviolan aMoses tokel todaŋ hǝni hǝn b̃eṽusan sǝhot galito ke gotomaur . ”
40008005	Nǝboŋ aYesu tobar naut a Kapernaum , nasenturion , nasoltia sua tovi auleRom egǝm hǝni , eŋiri ke ,
40008006	“ Nasub̃ , naslev sagw , a-vi-tarhǝte-an sagw ipat len nǝmel a im , nahudhuben imat ale elǝŋon isa vǝsa . ”
40008007	AYesu ikel maii ke , “ Ale nia gol timaur beti . ”
40008008	Be nasenturion ike , “ Nasub̃ , nǝsanor kasi hǝn gǝb̃egǝm vi lohoim sagw . Be gǝb̃ikele ŋai , naslev sagw dereh timaur .
40008009	Husur ginau am nutoh pipihabǝlan nakomada gail , ale nasoltia gail lutoh pipihabǝlagw . Nukel mai tosua ke , ‘ Givan ! ’ ale ivan , nukel mai sual am ke , ‘ Gǝmai ! ’ ale egǝmai , ale nukel mai naslev sagw ke , ‘ Gol nategai ! ’ ale igole . ”
40008010	Nǝboŋ aYesu tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni tonoŋ ip̃aŋ ale ikel mai alat lotohusuri ke , “ Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke , len alat a Israel nǝsǝsab̃ avan ideh tokad nadǝlomian tosum̃an nab̃iltidǝlomian sitegai .
40008011	Nukel mai gamit ke , isob̃ur lǝsavi Ju dereh legǝm len nais mai nawes , hǝn lǝb̃ihan len nab̃iltihanan mai aApraham mai aIsak mai aJakop len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav .
40008012	Avil anatun gail sinatohan pipihabǝlan aGot , aGot dereh tibar hǝn galit vi tut vi lan nǝmargobut . Len naut enan dereh litaŋ , lides batriṽoriṽ . ”
40008013	Beti aYesu ikel mai nasenturion ke , “ Givan . Bathut ke gotodǝlomi ke b̃imaienan , timaienan m̃os gaiug . ” Ale len namityal enan ŋai naslev san imaur .
40008014	Nǝboŋ aYesu tovi lohoim sePita , eris anan asoan aPita topat len nǝmel , topud hǝn namǝsahan .
40008015	AYesu ibar navǝlan ale namǝsahan ivan dani . Beti alitenan ile mǝhat , etub̃at lav nǝhanian maii .
40008016	Nǝboŋ nabǝŋ tois , nǝvanuan gail losǝhar nǝvanuan isob̃ur lotokad natǝmat gail van hǝni . Len nasoruan sua ŋai ehut nanunun tosa gail dan galito . Ale igol galit p̃isi lotomǝsah , lumaur .
40008017	Imagenan , nǝsa aGot tokele len nabuŋon ahai kelkel ur , aIsaiah , isarpoh toke : “ Igol gidat datumaur dan nǝsa tomǝdas gidato , ilav kuv namǝsahan sidat vi tut . ”
40008018	Nǝboŋ aYesu toris nab̃iltiluṽoh lotoil dar visi , ikele hǝn ahai susur san gail ke liwol kotov nab̃iltiwai vi tarhǝte .
40008019	Beti ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo egǝm hǝni ike , “ Hai p̃usan , dereh nehusur gaiug vi lan naut p̃isi gǝb̃evi lan ! ”
40008020	AYesu isor vari ke , “ Nafoks gail lukad nab̃ur patǝpat halito len tan , nǝman namǝsav gail lukad nǝhai ŋodŋod , be aNatun Nǝvanuan sǝkad naut ideh hǝn b̃ipat turuŋ lan , hǝn b̃iŋavŋav . ”
40008021	Ahai susur san sual am ikel maii ke , “ Nasub̃ , gidam̃ hǝn ginau nia tavun atǝmagw bai , beti nehusur gaiug . ”
40008022	Ris aYesu toke , “ Gehusur ginau ! Riŋ alat lotomat litavun nǝvanuan salit gail lotomat . ”
40008023	Nǝboŋ aYesu tosah len nab̃ot , ahai susur san gail lohusuri ale lotub̃at wol kotov nab̃iltiwai .
40008024	Vǝha-sua ŋai nǝlan todaŋ igol nab̃iltiwai ekudkud masuṽ gol ke nǝwai topus pǝpadaŋ hǝn b̃ipah dǝlom nab̃ot . Avil aYesu ipatmari .
40008025	Ahai susur gail luvan hǝni , lovǝŋoni , luke , “ Nasub̃ , Sanamtimasig ! Datomun ! ”
40008026	Ris aYesu toke , “ Mǝtomǝtahw mabe ? Nadǝlomian samit em̃idol , ekǝkereh masuṽ ! ” Beti ile mǝhat , esivoh len nǝlan mai nab̃iltiwai , ale naut etǝm̃at tǝtas .
40008027	Ale ahai susur gail lumaŋmaŋ , luke , “ Naulum̃an tomabe gagai ? Nǝlan mai nab̃iltiwai am lugol nǝsa tokele ! ”
40008028	Nǝboŋ aYesu tobar nǝtarhǝwai len naut a Katara , naulum̃an eru artokad natǝmat gail len gǝlaru , arogǝm len nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan gail , arobubur maii . Arugolgol nasǝnahan tosa gol ke avan ideh edǝdas b̃iyar tur len naut enan .
40008029	Arukai ke , “ ANatun aGot , gaiug savi hǝn gǝb̃emǝdas ginamito . Gogǝm gegai a tahw hǝn nǝboŋ tonor hǝni hǝn namtb̃ipanis a ? ”
40008030	A tut hǝn galito ikad navǝshǝbuai lotosob̃ur lotohan .
40008031	Ale natǝmat gail loŋiri ke , “ Gǝb̃ehut ginamito , sǝvat ginamit vi lan navǝshǝbuai . ”
40008032	Ale ikel mai galit ke , “ Vi tut ! ” Ŋa luvan dan gǝlaru , lob̃is len nabuai gail . Ale navǝshǝbuai p̃isi lugam sarmar mariŋ vi lan nab̃iltiwai . Lumat p̃isi ei .
40008033	Alat lotokǝtkǝta tǝban nabuai gail lugam vi lan nab̃iltivile . Ale lukel ur natit p̃isi mai nǝsa tovisi hǝn alaruenan artokad natǝmat gail .
40008034	Beti nǝvanuan p̃isi len nab̃iltivile luvan hǝn lǝb̃ib̃onb̃on mai aYesu . Ale nǝboŋ lotorisi , loŋiri ke teriŋ naut salit gail .
40009001	Nǝboŋ aYesu tosah len nab̃ot , iwol kotov nǝwai tǝlmam vǝbar nab̃iltivile san .
40009002	Nǝvanuan galevis lupat avan sua len nǝmel , nahudhuben tomat , gǝm hǝn aYesu . Nǝboŋ aYesu toris nadǝlomian salito , aYesu ikel mai atenan niben tomat ke , “ Natugw , sagemǝtahw ! Nǝsaan sam̃ gail lumarub̃at . ”
40009003	Ahai p̃usan galevis hǝn nalo lusor len galit gabag , luke , “ Ategai inau ke gai tovi aGot ! Isor mǝdas nahǝsan aGot ! ”
40009004	Nǝboŋ aYesu tolǝboi nǝnauan salito ike , “ Imabe mǝtunau isa maienan len nǝlomito ?
40009005	Nǝb̃ike , ‘ Norub̃at nǝsaan sam̃ gail , ’ o ‘ Gile mǝhat , giyar , ’ nǝsa emǝdmǝdau am ?
40009006	Be hǝn mǝtb̃elǝboi sǝhoti ke aNatun Nǝvanuan tokad nǝdaŋan hǝn b̃erub̃at nǝsaan gail len navile a pan , nekǝmaiegai … . ” Ale aYesu ikel mai atenan nahudhuben tomat ke , “ Gile mǝhat , pat nǝmel sam̃ , givahim ! ”
40009007	Ale ile mǝhat , ivahim .
40009008	Nǝboŋ naluṽoh lotoris natenan , lomǝtahw , lusal suh nǝyalyalan siGot toriŋ nǝdaŋan maienan len navǝlan nǝvanuan .
40009009	Len nǝyaran san dan naut enan , aYesu eris avan sua , nahǝsan aMattiu , tobǝtah len nǝpasvalǝval hǝn nǝtaks . Ale ikel maii ke , “ Gitah mai ginau , gehusur ginau . ” Ale ile mǝhat , ehusuri .
40009010	Nǝboŋ aYesu tohan lohoim siMattiu , nǝvanuan nǝtaks mai nǝvanuan nǝsaan isob̃ur logǝm b̃on hǝn lǝb̃ihan mai aYesu mai ahai susur san gail .
40009011	Nǝboŋ naFarisi gail lotoris natgalenan , lukel mai ahai susur san gail ke , “ Imabe ahai p̃usan samit tohan mai nǝvanuan nǝtaks mai nǝvanuan nǝsaan gail ? ”
40009012	Nǝboŋ aYesu tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan ike , “ Savi alat lotomaur lotovan hǝn nǝvanuan nareran , be alat lotomǝsah ŋai luvan hǝni .
40009013	Mitia nau sǝhot namilen natosian egai siGot toke , ‘ Nolǝŋon nalolosaan , nǝsalǝŋon natutumavan . ’
40009014	Beti ahai susur siJon gail logǝm hǝn aYesu , lousi ke , “ Ginamit mai naFarisi gail , len nǝboŋ tosob̃ur namtsǝhan hǝn namtb̃isor tuṽ , be naṽide sihai susur sam̃ gail sǝmagenan , luhan akis . Husur nǝsa ? ”
40009015	AYesu ikel mai galit ke , “ Amahean naulum̃an tolah gail lodǝdas lǝb̃itaŋ nǝboŋ naulum̃an totoh mai galit sal . Evoi , imaienan . Be dereh tikad nǝboŋ hǝn lǝb̃esǝhar naulum̃an tolah dan nǝvanuan san gail . Ale len nǝboŋ enan asike luhan .
40009016	“ Sǝkad avan ideh tolav nap̃isihoh sakǝkasi sal hǝn b̃imagugun , ale sode len nahurabat tomatu ,
40009017	Sǝkad avan ideh tob̃ir nǝwain veveu lotomadhagole len nahurhuwain tomatu tovi nahurhunani .
40009018	Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan sal , avan sua toil a m̃o hǝn naim nab̃onb̃onan egǝm hǝni , iteh bathurien , ike , “ Anatvavigw imadhamat , avil gǝb̃egǝm riŋ navǝlam̃ lan , dereh timaur . ”
40009019	Ale aYesu ile mǝhat , ehusuri . Ahai susur san gail am lohusuri .
40009020	Len nǝboŋ enan , apǝhaṽut sua , nǝda han tosel len nasihau tovi 12 , egǝm pǝpadaŋ , madun aYesu . Len nǝnauan san isor mai gai gabag ke , “ Nǝb̃ibar ŋa nahurabat sitegai , dereh nimaur . ” Ale ibar nagilen nahurabat .
40009021	
40009022	AYesu ipair , erisi , ike , “ Litegai , tǝgau gat nǝlom̃ ! Nadǝlomian sam̃ igol gumaur . ” Ale napǝhaṽut imaur len namityal enan ŋai .
40009023	Nǝboŋ aYesu tob̃is lohoim sitenan toil a m̃o hǝn naim nab̃onb̃onan , toris alat lotoṽuv hǝn nab̃uvimal mai naluṽoh lotosuh taṽtaṽor , lotowal ,
40009024	ike , “ Mǝtevi tut ! Atǝbarehreh sǝmat , ipat ŋai . ” Be lotub̃at sor vilesi .
40009025	Avil nǝboŋ naluṽoh lotovivile , eb̃is , etǝgau navǝlan natǝbarehreh ale ile mǝhat !
40009026	Na-kel-uri-an husur nǝsa tovisi ibar naut p̃isi todar vis naut enan .
40009027	Nǝboŋ aYesu toriŋ naut enan , nametb̃esw eru arohusuri , arukai ke , “ Anatun siTevit gilolosa hǝn ginamǝru ! ”
40009028	Nǝboŋ aYesu tob̃is lohoim , ametb̃esw gǝlaru arogǝm hǝni , ale aYesu eus gǝlar ke , “ Mǝrodǝlomi ke notolǝboi nǝb̃igol mǝrb̃imaur a ? ” Arukel maii ke , “ Evoi , Nasub̃ . ”
40009029	Beti ibar namǝtalaru ike , “ Husur nadǝlomian samǝr m̃au , mirimaur ! ”
40009030	Ale namǝtalar esǝŋav , arokǝta . Ale aYesu ikel idaŋ mai gǝlar ke , “ Samrisor husur nategai mai avan ideh ! ”
40009031	Be arovivile , aropiau hǝn na-kel-uri-an husuri van vǝbar naut p̃isi todar vis naut enan .
40009032	Nǝboŋ artovivile tonoŋ , nǝvanuan galevis losǝhar naulum̃an sua van hǝn aYesu . Atenan evi nab̃ut husur ikad natǝmat .
40009033	Nǝboŋ aYesu tohut natǝmat tonoŋ , nab̃ut etub̃at sor . Ale naluṽoh lumaŋmaŋ luke , “ Nateg tovisi , evi metǝkav hǝn gidat a Israel . ”
40009034	Be naFarisi gail lukelkele ke , “ Ehut natǝmat gail len nǝdaŋan seb̃iltitǝmat toil a m̃o hǝn natǝmat gail . ”
40009035	Beti aYesu iyar turtur len nab̃iltivile mai navile p̃isi len naut enan . Ep̃usan len naim nab̃onb̃onan salit gail , ikel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan aGot , ale igol nǝvanuan gail lotokad namǝsahan tiltile o nibelit tomatmat , lumaur .
40009036	Nǝboŋ aYesu toris naluṽoh , nǝlon itaŋis galito husur nǝlolit etuhatuh , lolǝŋon isa hum nǝmauran salit savi natideh , lohum navǝshǝsipsip lǝsǝkad avan ideh tokǝtkǝta tǝban galito .
40009037	Beti ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke , “ Nǝhanian totov tomatu isob̃ur , be nǝvanuan nauman lovis ŋai .
40009038	Imagenan , mǝteŋir aMasta hǝn nǝmatuan ke tesǝvat nǝvanuan nauman gail vi lan nǝmarireu nǝmatuan san . ”
40010001	AYesu ekis ahai susur san gail gǝmai , ale ilav nǝdaŋan hǝn na-il-a-m̃o-an mai galito hǝn lǝb̃ehut nanunun nǝmargobut gail , ale hǝn lǝb̃igol nǝvanuan gail lotokad namǝsahan ideh o nibelit tomatmat , lumaur .
40010002	Ahai pispisul lotovi 12 lukad nahǝsalit maiegai : metǝkav aSimon , lotokisi hǝn aPita , mai aṽan nahǝsan aAdru ; ikad alarmiṽan , aJemes mai aJon anatun aSepeti gǝlaru ;
40010003	ikad aFilip mai aPartolomiu ; aTomas mai aMattiu tovi nǝvanuan nǝtaks ; ikad aJemes anatun aAlfeus ale ikad aTatteus ;
40010004	ikad aSimon tovi Selot sua mai aJutas Iskariot b̃eriŋ aYesu len navǝlan aenemi san gail .
40010005	AYesu esǝvat alatenan lotovi 12 , ikel idaŋ mai galit ke , “ Samtevi lan naut ideh silat lǝsavi Ju , samteb̃is len navile ideh a Samaria .
40010006	Avil mitivan hǝn alat a Israel lotohum nasipsip gail lotomasig .
40010007	Len nǝvanan samito mitikel ur napisulan egai ke : ‘ Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav egǝm pǝpadaŋ . ’
40010008	Gol alat lotomǝsah limaur , gol alat lotomat lile mǝhat , gol alat lotokad naleprosi liveveu , hut natǝmat gail . AGot eviol kǝmas mai gamit tia , mǝteviol kǝmas .
40010009	Samtilav nǝvat hǝn nagol , nasilva o nakopa ideh len nǝpaus samito .
40010010	Samtitariv nǝhad sǝsǝŋon hǝn nǝyaran , samtilav nǝhai susun gǝgel , o naributbut gail o nǝhai tǝbatehw ideh . Husur inor hǝn lǝb̃evǝŋan nǝvanuan nauman toum salito .
40010011	“ Ale nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eb̃is len nab̃iltivile o navile ideh , doŋ avan ideh b̃ehǝhaṽur hǝn gamito , ale toh maii vǝbar mǝtb̃eriŋ naut enan .
40010012	Nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eb̃is lohoim san , us aGot hǝn b̃eriŋ natǝm̃at lan .
40010013	Alat hǝn naim enan lǝb̃ehǝhaṽur hǝn gamito , natǝm̃at tipat len nǝlolito , avil asike lǝb̃ehǝhaṽur hǝn gamito , natǝm̃at tetǝlmam van hǝn gamito .
40010014	Ale avan ideh asike b̃ehǝhaṽur hǝn gamito , asike b̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan samito , nǝboŋ mǝtb̃evivile dan naim o navile enan , dardar hǝn nariemito hǝn nǝmasiav b̃imakuv dan gǝlaru .
40010015	Nokitin mai gamit ke , len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan , dereh nǝpanismen sinavile enan tesǝhor nǝpanismen togon b̃ibar alat a Sotom mai a Kom̃orrah .
40010016	“ Nosǝvat gamit mǝttohum nasipsip gail rivuh len navǝshǝlipah katkat lǝb̃ike lǝb̃ikat sisil gamito .
40010017	Mǝtelǝlǝgau hǝn asike nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃emǝdas gamito , husur dereh leriŋ gamit len nakotan gail , dereh lebilas habat hǝn gamito len naim nab̃onb̃onan salito .
40010018	Dereh lesǝhar gamit vi lan nakotan len nǝhon nǝgavna mai nakiŋ gail m̃os ginau hǝn mǝtb̃ikel sǝhot ginau mai galito mai alat lǝsavi Ju .
40010019	Nǝboŋ lǝb̃esǝhar gamit vi lan nakotan galenan , samtinau masuṽ hǝn nǝsa mǝtb̃ikele o naṽide hǝn nasoran samito . Husur len namityal enan ŋai aTǝmamit len nǝmav dereh teriŋ nasoruan len gamito hǝn mǝtb̃ikele .
40010020	Husur savi gamit mǝtb̃isor be aNunun aGot aTǝmamito len nǝmav dereh tisor len nabuŋomito .
40010021	“ Nǝvanuan dereh teriŋ aṽan len navǝlan alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn b̃imat , atata dereh timagen hǝn anatun hǝn b̃imat , ale alahutai dereh lile mǝhat , pair dan analito mai atǝmalito hǝn nakotan b̃eriŋ alatmisoan gail lǝb̃imat .
40010022	Nǝvanuan p̃isi dereh lemǝtahun bun gamito bathut nahǝsagw mǝttokade . Avil avan ideh b̃idaŋ len ginau , b̃ikad nǝ-daŋ-b̃uri-an van vǝbar nagilen , dereh aGot tilav kuvi hǝn b̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai .
40010023	Nǝboŋ lǝb̃emǝdas tabtab hǝn gamito len navile ideh , gam dani vi lan navile ideh am . Husur nokitin mai gamit ke asike mǝtuyar tur navile p̃isi a Israel a tahw nagǝmaian siNatun Nǝvanuan .
40010024	“ Ahai susur satibau sǝhor ahai p̃usan san , naslev satibau sǝhor nǝmasta san .
40010025	Inor ŋai hǝn ahai susur b̃esum̃an ahai p̃usan san mai naslev b̃esum̃an nǝmasta san . Ginau nosum̃an amasta hǝn naim , gamit mǝtosum̃an alat lototoh lohoim sagw . Nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃ekis amasta hǝn naim hǝn aPeelsepul o aSetan , dereh lekis alat lototoh maii hǝn nǝhes tosa gail am .
40010026	“ Imagenan samtemǝtahw len galito . Natideh aGot toruŋ gole dereh tevuhe , natideh tosusuah nǝvanuan gail dereh lelǝboii .
40010027	Nǝsa notokele mai gamit len nǝmargobut , gamit m̃au mitikel uri len nam̃ial . Nǝsa notokele mai gamit sǝb̃omito , mitikel ur habat hǝni mai nǝvanuan p̃isi .
40010028	Samtemǝtahw len alat lotolǝboi lǝb̃igol nǝmatan len nibemito , be lotodǝdas lǝb̃igol nǝlomito o nanunumito lǝb̃imat . Ao , mǝtemǝtahw len aGot tolǝboi b̃igol nibemito b̃imat ale b̃igol nǝlomito mai nanunumito b̃imasig len nǝhab nǝmatan .
40010029	Mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃eṽur nǝsparo eru hǝn nǝvat tokǝkereh toru a ?
40010030	Avil gamito , aGot ep̃uruŋ p̃is nasivur hǝn navurumit len nǝkadumito .
40010031	Imagenan , samtemǝtahw . Len nǝnauan siGot mǝtosǝhor masuṽ hǝn nǝsparo tosob̃ur .
40010032	“ Imaienan , avan ideh b̃ikel uri ke tovi esagw len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail , dereh ginau m̃au nikel uri ke tovi esagw len nǝhon aTǝmagw len nǝmav .
40010033	Avil alat lotosor mǝtahun ginau len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail , dereh ginau m̃au nisor mǝtahun galito len nǝhon aTǝmagw len nǝmav . ”
40010034	AYesu isor am ke , “ Samtinau ke notogǝm hǝn nǝb̃ilav natǝm̃at gǝm vi lan navile a pan . Ao , nǝsagǝm hǝn nǝb̃ilav natǝm̃at , be hǝn nǝb̃ilav nǝb̃alb̃alan .
40010035	‘ Nogǝm hǝn nǝb̃epǝpehun naulum̃an dan atǝman , natǝbarehreh dan anan , avilah dan avuŋon pǝhaṽut .
40010036	Ale aenemi sinǝvanuan , dereh levi nǝbathudud san . ’
40010037	“ Avan ideh tolǝmas bun anan o atǝman sǝhor tolǝmas bun ginau , gai sanor hǝn b̃evi ahai susur sagw ; ale avan ideh tolǝmas bun anatun ulum̃an o anatvavin sǝhor tolǝmas bun ginau , gai sanor hǝn b̃evi ahai susur sagw .
40010038	Avan ideh asike b̃ipat nǝhai balbal san ale husur ginau , gai sanor kasi hǝn b̃evi ahai susur sagw .
40010039	Avan ideh toke b̃etǝgau gat nǝmauran san , dereh timasig dani . Ale avan ideh todam̃ hǝn nǝmauran san b̃imasig m̃os ginau , dereh tikade vi sutuai .
40010040	“ Avan ideh tohǝhaṽur hǝn gamit mǝtb̃itoh maii , ehǝhaṽur hǝn ginau ; ale avan ideh tohǝhaṽur hǝn ginau nǝb̃itoh maii ; ehǝhaṽur hǝn atenan tosǝvat ginau .
40010041	Avan ideh tohǝhaṽur hǝn ahai kelkel ur sua b̃itoh maii bathut ikel ur napisulan siGot , dereh tikad nakonp̃urp̃uran sihai kelkel ur . Ale avan ideh tohǝhaṽur hǝn nǝvanuan nanoran b̃itoh maii bathut tovi vanuan nanoran , dereh tikad nakonp̃urp̃uran sinǝvanuan nanoran .
40010042	Ale avan ideh b̃ilav nab̃iliwai hǝn nǝwai susus mai ideh len alategai lotovi ut kǝmas bathut tovi ahai susur sagw , dereh aGot m̃au tilav nakonp̃urp̃uran mai avan enan . ”
40011001	Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan mai ahai susur san tovi 12 tonoŋ , ivan dan naut enan hǝn b̃ep̃usan mai hǝn b̃ikel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi len navile gail a Kalili .
40011002	AJon Baptais itoh len naim bǝbaŋis , ale nǝboŋ tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa aKristo togolgole , aJon esǝvat ahai susur san galevis hǝn lǝb̃eus aYesu ke ,
40011003	“ Gaiug govi atenan togǝmgǝmai o namtimasvatvat vir togon ? ”
40011004	Ale aYesu isor var galit ke , “ Tǝlmam van hǝn aJon . Kel maii nǝsa mǝttosǝsǝloŋ hǝni , nǝsa mǝttoris notogole .
40011005	Ametb̃esw gail lukad nakǝtaan , alat lotogau luyar , alat lotokad naleprosi lumaur , luveveu , nǝdariŋ b̃ulb̃ulol gail losǝsǝloŋ , alat lotomat lule mǝhat dan nǝmatan ale namǝsal gail losǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-kel-uri-an tovoi notokele .
40011006	AGot tigol tivoi hǝn avan ideh sateh dan nadǝlomian len ginau sil nǝsa notogole . ”
40011007	Nǝboŋ galit lotovan , aYesu etub̃at sor husur aJon mai naluṽoh ke , “ Gamit mǝtovi lan naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw hǝn mǝtb̃eris nǝsa ? Mǝtuvan varis naulum̃an tohum nalut naṽiliol nǝlan toṽuvi , tokur hǝni a ?
40011008	Avil mǝtuvan hǝn mǝtb̃eris nǝsa ? Naulum̃an tosun nahurabat nǝvat halit totibau a ? Aoa ! Alat lotosun nahurabat tomaienan lutoh len nab̃iltiim sekiŋ gail .
40011009	B̃imaienan , mǝtuvan hǝn mǝtb̃eris nǝsa ? Ahai kelkel ur sual a ? Evoi ! Nukel mai gamit ke , savi ahai kelkel ur ŋai , iyalyal sǝhor ahai kelkel ur .
40011010	Natosian siGot isor husur ategaii ke , ‘ Geris ! Dereh nesǝvat ahai pispisul sagw a m̃o hǝn gaiug hǝn b̃eutaut hǝn nap̃isal m̃os gaiug . ’
40011011	“ Nokitin mai gamit ke , sǝkad avan ideh napǝhaṽut topasi , tosǝhor aJon Baptais . Be len alat lototoh pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav , galit ideh tovi ut kǝmas , iyalyal sǝhor aJon .
40011012	Len nǝboŋ ta m̃o siJon Baptais van vǝbar damǝŋai , nǝvanuan gail lutaltal hǝn lǝb̃eb̃is len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav , nǝvanuan nǝb̃alan luke litah gati .
40011013	Husur nalo siMoses mai ahai kelkel ur p̃isi lopǝhav utaut van vǝbar nǝboŋ aJon togǝmai .
40011014	Ale mǝtb̃ike mǝtb̃edǝlomi , gai evi Elijah , ahai kelkel ur gail lotoke b̃egǝmai .
40011015	Avan ideh tokad nǝdariŋan hǝn b̃esǝsǝloŋ , tesǝsǝloŋ m̃au ! ”
40011016	Beti aYesu eus gai gabag ke , “ Be nolǝboi nǝb̃enǝnoṽ hǝn nǝvanuan gail ta damǝŋai mai nǝsa ? Lohum alahutai lotobǝtah len nǝmaket lotokai van hǝn galit gabag ke ,
40011017	‘ Namtoṽuv nab̃uvimal m̃os gamito be mǝtsǝsav ; namtokǝkai hǝn nǝb̃e nǝmatan be mǝtsǝtaŋ . ’
40011018	Nokǝmaienan husur nǝboŋ aJon togǝmai , gai sǝhan , gai samun , be luke , ‘ Gai ikad natǝmat ! ’
40011019	Nǝboŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan togǝmai , tohan , tomun , luke , ‘ Mǝteris ! Naulum̃an tohan tǝmǝhav , tomun vatǝrog bolai . Itah mai nǝvanuan nǝtaks mai nǝvanuan nǝsaan gail . ’ Avil nǝvanuan gail lolǝboi lǝb̃ekǝta lǝboii ke , namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor , ekitin len nǝsa togole . ”
40011020	Beti aYesu etub̃at sor van hǝn nab̃iltivile gail , esivoh len gail , gai togol namerikel tosob̃ur len galito , husur galit lǝsǝpair dan nǝsaan salito .
40011021	Ike , “ Dereh tisa vǝsa hǝn gaiug , naut a Korasin , ale gaiug am , naut a Petsaita , tisa vǝsa hǝn gaiug ! Husur nǝtagol namerikel gail len naut a Tair mai a Siton hun notogole len gamǝru , gǝlaru artǝpair dan nǝsaan sǝlaru len nahurabat toharharo mai nǝmasiav .
40011022	Be nukel mai gamǝru ke , len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan , nǝpanismen hǝn naut a Tair mai a Siton asike idaŋ hum b̃ibar gamǝru .
40011023	Ale gaiug naut a Kapernaum , gunau ke aGot tipatpat gaiug mǝhat vǝbar nǝmav a ?
40011024	Be nukel mai gaiug ke , len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan , nǝpanismen hǝn naut a Sotom asike idaŋ hum b̃ibar gaiug . ”
40011025	Len nǝboŋ enan aYesu isor tuṽ , ike , “ Nusal suh gaiug aTata gotovi Masta hǝn nǝmav mai navile a pan . Nusal suh gaiug husur gosusuan natgalenan dan alat lotokad nǝkadulito mai alat lotokad namitisau hǝn navile a pan , ale gukel vǝhot gail mai alat lotovi ut kǝmas hum atuhlahutai .
40011026	Evoi , aTata , husur gohǝhaṽur hǝn tomaienan .
40011027	“ Natit p̃isi , aTǝmagw ilav gail mai ginau tia . Sǝkad avan ideh tolǝboi aNatun aGot , be aTata ŋai elǝboii . Ale sǝkad avan ideh tolǝboi aTata , be aNatun ŋai elǝboii . Ale gai ilekis hǝn nǝvanuan galevis hǝn b̃evǝhot p̃arp̃ar hǝn aTata mai galito hǝn lǝb̃elǝboii . ”
40011028	Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan tonoŋ ike , “ Gegǝm hǝn ginau , gaiug nibem̃ tomǝhav , nǝlom̃ tosa hǝn natit tomǝlas gotovusi , ale dereh neviol hǝn nǝŋavŋavan mai gaiug .
40011029	Nayok sagw , lav nǝhai enan togol dartob̃on hǝn nǝb̃esusupah mai gaiug . Ale gegǝm vi hai susur sagw . Husur naut kǝmas nǝb̃evi amasta sam̃ , nǝsǝdaŋ taltal , nǝlogw mǝdau , nǝsǝnau ginau , ale dereh nǝŋavŋavan tegǝm len gaiug , len nǝlom̃ am .
40011030	Husur nayok sagw sǝdaŋ hǝn gǝb̃ikade , sǝdaŋ hǝn gaiug gǝb̃elǝboi nǝsa notokele , ale nǝsa notoriŋi len gaiug , emǝlala , sǝdaŋ hǝn gǝb̃igole . ”
40012001	Len nǝboŋ enan aYesu iyar tur len nǝmarireu nawit galevis len nǝSappat . Ahai susur san gail lumalkǝkat ale lotub̃at b̃ub̃ur nǝhavhǝt nawit gail hǝn lǝb̃ihani .
40012002	Nǝboŋ naFarisi galevis lotoris natenan , lukel mai aYesu ke , “ Geris , ahai susur sam̃ gail lugol nǝsa nalo tokai tasi len nǝSappat . ”
40012003	Ris aYesu tokel mai galit ke , “ Be len natosian siGot , mǝtsaṽuruŋ lǝboi nǝsa aTevit galito lotogole nǝboŋ lotomalkǝkat a ?
40012004	Eb̃is len naim siGot ale luhan nabǝta tolo , tokolkol hǝn galito be tonor hǝn ahai tutumav sǝb̃olit ŋai lǝb̃ihani .
40012005	Ale mǝtsaṽuruŋi len nalo siMoses toke len nǝSappat ahai tutumav gail lotoum len naim siGot , lǝsagol kas natideh tosa , naut kǝmas lob̃ur kotov nalo hǝn nǝSappat a ?
40012006	Avil mǝttalǝboi namilen nategai len natosian siGot toke , ‘ Nolǝŋon nalolosaan , savi natutumavan , ’ asike mǝttǝsab̃ sǝhoti ke alategai lotonor limaspanis .
40012007	
40012008	Alategai lunor bathut aNatun Nǝvanuan evi Masta hǝn nǝSappat . ”
40012009	Beti aYesu eriŋ naut enan , evi lan naim nab̃onb̃onan sua salito .
40012010	Ikad naulum̃an sual ei , navǝlan tomat , togǝm hum towas . Ale naFarisi gail luke lisab̃ sǝhot nǝsaban ideh len aYesu ale lousi ke , “ Inor len nalo hǝn nǝvanuan b̃igol avan ideh b̃imaur len nǝSappat a ? ”
40012011	Ale isor var galit ke , “ Gamit ideh gotokad nasipsip tosua tateh len nab̃ur len nǝSappat , gǝtatǝgau gati , lav kuvi a ? Evoi mǝttǝlav kuvi !
40012012	Ale nasipsip savi natideh , nǝvanuan esǝhor masuṽ hǝni len nǝnauan siGot . Imaienan , inor len nalo hǝn datb̃igol navoian len nǝSappat . ”
40012013	Beti ikel mai aulum̃an ke , “ Gisar hǝn navǝlam̃ . ” Nǝboŋ tosar hǝni tonoŋ , navǝlan imaur tǝlmam inor ŋai hǝn togon .
40012014	Ŋa naFarisi gail luvan , lub̃onb̃on , lusor utaut hǝn nap̃isal hǝn lǝb̃emǝdas bun aYesu hǝn b̃imat .
40012015	Be bathut ke aYesu tolǝboi natgalenan , eriŋ naut enan . Nab̃iltiluṽoh lohusuri ale igol alat lotomǝsah p̃isi lumaur .
40012016	Ale ikele hǝn galit ke salihol husur gai len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail .
40012017	Ekǝmaienan hǝn nǝsa ahai kelkel ur , aIsaiah , tokele b̃isarpoh ke :
40012018	“ Naulum̃an nauman sagw bogai notolekis hǝni . Nolǝmas bun gai , nǝlogw ehǝhaṽur hǝni . Dereh neriŋ aNunugw lan , ale dereh tikel ur nanoran sagw van hǝn nǝvanuan naut tiltile gail .
40012019	Asike eṽitṽituh , asike ikai habat , asike ikad avan ideh b̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝn nadolon len nap̃isal gail .
40012020	Asike ikol b̃ur naviyab tomab̃it tia , asike ekin bun nǝhau nam̃ial topaŋ kǝkereh sal , van vǝbar b̃igol nanoran b̃ipat puŋpuŋ naut p̃isi .
40012021	Ale nǝvanuan naut tiltile gail p̃isi dereh leriŋ nǝlolit lan , dereh livatvat viri hǝn b̃ilav kuv galit dan nǝsaan salito . ”
40012022	Beti nǝvanuan galevis losǝhar naulum̃an tokad natǝmat togol tob̃ut mai namǝtan tob̃esw . Losǝhari van hǝn aYesu , ale igol imaur hǝn ke elǝboi b̃isor , elǝboi b̃ekǝta .
40012023	Naluṽoh p̃isi lumaŋmaŋ tǝban ale luke , “ Ategai bogai , anatun siTevit m̃au a ? ”
40012024	Be nǝboŋ naFarisi gail lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan , luke , “ Ategai ehut natǝmat gail len nǝdaŋan siPeelsepul ŋai toil a m̃o hǝn natǝmat gail . ”
40012025	Avil aYesu elǝboi nǝnauan salito ale ikel mai galit ke , “ Nǝvanuan gail hǝn nǝkantri pipihabǝlan nakiŋ ideh lotob̃alkabaŋ , dereh naut enan timasirsir , teb̃ǝb̃esw . Navile o nǝbathudud ideh tob̃alkabaŋ , asike eil gǝgat be dereh tepǝpehw .
40012026	ASetan tahut natǝmat san gail , gai tǝb̃alkabaŋ . Dereh alat lototoh pipihabǝlan lepǝpehw , asike loil gǝgat .
40012027	Ale nǝtahut natǝmat gail len nǝdaŋan siPeelsepul , ahai susur samit gail lohut natǝmat gail len nǝdaŋan sise ? Ahai susur samit gail gabag loṽusani ke mǝtsanor .
40012028	Be nǝb̃ehut natǝmat gail len nǝdaŋan seNunun aGot , imagenan natohan pipihabǝlan aGot ibar gamit tia .
40012029	Avan ideh toke teb̃is len naim sinabǝhariv todaŋ hǝn b̃evǝnoh natit san gail , imasbaŋis gat abǝhariv . Nǝboŋ tobaŋisi tonoŋ ŋai , elǝboi b̃itariv kuv natit p̃isi dan naim san .
40012030	“ Avan ideh satoh len nǝtarhǝt sagw , avan en evi enemi sagw ; ale avan ideh sasǝsǝgov mai ginau len nǝmatuan , gai igol imap̃ip̃iriah ; asike b̃esǝhar nǝvanuan gail van hǝn aGot , esǝhar nǝvanuan gail van vǝsab .
40012031	Imagenan , nukel mai gamito ke , aGot dereh terub̃at nǝsaan p̃isi naut kǝmas nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃isor mǝdasi , be lǝb̃isor mǝdas aNunun aGot , aGot asike erub̃at nǝsaan enan .
40012032	Avan ideh b̃isor tas aNatun Nǝvanuan , aGot dereh terub̃at nǝsaan enan , be avan ideh b̃isor tas aNunun aGot , aGot asike erub̃at nǝsaan enan dani boŋ ideh vi sutuai . ”
40012033	Ale aYesu ike , “ Gǝb̃ikad nǝhai tovoi , naṽit dereh tivoi . Gǝb̃ikad nǝhai b̃isa , naṽit dereh tisa . Bathut goris lǝboi nǝhai nǝboŋ gotoris naṽite .
40012034	Gamit anatun nǝm̃at gail !
40012035	Nǝvanuan tovoi , navoian egǝm len natit tovoi topul len nǝlon ; avil nǝvanuan tosa , nǝsaan egǝm len natit tosa topul len nǝlon .
40012036	Be nukel mai gamit ke , len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan , nǝvanuan gail limaskele sil nǝsa lotokel nasoruan p̃isi lotosor lab hǝni .
40012037	Bathut len nasoruan sam̃ aGot dereh tisab̃ sǝhoti ke gotonor , ale len nasoruan sam̃ aGot dereh tisab̃ sǝhoti ke gotosa , gimaspanis . ”
40012038	Beti ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo mai naFarisi galevis lous aYesu ke , “ Hai p̃usan , namtuke namteris namerikel gǝb̃igole . ”
40012039	AYesu isor var galit ke , “ Gamit naur ta damǝŋai mǝtusa , mǝtsǝdaŋ len aGot sum̃an apǝhaṽut tohusur aulum̃an tiltile , sǝdaŋ len asoan . Mǝtous namerikel , avil asike nugol namerikel ideh , be dereh nigol ŋai namerikel hǝn nasuhunian sihai kelkel ur , aJonah .
40012040	Sum̃an aJonah totoh len nǝmariboŋ totor mai nalenmariug totor len nabǝhaṽun nab̃iltiieh , len naṽide tomagenan , aNatun Nǝvanuan dereh tipat b̃urhulon nǝtan husur nǝmariboŋ titor mai nalenmariug titor .
40012041	Husur natgalenan , len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan , alat a Nineveh dereh leil , kel kot nǝsaan sinaur ta damǝŋai , like naur egai limaspanis . Alat a Nineveh dereh ligol naten husur ke , nǝboŋ aJonah tokel ur napisulan siGot , galit lupair dan nǝsaan salito , be gagai ikad natesua gegai toyalyal habat sǝhor aJonah !
40012042	Len nǝboŋ aGot b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan , naKwin hǝn naSaut dereh tile mǝhat , kel kot nǝsaan sinaur ta damǝŋai , tike naur egai limaspanis . Dereh tigol timagenan husur egǝm len nǝtarhǝt navile a pan hǝn b̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝn namitisau siSolomon hǝn nǝmauran tonor , be gagai , ikad natesua gegai toyalyal sǝhor aSolomon ! ”
40012043	AYesu isor tǝtas am ke , “ Datusor husur nahutian hǝn natǝmat gail . Ale , nǝboŋ nanunun nǝmargobut tovan dan nǝvanuan ideh , nanunun nǝmargobut enan iyar turtur naut masmas gail hǝn b̃isab̃ naut ideh hǝn b̃iŋavŋav lan , be idoŋ sob̃uer hǝni .
40012044	Beti natǝmat ikel mai gai gabag , ike , ‘ Netǝlmam bai vi lan naim sagw notogam dani . ’ Ale nǝboŋ tobar nǝvanuan gai tovan dani , nǝvanuan enan ehum naim tob̃ǝb̃esw , lotosir vahvahuri , tuan tǝlmam hǝn natit p̃isi tonor .
40012045	Beti ivan vasǝhar nanunun tomǝlevru lotosa masuṽ sǝhor gai , ale nǝboŋ lotob̃is len nǝvanuan , lutoh tin ei . Ale nǝmauran sinǝvanuan enan egǝm isa vǝsa tibatbat sǝhor ta m̃o . Dereh timagenan hǝn naur tosa ta damǝŋai . ”
40012046	Nǝboŋ aYesu tosor mai naluṽoh sal , aṽan matmat gail mai anan lubar naut enan . Loil vivile , luke lisor maii .
40012047	Avan sua ikel maii ke , “ Geris , anam̃ mai aṽam̃ gail loil vivile , luke lisor mai gaiug . ”
40012048	Ale isor var atenan ke , “ Anagw ase ? Aṽagw gail ase ? ”
40012049	Ale esuhun navǝlan van hǝn ahai susur san gail , ike , “ Geris ! Anana sagw mai aṽagw gail bogai !
40012050	Bathut avan ideh togol nǝsa aTǝmagw len nǝmav tolǝŋoni , gai evi aṽagw , o aṽavinegw o anana sagw . ”
40013001	Len nǝboŋ enan , aYesu evivile len naim , ebǝtah tarhǝwai Kalili .
40013002	Ale nab̃iltiluṽoh logǝm , b̃onb̃on garu lan , gol ke isah len nab̃ot hǝn b̃ebǝtah , ale naluṽoh loil husur nabitas .
40013003	Beti ikel natit tosob̃ur mai galito len nǝb̃ol p̃usan gail . Ike , “ Ikad nǝvanuan tomabmabul namisurhut gail . Boŋ sua ia bubulan namisurhut nawit .
40013004	Nǝboŋ tobubulan gail van , namisurhuwit galevis lorus husur nap̃isal , ale nǝman namǝsav logǝm , luhan p̃is gail .
40013005	Galevis lorus len naut tobaŋ vat , nǝtan tokǝkereh lan , ale lutov tutut bathut nǝtan sǝsareh .
40013006	Nǝboŋ namityal tovi mǝhat , nǝyal etun idaŋ gol nalut gail lomial husur sǝkad nǝharhǝt tovi pan , ale lumayoh .
40013007	Galevis lorus len nǝhau tokad nasunite , ale nǝhau itov vi mǝhat , ruŋ gut bun nawit .
40013008	Galevis lorus len nǝtan tokǝnoh ale nǝboŋ lotomatu , sua iṽan vǝkad 100 , sua iṽan vǝkad 60 , sual am iṽan vǝkad 30 .
40013009	Nǝvanuan tokad nǝdariŋan , tesǝsǝloŋ ! ”
40013010	Beti ahai susur san gail logǝm hǝn aYesu , lousi ke , “ Nǝboŋ gotosor mai galito , gub̃ol p̃usan m̃os nǝsa ? ”
40013011	Ale isor var galit ke , “ Nugole husur aGot idam̃ hǝni ke mǝtb̃elǝboi nǝsa tosusuah len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav be aGot sǝdam̃ hǝni ke galit lǝb̃elǝboii .
40013012	Bathut avan ideh nǝlon tomab̃ur hǝn nǝsa notokele , dereh aGot tilav nalǝboian am maii hǝn b̃epul hǝni . Avil avan ideh tomǝtahun b̃elǝboi nǝsa notokele , dereh aGot tilav kuv nalǝboian tokade dani .
40013013	Husur enan nusor mai galito len nǝb̃ol p̃usan , husur naut kǝmas lotokǝta , lǝsakǝta lǝboi nǝsa notogole , naut kǝmas lotosǝsǝloŋ , lǝsasǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa notokele , lǝsalǝboii .
40013014	Ale nasoruan siGot aIsaiah tokel uri isarpoh len galito , ike : “ ‘ Len nasǝsǝloŋan samito , dereh mǝtesǝsǝloŋ be asike mǝtosǝsǝloŋ lǝboi nǝsa notokele , ale len nakǝtaan samito , dereh mǝtekǝta be asike mǝtokǝta lǝboi nǝsa notogole .
40013015	Husur nǝkadun alategai egǝm ṽonṽon , pǝpadaŋ nǝdariŋalit eb̃ulb̃ulol , ale namǝtalit ib̃er . Asike lǝtǝmagenan , namǝtalit takǝta ris nǝsa notogole , nǝdariŋalit tasǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa notokele , nǝlolit talǝboi natgalenan , ale lǝtǝpair van hǝn ginau , ale nǝtagol galit lǝtǝmaur . ’ ”
40013016	Ale aYesu isor am ke , “ Gamito , navoian siGot igol mǝtukab hǝn namǝtamito bathut ke lotokǝta , mǝtukab hǝn nǝdariŋamito bathut ke lotosǝsǝloŋ .
40013017	Husur nukel nakitinan mai gamito ke , ahai kelkel ur mai nǝvanuan tonor lotosob̃ur lolǝŋon masuṽ ke lǝtaris nǝsa mǝttorisi , be lǝsarisi , lolǝŋon masuṽ ke lǝtasǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa mǝttosǝsǝloŋ hǝni , be lǝsasǝsǝloŋ hǝni .
40013018	“ Imagenan , sǝsǝloŋ hǝn namilen nǝb̃ol hǝn nǝvanuan tobubulan namisurhuwit .
40013019	Namisurhuwit torus len nap̃isal esum̃an nǝvanuan gail lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan aGot be lǝsalǝboii , gai tosa vǝsa masuṽ tovi tǝmat egǝm , lav kuv namisurhut nasoruan enan dan nǝlolito .
40013020	Namisurhuwit torus len naut tobaŋ vat esum̃an alat lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan , ale vǝha-sua ŋai lotǝgau gati len nakemkeman .
40013021	Avil lǝsǝkad nǝharhǝt tovi pan gol lǝsǝmaur sabǝlav . Be nǝboŋ todaŋ b̃ibari o avan ideh b̃emǝdas buni gol lǝb̃elǝŋon b̃isa , dereh limayoh tutut , luteh dan nadǝlomian len nasoruan .
40013022	Namisurhuwit torus len nǝhau tokad nasunite esum̃an alat lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan avil nǝ-nau-masuṽ-an hǝn nǝmauran ta damǝŋai mai nagǝrasian hǝn na-pul-hǝn-natite-an aroruŋ gut bun nasoruan gol sǝṽan .
40013023	Avil namisurhuwit torus len nǝtan tokǝnoh esum̃an alat lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan , lotolǝboii , lotoṽan masuṽ . Sual iṽan vǝkad 100 , sual iṽan vǝkad 60 , sual am iṽan vǝkad 30 . ”
40013024	AYesu ikel nǝb̃ol p̃usan sual am mai galito , ike , “ Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai : Ikad avan sua tobubulan namisurhuwit tovoi len nǝmarireu san .
40013025	Be nǝboŋ topat len mariug , aenemi sua egǝm , ebubulan namisurhuliol tosa len nǝmarireu tokad nawit tia , ale ivan .
40013026	Nǝboŋ nawit totov , tub̃at b̃iṽan , naliol tosa am itov .
40013027	Naslev gail simahean naim logǝm hǝni , luke , ‘ Nasub̃ , gaiug gobubulan namisurhuwit tovoi len nǝmarireu sam̃ be gagai epul hǝn naliol tosa ! Imabe ? ’
40013028	Ale ikel mai galit ke , ‘ Aenemi sua igol nategai . ’ Ŋa naslev gail lousi ke , ‘ Guke namteput tuan naliol enan a ? ’
40013029	Ris toke , ‘ Ao , nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eputi , dereh mǝteput mǝdas nawit am .
40013030	Riŋ gǝlar p̃isi aritov b̃onb̃on vǝbar nǝmatuan , ale len nǝboŋ hǝn nǝmatuan , dereh nikel mai nǝvanuan nǝmatuan ke lepǝpehun gǝlaru , baŋis tuan naliol tosa hǝn lǝb̃epǝŋasi , ale baŋis tuan nawit vi lan naim sagw notoriŋriŋ nǝhanian lan . ’ ”
40013031	AYesu ib̃ol p̃usan tǝtas ike , “ Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai : Ikad namisurhumastat avan sua tomabule len nǝhol san .
40013032	Ekǝkereh sǝhor namisurhuhanian tiltile gail , avil nǝboŋ totov , egǝm tibau sǝhor nǝhanian gail len nǝhol , ale egǝm vi hai , hǝn ke nǝman namǝsav logǝm um hǝn nǝhai ŋodŋod salit len nǝpashǝt gail . ”
40013033	AYesu ikel nǝb̃ol p̃usan . Ike , “ Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai : Mitinau nayis , apǝhaṽut sua tolavi . Eb̃undasi len nǝhad nǝflaua totor van vǝbar nǝflaua kavkav totob . ”
40013034	AYesu ikel natgalen p̃isi mai naluṽoh gail len nǝb̃ol p̃usan . Nǝboŋ tosor mai galito , ikel nǝb̃ol p̃usan akis ŋai .
40013035	Igol tomaienan hǝn b̃igol nǝsa ahai kelkel ur tokele b̃isarpoh ke , “ Nǝboŋ nǝb̃esǝŋav hǝn nabuŋogw , dereh nisor len nǝb̃ol p̃usan , dereh nikel ur natit gail lotosusuah ta sutuai len natub̃atan , nǝboŋ notoum hǝn navile a pan . ”
40013036	Beti aYesu eriŋ naluṽoh , evi lohoim . Ale ahai susur san gail logǝm hǝni , luke , “ Kel mai ginamito bai , namilen nǝb̃ol hǝn naliol tosa len nǝmarireu . ”
40013037	Isor var galit ke , “ Atenan tobubulan namisurhuwit tovoi evi aNatun Nǝvanuan ,
40013038	ale nǝmarireu evi navile a pan . Namisurhuwit tovoi lovi alat lototoh pipihabǝlan aGot . Naliol tosa lovi alat sitenan tosa vǝsa masuṽ tovi tǝmat .
40013039	Ale aenemi tobubulan namisurhuliol tosa , evi natǝmat . Nǝboŋ hǝn nǝmatuan evi nǝboŋ hǝn nanoŋan hǝn navile a pan , nagilen hǝn natit p̃isi , ale alat nǝmatuan lovi aŋel gail .
40013040	Sum̃an alat nǝmatuan lotobaŋis tuan naliol tosa hǝn nǝhab b̃ihani , dereh timagenan len nagilen hǝn natit p̃isi .
40013041	Dereh aNatun Nǝvanuan tesǝvat aŋel san gail hǝn lǝb̃epǝpehun galit p̃isi lotogol nǝvanuan b̃igol nǝsaan , mai alat lotogol nǝsaan , dan natohan pipihabǝlan .
40013042	Dereh aŋel gail libar hǝn galito vi lan nǝhab topud vǝsa ; len naut enan dereh litaŋ , likat b̃urb̃ur nariṽolito .
40013043	Beti alat lotonor dereh lesum̃an namityal tom̃ial habat len natohan pipihabǝlan aTǝmalito . Nǝvanuan tokad nǝdariŋan tesǝsǝloŋ !
40013044	“ Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai : Ikad nakontit sua tovoi buni , nǝvat han tosob̃ur , tosusuah len nǝmarireu sua . Ale avan sua isab̃i . Itavun tǝtas hǝni . Ale len nakemkeman san ivan , ep̃ur hǝn natit p̃isi tokade ale ia ṽur nǝmarireu enan hǝn b̃ikad natenan tovoi .
40013045	“ Nukele am ke , natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai : Ikad avan sua toṽur natit gail , p̃ur hǝn gail , todoŋ nanesnes tovoi gail .
40013046	Ale nǝboŋ tosab̃ nanesnes sua , nǝvat han totibau , ivan , p̃ur hǝn natit p̃isi tokade , ale ia ṽur nanesnes enan .
40013047	“ Nukele am ke , natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai : Nǝvanuan galevis lubar hǝn nalevlev len nab̃iltiwai . Sǝdareh ikad namǝŋod totiltile tosob̃ur tovisivis lan .
40013048	Ale nǝboŋ topul , lolivi vahut , lobǝtah , losǝŋon tovoi gail len nǝhad sua ale lubar hǝn tosa gail vi tut .
40013049	Dereh timagenan len nǝboŋ hǝn nanoŋan hǝn navile a pan , nagilen hǝn natit p̃isi . Aŋel gail dereh lia pǝpehun alat lotosa vǝsa dan alat lotonor .
40013050	Dereh libar hǝn alat lotosa vi lan nǝhab topud vǝsa vagol nametǝlai tovi wai ; len naut enan dereh litaŋ , likat b̃urb̃ur nariṽolito . ”
40013051	AYesu eus galit ke , “ Mǝtolǝboi sǝhot natgalen p̃isi m̃au a ? ” Lusor vari ke , “ Evoi , namtolǝboii . ”
40013052	Ŋa ikel mai galit ke , “ Ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo siMoses togǝm vi ahai susur len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav , ahai p̃usan enan esum̃an amahean naim topul hǝn nakontit gail . Eriŋ natgalenan len naut sua hǝn lǝb̃esuh ei . Ale ilav nakontit toveveu mai nakontit tomatu dan naut enan . ”
40013053	Nǝboŋ aYesu tokel nǝb̃ol p̃usan galenan tonoŋ , eriŋ naut enan .
40013054	Ale nǝboŋ tobar naut a Nasaret , naut totibau lan , ep̃usan len naim nab̃onb̃onan salito . Galit lup̃aŋ , luke , “ Eee , namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tovoi egai , gai ilavi a be ? Nǝdaŋan hǝn b̃igol namerikel gail , ilavi a be ?
40013055	Be savi anatun ulum̃an sinǝvanuan na-um-im-an a ? Anan , nahǝsan aMeri a ? Aṽan aJemes , aJosef , aSimon mai aJutas a ?
40013056	Ale aṽavinen gail p̃isi lǝsatoh mai gidato a ? B̃imaienan , ilav natgalen a be ? Savi gai hǝn b̃imaienan ! ”
40013057	Ale nǝlolit epǝŋasi , lomǝtahuni . Be aYesu ikel mai galit ke , “ Ahai kelkel ur ideh , len naut p̃isi loputsani len nǝnauan salito , be len naut a im san mai len naim san , lunau ke tovi ut kǝmas . ”
40013058	Ale aYesu sagol namerikel sasob̃ur len naut enan husur lupar dǝlomian lan .
40014001	Nǝboŋ aHerot Antipas tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-kel-uri-an husur aYesu ,
40014002	ikel mai naslev lotokǝtkǝta tǝban ke , “ Atenan aJon Baptais bolai ! Ile mǝhat dan nǝmatan , imagenan nǝdaŋan hǝn b̃igol namerikel gail ipat lan . ”
40014003	AHerot ekǝmaienan husur a m̃o igol ke lototah gat aJon , riŋi len naim bǝbaŋis sil abareab siHerot , aHerotias tovi asoan aFilip , aHerot aṽan aFilip tosǝhar kuvi .
40014004	Lutah gat aJon husur ikel titau hǝn aHerot ke , “ Len nalo sanor hǝn gǝb̃esǝhar alitenan . ”
40014005	AHerot ike tigol aJon timat be emǝtahw len nǝlol paŋpaŋ sinaluṽoh bathut lunau ke aJon tovi ahai kelkel ur .
40014006	Len nǝhanan hǝn nǝboŋ nǝpasian siHerot , anatvavin aHerotias isav len nǝholito ale aHerot ehǝhaṽur habat hǝni .
40014007	Imagenan ita gat na-kel-gati-an sua hǝn b̃eviol hǝn natideh gai b̃elǝŋoni maii .
40014008	Ŋa nǝboŋ anan tokel maii hǝn nǝsa hǝn b̃eusi , natǝbarehreh ikel mai aHerot ke , “ Nolǝŋon nǝkadun aJon Baptais , gegai , len nasiloh ! ”
40014009	Ale naut kǝmas ilolosa , bathut na-kel-gati-an san gai tota gati , mai alat lotosuh len nǝhanan , aHerot ikele hǝn nasoltia galevis ke tehum tousi .
40014010	Ale lovi lan naim bǝbaŋis , luta kotov nǝkadun aJon .
40014011	Loriŋ nǝkadun len nasiloh , pati , lavi mai natǝbarehreh topati vǝlavi mai anan .
40014012	Beti ahai susur siJon logǝmai , lupat niben van vǝtavuni . Ale nǝboŋ lototavuni tonoŋ , luvan hǝn aYesu , lukel nǝsa tovisi maii .
40014013	Nǝboŋ aYesu tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-kel-uri-an husur aJon , isah len nab̃ot sua , eriŋ naut enan hǝn b̃itoh sǝb̃on len naut tob̃ǝb̃esw . Nǝboŋ naluṽoh gail lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni , loriŋ nab̃iltivile gail , luyar a ut husuri .
40014014	Nǝboŋ aYesu tomariŋ dan nab̃ot , eris nab̃iltiluṽoh , nǝlon itaŋis galito ale igol alat lotomǝsah lumaur .
40014015	Nǝboŋ naut togomgom , ahai susur san gail logǝm hǝni , luke , “ Naut eg ipat a tut dan navile gail . Namityal ivan p̃isi tia . Sǝvat naluṽoh van , hǝn lǝb̃evi lan navile gail hǝn lǝb̃idas hanian hǝn lǝb̃eṽuri . ”
40014016	Ris aYesu tokel mai galit ke , “ Salivan , gamit m̃au mitilav nǝhanian mai galito . ”
40014017	Lukel maii ke , “ Be namtsǝkad natideh gegai , natuhbǝta torim mai naieh toru ŋai . ”
40014018	Ale ike , “ Tariv gail gǝm , mai ginau . ”
40014019	Beti ikel mai naluṽoh ke lebǝtah len naliol . Ale ilav nabǝta torim mai naieh toru , ekǝta vi lan nǝmav , ikel nasipaan . Eb̃ur gail , ilav nabǝta mai ahai susur san gail ale lopǝpehun gail mai naluṽoh .
40014020	Galit p̃isi luhan , luhanukub , ale losǝsǝŋon hudhuhanian van , gol nǝhad tovi 12 lopul .
40014021	Ikad alalum̃an lotovi 5000 lotohan , be ikad alatpǝhaṽut mai alahutai am .
40014022	Beti aYesu igol ahai susur gail lusah len nab̃ot hǝn lǝb̃eil a m̃o vi lan nǝtarhǝt nab̃iltiwai . Ale gai esǝvat naluṽoh gail hǝn lǝb̃eriŋ naut enan .
40014023	Nǝboŋ tosǝvat galit tonoŋ , aYesu etǝṽehuh sǝb̃on vi lan naṽehuh hǝn b̃isor mai aGot . Ale nǝboŋ naut togomgom itoh sǝb̃on ei .
40014024	Len namityal enan , nab̃ot isal vi rivuh a tut dan nǝtan . Nǝwai ekudkud vapus , gol iṽas nab̃ot husur isoh b̃ur nǝlan .
40014025	Len nadudulan som̃ilan naut sǝlan sal be aYesu egǝm hǝn galito , iyar len nǝp̃on nab̃iltiwai .
40014026	Nǝboŋ ahai susur gail lotoris toyaryar p̃oniwai , nǝkadulit eṽurṽur . Lukai ke , “ Wao ! Nanunun sua bolai . ” Ale ninelit epil gol lukai habat .
40014027	Vǝha-sua ŋai aYesu isor mai galit ke , “ Samtemǝtahw ! Mǝteil b̃uri ! Ginau bogai ! ”
40014028	APita ikai van hǝni ke , “ Nasub̃ , b̃evi gaiug kitin , kel mai ginau ke niyar len nǝp̃on nǝwai van hǝn gaiug . ”
40014029	Ale ike , “ Gǝmai ! ” Nǝboŋ aPita tomariŋ dan nab̃ot , iyar p̃oniwai van hǝn aYesu .
40014030	Be nǝboŋ aPita toris nǝlan todaŋ , emǝtahw , etub̃at sar maduŋduŋ ale ikai ke , “ Nasub̃ , numat ! Liv kuv ginau ! ”
40014031	Vǝha-sua ŋai aYesu isar hǝn navǝlan , itah gati , ale ike , “ Gaiug gotokad natuhdǝlomian ŋai , nǝlom̃ eur ginau mabe ? ”
40014032	Ale nǝboŋ artosah len nab̃ot , nǝlan idar buni .
40014033	Beti alat len nab̃ot lulotu hǝni ke , “ Govi aNatun aGot kitin . ”
40014034	Nǝboŋ lotolav tukot len nab̃iltiwai , luvahut len naut a Kennesaret .
40014035	Nǝboŋ alat len naut enan lotokǝta lǝboi aYesu , lopisul van hǝn naut p̃isi todar vis naut enan ale losǝhar alat lotomǝsah van hǝni .
40014036	Loŋiri ke tidam̃ hǝn lǝb̃ibar ŋai nasum̃arhǝt nahurabat san , ale galit p̃isi lotobari lumaur .
40015001	Beti naFarisi gail mai ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo luyar a Jerusalem gǝm hǝn aYesu , luke ,
40015002	“ Imabe ahai susur sam̃ gail lupal sob dan nap̃isal hǝn naṽide sihaṽut sidat gail ta sutuai ? Husur lǝsakǝkasǝval nǝboŋ lotohan . ”
40015003	Ris aYesu tosor var galit ke , “ Gamit , imabe mǝtob̃ur kotov nalo siGot m̃os mǝtb̃ehusur naṽide samit ta sutuai ?
40015004	Bathut aGot ike , ‘ Putsan atǝmam̃ mai anam̃ matmat len nǝnauan sam̃ , ’
40015005	Avil gamito , mǝtumakuv dan nalo siGot hǝn mǝtb̃ehusur naṽide samit ta sutuai nǝboŋ mǝttop̃usan ke , ‘ Avan ideh b̃ikel mai atǝman o anan ke , “ Nǝsa notokade hǝn nǝb̃evi tarhǝt sam̃ , noviol hǝni tia mai aGot . Gai b̃igol b̃imagenan , inor ŋai ke asike eputsan atǝman len nǝnauan san . ” ’ Gamito , mǝtugol ke nakelean siGot evi naut kǝmas ŋai .
40015006	
40015007	Mǝtovi nǝvanuan gǝgǝras ŋai . Nǝsa aGot tokele len nabuŋon aIsaiah husur gamito ekitin . Ike ,
40015008	“ ‘ Nǝvanuan galegai loputsan nahǝsagw len nasoran salito , be len nǝlolito , lunau ke notovi naut kǝmas .
40015009	Lulotu sob̃uer hǝn ginau , lop̃usan hǝn nakelean sinǝvanuan , hum tovi lo sagw . ’ ”
40015010	Beti aYesu ekis naluṽoh gǝmai , ikel mai galit ke , “ Mǝtesǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa notokele , mǝtelǝboii .
40015011	Savi nǝsa tovi lan nǝp̃an togol nǝvanuan tob̃iŋb̃iŋal len nǝhon aGot . Ao , evi nǝsa tovivile dan nabuŋon togol nǝvanuan tosa , evi nǝsa tokele togol nǝvanuan saveveu . ”
40015012	Beti ahai susur gail logǝm hǝni luke , “ Nǝboŋ naFarisi gail lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa gotomadhakele , igol nǝlolit isa . Golǝboii m̃au a ? ”
40015013	Ris aYesu tosor var galit ke , “ Nǝhai ideh aTǝmagw len nǝmav sǝmabule , dereh teput kuvi .
40015014	Riŋ galit lesuh ! Lovi metb̃esw gail lotosǝhar alat lǝsakǝta . Nametb̃esw sua b̃esǝhar nametb̃esw togon , dereh gǝlar p̃isi ariteh , arimasur len nab̃ur . ”
40015015	Ale aPita ike , “ Kel namilen nasoruan kǝta enan mai ginamito . ”
40015016	AYesu ike , “ Gamito am , mǝtsalǝboi sǝhoti a ?
40015017	Mǝtolǝboii tia ke natit p̃isi tovi lan nǝp̃an nǝvanuan , evi lan natǝbaŋ van , evivile vi lan nalitavtav .
40015018	Avil natit gail nǝvanuan tokele , nǝsa tovivile dan nabuŋon , egǝm len nǝsa topat len nǝlon , ale natgalenan lugol nǝvanuan isa , saveveu .
40015019	Husur natgalegai logǝm len nǝlon : nǝnauan tosa , nagolean hǝn nǝmatan , naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan , naitian tosa , navǝnahan , naliboŋan len nakotan , mai nasoruan tomǝdas nahǝsan nǝvanuan o tomǝdas nahǝsan aGot .
40015020	Natgalenan lugol nǝvanuan lob̃iŋb̃iŋal len nǝhon aGot . Naṽide hǝn nakǝkasǝvalan len nǝhanan sagole ! ”
40015021	Beti aYesu eriŋ naut a Kalili , evi lan naut pǝpadaŋ hǝn nab̃iltivile eru , a Tair mai a Siton .
40015022	Atob̃taKenaan sua totoh len naut enan , egǝm hǝn aYesu , ikai ke , “ Nasub̃ , aNatun siTevit , gilolosa hǝn ginau . Natǝmat sua emǝdas anatvavigw vǝsa ! ”
40015023	Be aYesu sasor vari len nasoruan ideh . Ale ahai susur san gail logǝm hǝni luke , “ Sǝvati vi tut bathut ehusur gidato , ikai walwal ! ”
40015024	Len na-sor-vari-an san aYesu ike , “ AGot esǝvat ginau van hǝn alat a Israel ŋai lotohum nasipsip gail lotomasig . ”
40015025	Ŋa alitenan egǝm , teh bathurien aYesu , ike , “ Nasub̃ , gevi tarhǝt sagw ! ”
40015026	AYesu ike , “ Sanor hǝn nǝb̃ilav kuv nabǝta hinatugw gail hǝn nǝb̃ibar hǝni van hǝn nalipah gail . ”
40015027	Ris aliten toke , “ Evoi , Nasub̃ , be nalipah gail lolǝboi lǝb̃ihan nasugut nabǝta torus vi pan dan natev simasta salito . ”
40015028	Ale aYesu isor vari ke , “ Bareab , gaiug gukad nadǝlomian totibau masuṽ ! Tevisi m̃os gaiug hum gotolǝŋoni . ” Ale anatvavin imaur len namityal enan van .
40015029	AYesu eriŋ naut enan , etǝlmam vi Kalili , iyar husur nǝtarhǝb̃iltiwai Kalili . Ale etǝṽehuh vi lan naṽehuh , ebǝtah ei .
40015030	Nab̃iltiluṽoh gail logǝm hǝni , losǝhar alat lotogau , nametb̃esw gail , alat narielit tosa gol lǝsǝyar , nab̃ut gail mai isob̃ur am . Loriŋ galit bathurien aYesu ale igol galit lumaur .
40015031	Naluṽoh lumaŋmaŋ len nǝsa lotorisi . Nab̃ut gail lusor ; alat narielit tosa , nibelit ivoŋǝvoŋ , lumaur ; alat lotogau luyar ; mai nametb̃esw gail lokǝta . Ale lusal suh nǝyalyalan siGot silat a Israel .
40015032	Beti aYesu ekis ahai susur san gail gǝmai ike , “ Nǝlogw itaŋis alategai , husur lutah mai ginau len nǝmariboŋ totor tia ale lǝsǝkad natideh hǝn lǝb̃ihani . Nǝsalǝŋon nǝb̃esǝvat galit van malkǝkat . Nǝb̃igole , dereh limatmatioṽ husur nap̃isal salito . ”
40015033	Ale ahai susur gail lukel maii ke , “ Len naut tob̃ǝb̃esw topat sǝb̃on maiegai , namtilav natuhbǝta tihau mabe hǝn namtb̃evǝŋan nab̃iltiluṽoh egai ? ”
40015034	AYesu eus galit ke , “ Mǝtukad natuhbǝta evis ? ” Luke , “ Namtukad emǝlevru mai natuhieh galevis . ”
40015035	Ŋa aYesu ikel mai naluṽoh ke lebǝtah len tan .
40015036	Ilav natuhbǝta tomǝlevru mai naieh gail , esipa vi tǝban aGot hǝn nǝhanian , eb̃uri , lavi mai ahai susur gail ale lopǝpehuni mai naluṽoh .
40015037	Galit p̃isi luhan vǝhanukub . Ale losǝŋon nahudhuhanian van gol nǝhad tomǝlevru lopul .
40015038	Ikad alalum̃an lotovi 4000 lotohan , be ikad alatpǝhaṽut mai alahutai gail am .
40015039	Beti aYesu esǝvat naluṽoh gail van . Ale isah len nab̃ot , igam van vǝbar naut a Makatan .
40016001	Boŋ sua naFarisi mai naSattiusi gail logǝm hǝn aYesu . Lolǝŋon ke aYesu tigol nǝsaban , ŋa lousi hǝn b̃eṽusan galit hǝn namerikel hǝn nǝmav .
40016002	Be aYesu isor var galit ke , “ Nǝboŋ namityal tomasur mǝtuke , ‘ Pelan dereh naut tivoi husur nǝmarigw ikathab , ’
40016003	ale len nadudulan mǝtuke , ‘ Damǝŋai naut ibatmot , nǝmarigw epit vi mǝhat mai nǝmav epitau . Dereh naut tisa . Nab̃iltius dereh teus . ’ Mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃eris nǝsa tovisi len nǝmav , ale vǝha-sua ŋai mǝtolǝboii ke naut tivoi o tisa , be mǝtodǝdas mǝtb̃eris lǝboi namilen nǝsa tovisi len nǝboŋ gail ta damǝŋai . Mitimabe ?
40016004	Gamit naur ta damǝŋai mǝtusa , mǝtsǝdaŋ len aGot sum̃an apǝhaṽut tohusur aulum̃an tiltile , sǝdaŋ len asoan . Mǝtous namerikel , avil asike nugol namerikel ideh , be dereh nigol ŋai namerikel hǝn nasuhunian sihai kelkel ur , aJonah . ” Ale aYesu eriŋ galito , ivan dan galito .
40016005	Nǝboŋ ahai susur gail lotogam tukot vǝbar nǝtarhǝt nab̃iltiwai , nǝlolit iboŋboŋ hǝn lǝb̃esǝŋon nabǝta ideh van .
40016006	Ale aYesu ikel mai galito ke , “ Mǝtelǝlǝgau hǝn gamit gabag ! Mǝtekǝtkǝta gol gamito dan nayis hiFarisi mai Sattiusi gail . ”
40016007	Lusor mai galit gabag ke , “ Ekǝmaienan husur datsǝlav nabǝta ideh gǝmai . ”
40016008	AYesu elǝboi nǝnauan salito ŋa ike , “ Gamit mǝttokad natuhdǝlomian ŋai , mǝtuhol husur nabǝta mǝtsǝkade hǝn nǝsa ?
40016009	Mǝtsalǝboi sal a ? Nǝlomit iboŋboŋ hǝn natuhbǝta torim hilat lotovi 5000 mai nǝhad gail p̃isi mǝttosǝŋoni a ?
40016010	Nǝlomit iboŋboŋ hǝn natuhbǝta tomǝlevru hilat lotovi 4000 mai nǝhad gail p̃isi mǝttosǝŋoni a ?
40016011	Imabe ? Mǝtunau sal ke nusor husur nabǝta m̃au a ? Aoa ! Be nukel mai gamit tǝtas ke , kǝtkǝta gol gamito dan nayis hiFarisi mai Sattiusi gail ! ”
40016012	Beti len namityal enan ŋai lunau sǝhoti ke nǝboŋ tokel nalǝlǝgauan mai galito , gai sasor husur nayis len nabǝta . Ao isor tas nap̃usanan siFarisi mai Sattiusi gail .
40016013	AYesu eriŋ naut enan ale nǝboŋ tobar naut a Sisarea Filippi , eus ahai susur san gail ke , “ Nǝvanuan gail lotosor husur aNatun Nǝvanuan , luke tovi ase ? ”
40016014	Lusor vari ke , “ Galevis luke aJon Baptais . Galevis luke aElijah . Galevis am luke aJeremiah o ahai kelkel ur sual am . ”
40016015	Beti eus galit ke , “ Be gamito , mǝtunau ke ginau ase ? ”
