40016016	ASimon Pita isor vari ke , “ Gaiug boh aKristo , aNatun aGot nǝkadun nǝmauran . ”
40016017	Ale aYesu ikel maii ke , “ Tivoi hǝn gaiug , aSimon anatun aJonah ! Savi avan ideh len navile a pan tokel vǝhot natenan , be aTǝmagw len nǝmav ikel vǝhoti mai gaiug .
40016018	Nukele am mai gaiug ke govi aPita , nǝvat , ale dereh neum hǝn naim sagw len nǝvat enan , naim sagw tovi vanuan sagw gail . Ale nǝdaŋan hǝn nǝmatan edǝdas b̃esǝhor galito .
40016019	Nukele am mai gaiug ke , dereh neviol hǝn naki hǝn nabopita hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav mai gaiug . Natideh gǝb̃ikai tasi len navile a pan , evi nǝsa aGot tokai tasi tia len nǝmav . Ale natideh gǝb̃idam̃ hǝni len navile a pan , evi nǝsa aGot todam̃ hǝni tia len nǝmav . ”
40016020	Beti aYesu ikel p̃uli hǝn ahai susur gail ke salikel avan ideh ke gai tovi aKristo , aGot totabtabuh lan .
40016021	Len nǝboŋ enan van , aYesu etub̃at kele ip̃arp̃ar mai ahai susur san gail ke timasvi Jerusalem ale timaslǝŋon tisa vǝsa len naṽide tosob̃ur len navǝlan alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail , ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo . Ale dereh ligol timat . Beti len nǝmariboŋ b̃itor dereh aGot tigol tile mǝhat .
40016022	Beti aPita eliv aYesu vi tarhǝte , etub̃at sor lan , ike , “ Satimaiean , Nasub̃ ! Natgalenan salevisi hǝn gaiug ! ”
40016023	Be ipair van hǝn aPita , ike , “ Gevi tahw dan ginau aSetan ! Gugol risi hǝn nǝb̃ipes hab̃etw hǝn nǝb̃iteh . Nǝnauan sam̃ gail lǝsǝpat len nǝsa aGot tolǝŋoni , lohusur nalǝŋonian sinǝvanuan ŋai . ”
40016024	Beti aYesu ikel mai ahai susur san gail ke , “ Avan ideh b̃ike b̃ehusur ginau , timaske , ‘ Aoa , ’ hǝn nǝnauan mai nalǝŋonian san gabag , timasvus nǝhai balbal san , tehusur ginau .
40016025	Husur avan ideh b̃ike b̃iwol hǝn nǝmauran san gabag hǝn b̃etǝgau gat nǝmauran san , dereh timasig . Be nǝmauran san b̃imasig m̃os ginau , dereh tikad nǝmauran vi sutuai .
40016026	Nǝvanuan b̃ikad natit p̃isi len navile a pan , be nǝmauran san vi sutuai b̃imasig , imabe ? Ikad nǝsa ? Nǝvanuan elǝboi b̃eviol hǝn nǝsa hǝn b̃ikad nǝmauran enan a ?
40016027	Bathut aNatun Nǝvanuan dereh tegǝm ta bog . Dereh tegǝm mai aŋel san gail len nǝdaŋan mai namǝnas seTǝman . Len nǝboŋ enan , dereh tilav nap̃urp̃uran mai nǝvanuan gail hǝn natit p̃isi lotogole , tinor hǝn nǝsa lotogole .
40016028	Nokitin mai gamit ke , gamit galevis mǝttoil gegai , asike lumat van vǝbar lǝb̃eris nagǝmaian siNatun Nǝvanuan hǝn b̃eil a m̃o hum aKiŋ . ”
40017001	Len nǝmariboŋ tomǝlevtes husur nǝboŋ enan , aYesu esǝhar aPita , mai alarmiṽan , aJemes mai aJon . Esǝhar galit sǝb̃olito vi mǝhat len naṽehuh sua tosahsah .
40017002	Ale len nǝholito egǝm tile , nǝhon em̃ial hum namityal , nahurabat san egǝm pǝhapǝhw buni vabilbil .
40017003	Vǝha-sua ŋai loris aMoses mai aElijah artohol mai aYesu .
40017004	APita isor mai aYesu , ike , “ Ivoi hǝn dattotoh gegai . Gǝb̃elǝŋoni , dereh neum hǝn nǝpasvalǝval titor , tesua esam̃ , tesua siMoses , mai tesua siElijah . ”
40017005	Nǝboŋ aPita tosor sal , nǝmavukasw tom̃ial habat ikabut gol galito , ale nadoldol sua len nǝmavukasw ike , “ Ategai evi aNatugw ulum̃an notolǝmas buni , notohǝhaṽur hǝni . Sǝsǝloŋ husuri ! ”
40017006	Nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan , ahai susur gail luteh , kǝta vi pan , nǝlolit epil vǝsa .
40017007	AYesu egǝm hǝn galito , ibar galito , ike , “ Mitile mǝhat . Samtemǝtahw . ”
40017008	Ale nǝboŋ lotokǝta vi mǝhat , lokǝta ris aYesu sǝb̃on ŋai , lǝsaris avan ideh am .
40017009	Nǝboŋ lotomariŋ vi pan len naṽehuh , aYesu ikele hǝn galit ke , “ Samtikel ur nǝsa mǝttorisi mai avan ideh am vir aGot b̃igol aNatun Nǝvanuan b̃ile mǝhat dan nǝmatan . ”
40017010	Beti ahai susur gail lousi ke , “ Ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo luke aElijah timasgǝm a m̃o , be lukele hǝn nǝsa ? ”
40017011	AYesu isor var galit ke , “ Evoi , tarhǝt sua , aElijah dereh tegǝm a m̃o hǝn b̃igol tǝlmam hǝn natit p̃isi lǝb̃inor .
40017012	Be len nǝtarhǝte am , nukele mai gamit ke , aElijah egǝm tia , ale nǝvanuan gail lǝsakǝta lǝboii , lugol nǝsa lotolǝŋoni hǝni . Imagenan , dereh ligol aNatun Nǝvanuan am telǝŋon tisa vǝsa . ”
40017013	Len namityal enan ŋai ahai susur gail lunau sǝhoti ke aYesu isor mai galito husur aJon Baptais .
40017014	Nǝboŋ lototǝlmam dan naṽehuh tonoŋ , logǝm hǝn naluṽoh , ale aulum̃an sua egǝm hǝn aYesu , etǝŋedur bathurien ,
40017015	ale ike , “ Nasub̃ , gilolosa hǝn anatugw ulum̃an husur nahumatmat ibari gol ke elǝŋon isa vǝsa batbat . Husur iteh len nǝhab tabtab ale iteh vǝha-sob̃sob̃ur len nǝwai am .
40017016	Nosǝhari van hǝn ahai susur sam̃ gail avil lodǝdas lǝb̃igol b̃imaur . ”
40017017	AYesu isor vari ke , “ Eee naur egai mǝttomǝtahun nadǝlomian , mǝttohusur nap̃isal tosa tokab̃kab̃ur , nitoh mai gamit tebǝlav mabe ? Mǝtupar dǝlomian van van van nupetǝmas hǝni . Sǝhar natǝtai gǝmai ! ”
40017018	Beti aYesu esivoh len natǝmat ale imakuv dan natǝtai , ale len namityal enan van imaur buni .
40017019	Ale ahai susur gail logǝm hǝn aYesu , lusor sǝb̃olit maii ke , “ Imabe ginamit namtsalǝboi namtb̃ehut natǝmat enan ? ”
40017020	Ale ikel mai galit ke , “ Mǝtodǝdasi bathut nadǝlomian samit em̃idol , ekǝkereh masuṽ . Husur nokitin mai gamit ke , mǝtb̃ikad nadǝlomian hun namisurhumastat tomarisoris mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃ikel mai naṽehuh egai ke , ‘ Gerus van ea ! ’ ale dereh terus . Naut kǝmas mǝtunau ke mǝtodǝdas mǝtb̃igol natesua , dereh mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃igole . ”
40017022	Nǝboŋ ahai susur gail lotob̃onb̃on len naut a Kalili , aYesu isor mai galit ke , “ Avan sua dereh teriŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan len navǝlan nǝvanuan gail .
40017023	Dereh ligol timat , ale len nǝmariboŋ titor aGot tigol tile mǝhat . ” Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan tonoŋ , ahai susur gail lolǝŋon isa masuṽ .
40017024	Nǝboŋ aYesu mai ahai susur san gail lotobar naut a Kapernaum , alat lototariv tuan nǝtaks tovi nǝtrahma toru , logǝm hǝn aPita luke , “ Ahai p̃usan sam̃ , eṽur nǝtaks hǝn naim siGot m̃au a ? ”
40017025	APita ike , “ Evoi . ” Ale nǝboŋ tob̃is lohoim , aSimon sakel natideh be aYesu isor a m̃o maii ike , “ Simon , len nǝnauan sam̃ nǝsa inor ? Nau nakiŋ gail len navile a pan . Ase eṽur nǝlaisens mai nǝtaks lototariv tuani , anatulit gail o nametb̃os gail a ? ”
40017026	Ale aPita ikel maii ke , “ Nametb̃os gail . ” Beti aYesu ike , “ B̃imaienan , savi len anatulit gail hǝn lǝb̃eṽuri .
40017027	Be hǝn asike nǝlolit b̃ipaŋpaŋ , givan hǝn nab̃iltiwai , bar hǝn nǝhau . Naieh metǝkav gǝb̃isah hǝni , sǝŋav hǝn nabuŋon ale dereh gisab̃ nakoin tovi nǝstater .
40018001	Len namityal enan ahai susur gail logǝm hǝn aYesu lousi ke , “ Ase iyalyal sehor galit am len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav ? ”
40018002	Ale aYesu ekis natuhtǝtai sua gǝmai , igol eil rivuh len galito .
40018003	Beti ike , “ Nokitin , nukel mai gamit ke , asike mǝtb̃ipair dan naṽide tosa samito hǝn mǝtb̃esum̃an atuhlahutai , mitimabe ? Asike asike mǝtob̃is len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav .
40018004	Imagenan , avan ideh b̃eriŋ gai hum tovi ut kǝmas sum̃an natuhtǝtai egai , gai iyalyal sǝhor galit am len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav .
40018005	Ale avan ideh tohǝhaṽur hǝn natuhtǝtai sum̃an egai b̃itah maii len nahǝsagw , gai ehǝhaṽur hǝn ginau nǝb̃itah maii .
40018006	“ Ale avan ideh b̃igol atuhlahutai sua , tokad nadǝlomian len ginau , b̃iteh len nǝsaan , nǝpanismen sitenan dereh tisa am sǝhor ke nǝvanuan galevis lǝb̃itahǝtah hǝn nab̃iltivat len naholoan , ale lǝb̃ibar hǝni len tas hǝn b̃imaduŋduŋ butitas tosareh vi pan .
40018007	Navile a pan dereh tisa vǝsa bathut natit gail lotogol nǝvanuan gail lotogol nǝsaan . Natgalenan lotomaienan dereh limasvisi be tisa vǝsa tibatbat hǝn nǝvanuan togol natgalen lǝb̃evisi .
40018008	Ale , navǝlam̃ o nariem̃ b̃igol gaiug gǝb̃igol nǝsaan , gita kotovi , bar hǝni vi tut . Gǝb̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai be nariem̃ b̃isa gol gǝsǝyar o gugau , natenan esǝhor gǝb̃ikad nariem̃ gǝlar p̃isi arb̃ivoi ale aGot b̃ibar hǝn gaiug len nǝhab topaŋ vi sutuai .
40018009	Namǝtam̃ b̃igol gǝb̃iteh len nǝsaan , kis kuvi , bar hǝni vi tut . Gǝb̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai be namǝtam̃ b̃esua b̃ib̃esw , natenan esǝhor gǝb̃ikad namǝtam̃ gǝlar p̃isi arb̃ivoi ale aGot b̃ibar hǝn gaiug len nǝhab nǝmatan .
40018010	“ Mǝtelǝlǝgau hǝn gamito ! Atuhlahutai ideh tokad nadǝlomian len ginau , samtinau ke gai evi naut kǝmas . Husur nukele mai gamit ke , aŋel gail lotokǝtkǝta tǝban galito , lolǝboi tabtab hǝn lǝb̃isor m̃os galito len nǝhon aTǝmagw len nǝmav .
40018012	“ Mitinau natsua . Avan ideh b̃ikad nasipsip lotovi 100 , ale sua iyar lab vi tut sua , mǝtunau ke tigol nǝsa ? Dereh atenan teriŋ lotovi 99 lesuh len naṽehuh hǝn b̃ia doŋ tosua toyar lab vi tut .
40018013	Ale b̃isab̃i , nukel nakitinan mai gamito ke , ikemkem tǝban sǝhor lotovi 99 lǝsǝyar lab vi tut .
40018014	Imagenan , savi nalǝŋonian seTǝmamito len nǝmav hǝn atuhlahutai galegai ideh b̃imasig . ”
40018015	AYesu isor am ke , “ Nǝbathudud ideh len nadǝlomian b̃igol nǝsaan hǝn gaiug , gia sor mai gai sǝb̃on , kel p̃arp̃ar hǝn nǝsa tosa gai togole maii . Gai b̃esǝsǝloŋ sǝhot nǝsa gotokele , gukad tǝlmam hǝni sum̃an na-ke-wawa-an len nadǝlomian .
40018016	Be asike b̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝn gaiug , gesǝhar nǝvanuan nadǝlomian tesua o teru am hǝn gǝb̃ehusur natosian siGot toke , ‘ Nǝboŋ avan ideh b̃ikel uri ke nǝvanuan togon togol nǝsaan , nakitinan hǝn nǝsa tokele timasil p̃arp̃ar len na-kel-koti-an sinǝvanuan toru o totor am . ’
40018017	Be asike b̃esǝsǝloŋ husur galito , kel ur natit p̃isi mai nab̃onb̃onan kavkav silat lotokad nadǝlomian len naut enan . Asike b̃esǝsǝloŋ husur alat lotokad nadǝlomian am , len nǝnauan sam̃ riŋi tesum̃an nametb̃os sǝkad nadǝlomian o nǝvanuan nǝtaks .
40018018	“ Nukel nakitinan mai gamito ke , natideh gǝb̃ikai tasi len navile a pan tevi nǝsa aGot tokai tasi tia len nǝmav , ale natideh gǝb̃idam̃ hǝni len navile a pan tevi nǝsa aGot todam̃ hǝni tia len nǝmav .
40018019	Nukel tǝtas hǝn nakitinan mai gamit ke , gamit b̃eru arb̃ikad nǝnauan b̃esua husur natideh len navile a pan , nǝsa arb̃eusi , aTǝmagw len nǝmav dereh tigole m̃os gǝlaru .
40018020	Husur toru o totor lotob̃on len nahǝsagw , ginau nutah mai galit ei . ”
40018021	Beti aPita egǝm hǝn aYesu eusi ke , “ Nǝbathudud nadǝlomian sua b̃igol nǝsaan tabtab hǝn ginau , nerub̃at nǝsaan san vǝha-vis ? Nerub̃at gail vǝha-mǝlevru a ? ”
40018022	AYesu isor vari ke , “ Ao , nǝsakel ke vǝha-mǝlevru , avil nuke gerub̃at gail sǝŋavur vǝha-mǝlevru vǝha-mǝlevru .
40018023	Imaienan , natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai : Ikad nakiŋ sua toke naslev san gail lisar gel nǝkabut salit maii .
40018024	Nǝboŋ totub̃at us nǝkabut salito , losǝhar avan sua van hǝni tokabut hǝn nǝtalent tovi 10,000 , ale nǝtalent esua ŋai evi nap̃urp̃uran hǝn nauman hǝn nasihau tovi 15 .
40018025	Husur atenan todǝdas b̃isar gel nǝkabut enan , amasta san ikele hǝni ke tep̃ur hǝn asoan mai anatun gail hǝn lǝb̃egǝm vi slev gail ale tep̃ur hǝn natit p̃isi am gai tokade , hǝn b̃isar gel nǝkabut san .
40018026	Ŋa naslev iteh bathurien , eŋiri ke , ‘ Sagesigarir hǝn ginau , ale dereh nisar gel tǝlmam hǝn natit p̃isi mai gaiug . ’
40018027	Nǝlon amasta itaŋis naslev san enan , ikas kuv nǝkabut san , eriŋi hǝn b̃ivan .
40018028	“ Beti naslev enan evivile , etut len naslev togon tovi galit sua ŋai tokabut san hǝn nǝvat , natenarius tovi 100 .
40018029	Ale naslev togon iteh bathurien eŋiri ke , ‘ Sagesigarir hǝn ginau , ale dereh nisar gel tǝlmam hǝni mai gaiug . ’
40018030	Be naslev ta m̃o emǝtahuni . Ivan , gole hǝn lǝb̃itah gat togon , riŋi len naim bǝbaŋis vir b̃isar gel p̃is nǝkabut san .
40018031	Nǝboŋ naslev galen am lotoris nǝsa tovisi , lulolosa masuṽ , ale lua kel ur natit p̃isi lotovisi mai amasta salito .
40018032	Ale amasta ekis naslev ta m̃o gǝmai , ikel maii ke , ‘ Govi slev gotosa vǝsa batbat ! Ginau nukas kuv nǝkabut sam̃ p̃isi husur goŋir ginau hǝni .
40018033	Ivoi am gǝtalolosa hǝn naslev togon sum̃an ginau notololosa hǝn gaiug . ’
40018034	Ale len nǝlol paŋpaŋ san , amasta eriŋi len navǝlan alat lotokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn naim bǝbaŋis hǝn lǝb̃igol niben atenan b̃epǝŋas vir b̃isar gel natit p̃isi gai tokabut hǝni .
40018035	Len naṽide tomagenan , len nǝlomito asike mǝtb̃erub̃at kitin hǝn nǝsaan sinǝbathudud nadǝlomian ideh lotogol tosa hǝn gamito , aTǝmagw len nǝmav dereh tigol timaienan hǝn gamito . ”
40019001	Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan tonoŋ , eriŋ naut a Kalili , evi Jutea len naut tarhǝwisel Jortan .
40019002	Nab̃iltiluṽoh gail lohusuri , ale igol galit lumaur ei .
40019003	Beti naFarisi galevis logǝm hǝn aYesu , lolǝŋon ke tekǝkos len nasoruan san , mǝdas nahǝsan ale lousi ke , “ Inor hǝn aulum̃an b̃etiṽos hǝn asoan , riŋ gab̃ulani husur nǝnauan o nalǝŋonian sitenan ŋai a ?
40019004	Ris aYesu tosor var galit ke , “ Mǝtsaṽuruŋ natosian siGot toke ‘ sutuai len natub̃atan aGot igol naulum̃an mai napǝhaṽut a ? ’
40019005	Ale aGot ike , ‘ Bathut natenan , naulum̃an dereh teriŋ atǝman mai anan hǝn b̃eudud mai asoan , ale aresua sum̃an artovi niben tosua ŋai . ’
40019006	Husur arsaru am , arosua ŋai . Imagenan , naududan aGot togole , nǝvanuan satepǝpehuni . ”
40019007	Ale lousi ke , “ B̃imagenan , aMoses ikel nalo toke , ‘ Naulum̃an tilav nalob̃ulat hǝn natiṽosan mai asoan ale tesǝvati van , ’ ikele husur nǝsa ? ”
40019008	AYesu ikel mai galit ke , “ AMoses idam̃ hǝni ke mǝttotiṽos hǝn asoamito husur nǝkadumit ihaihai masuṽ , avil sutuai len natub̃atan , sǝmaienan .
40019009	Be nukel mai gamito ke naulum̃an ideh totiṽos hǝn asoan naut kǝmas alitenan sagol naitian tosa , ale tolah mai napǝhaṽut ideh am , atenan igol naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan . ”
40019010	Ahai susur san gail lukel maii ke , “ Nǝlahan naulum̃an tokade mai asoan b̃imaienan , nǝlahan tob̃uer ivoi am . ”
40019011	Ris aYesu tosor var galit ke , “ Savi nǝvanuan p̃isi lolǝboi lǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ sǝhot nap̃usanan enan , be aGot ilav nǝdaŋan mai galevis ŋai hǝn lǝb̃elǝboi lǝb̃igole .
40019012	Husur sogsog galevis lovi sogsog nǝboŋ analit lotopas galito , be sogsog galevis am , nǝvanuan gail lugol lotovi sogsog . Ale ikad galevis tile am lǝsǝlah m̃os natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav gol ke len nǝmauran salito losum̃an sogsog gail . Avan ideh tolǝboi b̃esǝsǝloŋ sǝhot natenan , tesǝsǝloŋ sǝhoti ! ”
40019013	Beti nǝvanuan galevis losǝhar atuhlahutai van hǝn aYesu hǝn b̃eriŋ navǝlan gǝlaru len galito ale sor tuṽ . Avil ahai susur gail losivoh len galito .
40019014	Be aYesu ike , “ Mitidam̃ hǝn alahutai lǝb̃egǝm hǝn ginau ; samteil gol galito ! Husur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav evi silat lotosum̃an alategai . ”
40019015	Ale nǝboŋ aYesu toriŋ navǝlan gǝlaru len galito tonoŋ , eriŋ naut enan , ivan .
40019016	Len nǝboŋ sua , aulum̃an sua egǝm hǝn aYesu eusi ke , “ Hai p̃usan , nigol natit tovoi sa hǝn nǝb̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai ? ”
40019017	AYesu isor vari ke , “ Imabe gotous ginau husur natit tovoi ? Ikad Atesua ŋai tovoi . Be gǝb̃ike gǝb̃evi lan nǝmauran vi sutuai , gigol nǝsa nakelean todaŋ gail siGot tokele . ”
40019018	Ike , “ Nakelean todaŋ gail ta be ? ” Ale aYesu ike , “ Sagigol avan ideh timat ,
40019019	geputsan atǝmam̃ mai anam̃ len nǝnauan sam̃ , ale lǝmas bun nǝvanuan totoh pǝpadaŋ hǝn gaiug sum̃an gotolǝmas bun gaiug gabag . ”
40019020	Nǝmantuhmar ikel maii ke , “ Nugol natgalen p̃isi tia . Nǝsa ipat sal hǝn nǝb̃igole ? ”
40019021	AYesu ikel maii ke , “ Gǝb̃ike gǝb̃inor kavkav len nǝhon aGot , gia p̃ur hǝn natit p̃isi sam̃ , ale viol hǝn nǝvat han mai namǝsal gail . Ale dereh gikad nakonviolan aGot totǝgau gati m̃os gaiug len nǝmav . Beti gegǝm husur ginau . ”
40019022	Nǝboŋ nǝmantuhmar tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan , ivan , elǝŋon isa habat husur epul hǝn natite , ikad nasugsugur isob̃ur .
40019023	Ale aYesu isor mai ahai susur san gail , ike , “ Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke , idaŋ habat hǝn avan ideh topul hǝn natite b̃eb̃is len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav . ”
40019024	Ikele am ke , “ Idaŋ habat hǝn nǝkamel b̃eb̃is tur len nab̃urhunil sǝsod . Idaŋ sǝhori am hǝn nǝvanuan topul hǝn natite b̃eb̃is len natohan pipihabǝlan aGot . ”
40019025	Nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni , ahai susur gail lup̃aŋ habat , luke , “ B̃imaienan , as teb̃is lan ? Sǝkad avan ideh b̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai ! ”
40019026	Beti aYesu ekǝta bunus galito ike , “ Len nǝvanuan gail , galit lodǝdas lǝb̃igol natenan , avil aGot elǝboi b̃igol natit p̃isi . ”
40019027	Ale aPita isor vari ke , “ Geris , ginamit namtoriŋ natit p̃isi hǝn namttohusur gaiug . Dereh tikad nǝsa sinamito ? ”
40019028	Beti aYesu ikel mai galit ke , “ Nukel nakitinan mai gamito ke , len nǝboŋ navile a pan b̃iveveu , nǝboŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan b̃ebǝtah len nab̃iltihai bǝtbǝtah san toyalyal hum akiŋ , gamit am mǝttohusur ginau , dereh mǝtebǝtah len nab̃iltihai bǝtbǝtah gail lotovi 12 hǝn mǝtb̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan len nahǝmar lotovi 12 seIsrael .
40019029	Ale avan ideh toriŋ naim gail o aṽan gail o aṽavinen gail o atǝman o anan o anatun gail o nǝtan m̃os nahǝsagw , dereh aGot teviol hǝn vǝha-100 maii , ale aGot teviol am hǝn nǝmauran vi sutuai maii .
40019030	Ale nab̃iltivanuan isob̃ur gagai , asike lovi natideh ; ale isob̃ur lǝsavi natideh gagai , dereh legǝm vi b̃iltivanuan . ”
40020001	AYesu ep̃usan am ke , “ Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai : Ikad amahean nǝtan tovivile dudulan som̃ilan hǝn b̃idas lalum̃an m̃os nauman hǝn nǝhol nakrep san .
40020002	Lous nǝvat ale idam̃ hǝn b̃eṽur galit hǝn natenarius hǝn nǝmariboŋ tesua .
40020003	Len namityal tomǝlapat dudulan evivile tǝtas , ale eris alalum̃an lotoil kǝmas len nǝmaket .
40020004	Ale ikel mai galit ke , ‘ Gamito am , mitivan vaum len nǝhol nakrep sagw , ale dereh neṽur gamito tinor . ’
40020005	Ale luvan . Len natub̃lial mai len namityal totor ut mǝdau , len naṽide tomaienan , amahean idas lalum̃an tǝtas .
40020006	Len namityal torim ut mǝdau , evivile , eris galevis am lotoil ei , ale ikel mai galit ke , ‘ Imabe mǝtoil kǝmas gegai len nǝmariboŋ kavkav ? ’
40020007	Ris lotoke , ‘ Ao , avan ideh saus ginamit hǝn namtb̃eum . ’ Ŋa ikel mai galit ke , ‘ Gamit am mǝtevi lan nǝhol nakrep sagw . ’
40020008	“ Nǝboŋ naut togomgom ut mǝdau , amahean nǝhol ikel mai ab̃iltivanuan nauman san ke , ‘ Kis alalum̃an nauman gǝmai ale ṽur galito , tub̃at len alat lotoyar a tahw van vǝbar alat lotoil a m̃o . ’
40020009	Ale nǝboŋ alat lototub̃at len namityal torim ut mǝdau lotogǝmai , eṽur galit ṽisusua hǝn natenarius tosua .
40020010	Ale nǝboŋ tobar alat lotoil a m̃o , lunau ke lǝb̃ikad nǝvat b̃esǝhor galit lotogǝm a tahw . Be eṽur galit ṽisusua hǝn natenarius tosua ŋai .
40020011	Nǝboŋ lotolav natenarius tosua , lukoblen mai amahean nǝtan husur lǝsahǝhaṽur hǝn nǝvat ,
40020012	luke , ‘ Alategai lotomadhagǝmai , loum husur nǝhaua tosua ŋai , be gaiug , goṽur galito p̃itoṽ hǝn ginamito . Be ginamito , namttodaŋ b̃ur nab̃iltiuman mai nǝyal tosun ginamito husur nǝmariboŋ kavkav ! ’
40020013	Ris tosor var galit sua ke , ‘ Ginau nǝsamǝdas gaiug . Gaiug gudam̃ mai ginau hǝn natenarius tosua hǝn nauman . Ale gagai gumabe ?
40020014	Lav nǝvat tovi esam̃ , givan . Nuke neviol mai ategai toyar a tahw , hum notoviol mai gaiug .
40020015	Gunau ke sanor hǝn nǝb̃igol nǝsa notolǝŋoni hǝn natit sagw gail a ? Nǝlom̃ itab̃ulol bulos ginau husur noviol habat a ? ’ ”
40020016	AYesu imaris kotovi ke , “ Imagenan , alat lǝsavi natideh gagai , dereh legǝm vi b̃iltivanuan , leil a m̃o ; ale alat lototibau , lotoil a m̃o , dereh asike lovi natideh . ”
40020017	Husur nǝboŋ enan , aYesu evi mǝhat vi Jerusalem . Len nǝyaran san van , esǝhar ahai susur lotovi 12 hǝn b̃isor mai galit sǝb̃olito , ikel mai galit ke ,
40020018	“ Mǝtesǝsǝloŋ ! Datevi mǝhat vi Jerusalem . Ale dereh leriŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan len navǝlan ab̃iltihai tutumav mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo . Ale len nakotan salito dereh lisab̃ sǝhoti ke tipanis , timat .
40020019	Dereh leriŋi len navǝlan alat lǝsavi Ju hǝn lǝb̃isor vilesi , bilas habat hǝni , ale p̃os gati len nǝhai balbal . Be len nǝmariboŋ titor dereh aGot tigol tile mǝhat . ”
40020020	Beti anana sinatun aSepeti gail esǝhar anatun ulum̃an gǝlaru gǝm hǝn aYesu , etǝŋedur bathurien hǝn b̃eus natsua hǝni .
40020021	AYesu eusi ke , “ Golǝŋon nǝsa ? ” Isor vari ke , “ Nuke gikel gati ke nǝboŋ gǝb̃evi Kiŋ , alarmiṽan egai sagw arebǝtah tǝban gaiug , sua len nǝmatu , sua len nǝmair . ”
40020022	AYesu ekǝta ris gǝlaru ike , “ Mǝrsalǝboi nǝsa mǝrtousi . Mǝrolǝboi mǝrb̃emun len nab̃iliwai hǝn na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an ginau nǝb̃emun lan a ? ” Arukel maii ke , “ Namrolǝboi namrb̃igole . ”
40020023	Ale ikel mai gǝlaru ke , “ Dereh mǝremun len nab̃iliwai hǝn na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an sagw . Avil nabǝtahan len nǝmatu o nǝmair sagw , sǝpat len ginau hǝn nǝb̃idam̃ hǝni . Ipat len aTǝmagw hǝn b̃idam̃ hǝn ase arb̃ebǝtah ei , husur gai eutaut hǝn naut eru m̃os gǝlaru . ”
40020024	Nǝboŋ ahai susur tosǝŋavur am lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natgalenan , nǝlolit epǝŋas alarmiṽan .
40020025	Be aYesu ekis galit p̃isi gǝmai , ike , “ Mǝtolǝboii ke nǝgavna hǝn nametb̃os gail lupatpat galit mǝhat len nǝdaŋan lotokade tǝban nǝvanuan salit gail , ale len nǝdaŋan hǝn na-il-a-m̃o-an , nǝvanuan totibau salito loil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan salit gail .
40020026	Samtimagenan ! Be gamit ideh toke tevi vanuan totibau , gai timasgǝm vi vanuan na-vi-tarhǝte-an samito , nǝlon tomǝdau hum tovi ut kǝmas ŋai .
40020027	Ale gamit ideh toke teil a m̃o hǝn gamito , gai tegǝm vi slev samit m̃au .
40020028	Tesum̃an ŋai aNatun Nǝvanuan . Gai sagǝm hǝn nǝvanuan gail hǝn lǝb̃evi tarhǝt san hum galit lotovi ut kǝmas . Ao , egǝm hǝn b̃evi tarhǝt salito hum gai tovi ut kǝmas ; egǝm hǝn b̃evi na-p̃ur-kuvi-an m̃os navivilean hǝn nǝvanuan tosob̃ur dan nǝpanismen sil nǝsaan salito . ”
40020029	Len nǝyaran siYesu galito , luyar tur len naut a Jeriko . Ale nǝboŋ lotoriŋ naut enan , nab̃iltiluṽoh lohusur aYesu .
40020030	Ikad nametb̃esw eru artobǝtah len nǝgarhǝp̃isal , ale nǝboŋ artosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke aYesu toṽot van , arukai ke , “ Nasub̃ , aNatun siTevit , gilolosa hǝn ginamǝru ! ”
40020031	Naluṽoh losivoh len gǝlaru hǝn naut b̃eb̃ut hǝn gǝlaru . Be lukai habat am ke , “ Nasub̃ , aNatun siTevit , gilolosa hǝn ginamǝru ! ”
40020032	Ale aYesu eil , ikai van hǝn gǝlaru ke , “ Mǝrolǝŋon ke nigol nǝsa hǝn gamǝru ? ”
40020033	Arusor vari ke , “ Nasub̃ , namrolǝŋon nakǝtaan ! ”
40020034	Ale nǝlon aYesu itaŋis gǝlaru , ibar namǝtalaru . Vǝha-sua ŋai arokǝta tǝtas , beti arohusuri .
40021001	Nǝboŋ lotogǝm pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut a Jerusalem , lubar navile a Petfas tarhǝṽehuh Oliv . Beti aYesu esǝvat ahai susur eru van .
40021002	Ikel mai gǝlaru ke , “ Mǝrevi lan navile ea , ale vǝha-sua ŋai dereh mǝreris natoŋki sua lotobaŋisi ei mai natuhtoŋki ulum̃an san . Sah rub̃at gǝlaru , sehar gǝlar gǝmai .
40021003	Ale avan ideh b̃ikel natideh mai gamǝru , mirikele ŋai ke , ‘ Nasub̃ timaskad gǝlaru . ’ Ale vǝha-sua ŋai dereh atenan tidam̃ hǝn gǝlaru . ”
40021004	Natenan evisi hǝn nasoruan sihai kelkel ur b̃isarpoh . Ike ,
40021005	“ Kel mai anatvavin aSion ‘ Geris ! AKiŋ sam̃ egǝm hǝn gaiug , nǝlon emǝdau , ebǝtah len natoŋki , natuhtoŋki ulum̃an tovi anatun natoŋki sua . ’ ”
40021006	Ŋa ahai susur eru aruvan , arugol ŋai nǝsa aYesu tokel mai gǝlaru .
40021007	Arosǝhar natoŋki mai natuhtoŋki gǝmai , ale aroriŋ nahurabat naut susus gail len gǝlaru hǝn aYesu b̃ebǝtah len gail .
40021008	Nab̃iltiluṽoh luṽolsan nahurabat salit gail metp̃isal . Galevis am lutai nǝpashǝhai dan nǝhai gail , lobubulan gail husur nametp̃isal .
40021009	Alat lotoyar a m̃o hǝn aYesu mai alat lotohusuri lukai ke , “ Hosanna van hǝn aNatun ulum̃an siTevit ! Putsani ! AGot ivoi hǝn atenan togǝm len nahǝsan Nasub̃ ! Hosanna ! Sal suh aGot len nǝmav a mǝhat buni ! ”
40021010	Nǝboŋ aYesu tob̃is len naut a Jerusalem , navile kavkav luwal taṽtaṽor , lunau tuhatuh , luke , “ Ategai ase ? ”
40021011	Naluṽoh luke , “ Ahai kelkel ur bogai , aYesu ta Nasaret len naut a Kalili ! ”
40021012	Beti aYesu eb̃is len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot ale ehut alat lotop̃ur hǝn natit gail mai alat lotoṽur natit gail ei . Ikovsan natev gail silat lotogǝgel hǝn nǝvat mai nǝhai bǝtbǝtah silat lotop̃ur hǝn nǝtav gail .
40021013	Ale ikel mai galit ke , “ Natosian siGot ike , ‘ Naim sagw , dereh lekisi hǝn naim hǝn na-sor-tuṽ-an , ’
40021014	Nametb̃esw gail mai alat lotogau logǝm hǝni len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot , ale igol galit lumaur .
40021015	Ab̃iltihai tutumav mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo nǝlolit ipaŋpaŋ nǝboŋ lotoris natit gail aYesu togole nǝvanuan p̃isi lotomaŋmaŋ lan , mai nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn atuhlahutai lotokai len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot ke , “ Hosanna van hǝn aNatun ulum̃an siTevit ! Putsani ! ”
40021016	Ŋa lous aYesu ke , “ Gosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa alategai lotokele a ? ” Ale aYesu ikel mai galit ke , “ Evoi , be mǝtsaṽuruŋ natosian siGot boŋ ideh toke , ‘ Gaiug Got goutaut hǝn nǝ-sal-suhi-an m̃os gaiug gabag len nabuŋon atuhlahutai mai len nabuŋon atuhtǝtai gail lotosus sal a ? ’ ”
40021017	Beti eriŋ galito , evivile dan nab̃iltivile , evi Petani ale itoh ei len nalenmariug .
40021018	Dudulan som̃ilan , nǝboŋ aYesu totǝlmam vi lan nab̃iltivile , imalkǝkat .
40021019	Len nǝyaran san eris nǝhai nafik sua , ale ia das ṽite sob̃uer husur nǝhai ibaŋ lute ŋai . Ale aYesu isor lan , ike , “ Sagiṽan am vi sutuai ! ” Vǝha-sua ŋai nǝhai nafik enan emǝlaŋ .
40021020	Nǝboŋ ahai susur gail lotoris natenan , lumaŋmaŋ . Luke , “ Nǝhai nafik egai emǝlaŋ tutut maiegai mabe ? ”
40021021	AYesu isor var galit ke , “ Nokitin mai gamit ke , mǝtb̃ikad nadǝlomian , nǝ-lon-uri-an b̃eb̃uer , nǝsa tovisi hǝn nǝhai nafik , dereh mitigole . Be savi natenan ŋai , mǝtelǝboi mǝtb̃ikel mai naṽehuh egai ke , ‘ Makuv , bar hǝn gaiug len tas , ’ ale dereh tevisi .
40021022	Ale mǝtb̃ikad nadǝlomian , natit p̃isi mǝtb̃eusi len na-sor-tuṽ-an , natideh mǝtb̃eusi , dereh mitikade . ”
40021023	AYesu ibar naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot , eb̃is lan , ale nǝboŋ top̃usan ei , ab̃iltihai tutumav mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail logǝm hǝni , lous taltal hǝni ke , “ Gugol natgalenan len nǝdaŋan na-il-a-m̃o-an ta be ? Len nǝdaŋan sise ? Ase ilav nǝdaŋan na-il-a-m̃o-an enan mai gaiug ? ”
40021024	AYesu isor var galit ke , “ Nuke neus nausian sua hǝn gamit bai . Mǝtb̃isor var nausian sagw , dereh nikel ur nǝdaŋan na-il-a-m̃o-an notogol natgalenan lan mai gamito .
40021025	Nausian imaiegai , ke , nǝkadhut na-il-a-m̃o-an aJon tokade hǝn tobaptais , egǝm len nǝmav o len nǝvanuan ? ” Lusor kitevi len galit gabag , luke , “ Datb̃ike , ‘ Egǝm len nǝmav , ’ dereh tike , ‘ Imabe mǝtsadǝlom aJon ? ’
40021026	Avil datb̃ike , ‘ Egǝm len nǝvanuan , ’ datomǝtahw len naluṽoh husur galit p̃isi lunau ke aJon evi ahai kelkel ur . ”
40021027	Ŋa lusor var aYesu ke , “ Namtsalǝboii . ” Ale ikel mai galit ke , “ B̃imaienan , ginau am , asike nukel mai gamito , nǝdaŋan na-il-a-m̃o-an notogol natgalenan lan . ”
40021028	AYesu isor am , ike , “ Mǝtunau ke nǝsa ? Naulum̃an sua ikad anatun ulum̃an eru , ale ivan hǝn gǝlar sua ike , ‘ Anatugw , damǝŋai gia um len nǝhol nakrep . ’
40021029	Anatun isor vari ke , ‘ Ao , nomǝtahuni . ’ Avil nǝboŋ namityal topair , egǝgel hǝn nǝnauan san , ivan .
40021030	Beti atata ivan hǝn anatun togon am ikel nasoruan top̃itoṽ hǝn tokele a m̃o tia . Ale anatun togon isor vari ke , ‘ Ale Nasub̃ , nivan bai . ’ Wake sǝvan .
40021031	Len gǝlaru , anatun ulum̃an ta be igol nǝsa atata sǝlaru tolǝŋoni ? ” Lusor var aYesu , luke , “ Anatun atata tosor maii a m̃o . ” Ale aYesu ikel mai galit ke , “ Nukel nakitinan mai gamito . Nǝvanuan nǝtaks gail mai alatpǝhaṽut lotop̃ur hǝn nibelito saltoyar a m̃o hǝn gamito vi lan natohan pipihabǝlan aGot .
40021032	Husur aJon egǝm hǝn gamito hǝn b̃eṽusan gamit hǝn nap̃isal hǝn nanoran , be mǝtsadǝlomi , avil nǝvanuan nǝtaks gail mai alatpǝhaṽut lotop̃ur hǝn nibelito , lodǝlomi . Naut kǝmas mǝtoris natenan , len namityal tohusuri , mǝtsagǝgel hǝn nǝnauan samito hǝn mǝtb̃edǝlom nǝsa tokele . ”
40021033	AYesu ike , “ Sǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝb̃ol p̃usan sual am . Ikad naulum̃an tokad nǝtan . Len naut enan imabul nakrep , eum hǝn nǝhol garu len nǝtan enan . Ehir nab̃ur hǝn b̃egǝm vi naut lotopal dasdas nakrep lan , ale eum hǝn naut na-kǝtkǝta-tǝban-an a mǝhat . Beti idam̃ hǝn nǝhol van hǝn alat lotokǝtkǝta tǝban nǝhol hǝn lǝb̃irentem , ale eriŋ naut enan len nǝyaran sua .
40021034	Nǝboŋ nakrep pǝpadaŋ hǝn b̃imen , amahean nǝhol esǝvat naslev san gail van hǝn alat lotorentem nǝhol hǝn lǝb̃epǝpehun naṽit nakrep galevis tovi esan .
40021035	Avil alat lotorentem nǝhol lutah gat naslev san gail . Luṽas esua , lugol esua imat ale lotuṽ sual am .
40021036	Ale amahean esǝvat naslev galevis am sǝhor ta m̃o , be alat lotorentem nǝhol lugol naṽide top̃itoṽ hum ta m̃o .
40021037	Len namǝkot esǝvat anatun ulum̃an van hǝn galito , isor mai gai gabag ke ‘ Dereh leputsan anatugw ulum̃an len nǝnauan salito , ligol nǝsa b̃ikele . ’
40021038	Be nǝboŋ alat lotorentem nǝhol lotoris anatun ulum̃an , lusor mai galit gabag ke , ‘ Atea , dereh tikad nǝhol egai nǝboŋ amahean nǝtan b̃imat . Gǝmai , datiparu buni hǝn datb̃ikad natit p̃isi b̃evi esan nǝboŋ atǝman b̃imat . ’
40021039	Ale lutah gati , bar hǝni vivile dan nǝhol nakrep ale paru buni .
40021040	Imaienan , nǝboŋ amahean nǝhol nakrep b̃egǝmai , dereh tigol nǝsa hǝn alatenan lotorentem nǝhol ? ”
40021041	Lusor var aYesu ke , “ Nǝvanuan galen lotosa , dereh tilav nǝmatan tosa vǝsa masuṽ mai galito . Beti tidam̃ hǝn nǝvanuan galevis am lǝb̃irentem nǝhol , lǝb̃ilav naṽit nakrep maii nǝboŋ lǝb̃imen . ”
40021042	AYesu ikel mai galit ke , “ Mǝtsaṽuruŋ nategai len natosian siGot a ? Ike , “ ‘ Nǝvat , nǝvanuan na-um-im-an gail lotomǝtahuni , gai egǝm vi vat sua ŋai b̃elǝboi b̃igol naim b̃ihav mai b̃inor . Ale evi Nasub̃ aGot togol nǝvat tomagenan ale nǝboŋ dattorisi , datumaŋmaŋ len nǝsa togole . ’
40021043	“ Bathut enan nukel mai gamit ke , dereh aGot tilav kuv natohan pipihabǝlan dan gamito , ale tilavi mai naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan tile lǝb̃igol naṽite tovi nalǝŋonian san .
40021044	Avan ideh b̃iteh len nǝvat enan , dereh timab̃urb̃ur , mai avan ideh , nǝvat b̃iteh lan , dereh tipat dole . ”
40021045	Nǝboŋ ab̃iltihai tutumav mai naFarisi gail lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝb̃ol galenan , lunau sǝhoti ke aYesu tosor husur galito .
40021046	Imagenan ludas p̃isal hǝn lǝb̃itah gati , be lomǝtahw len naluṽoh gail lotonau ke tovi ahai kelkel ur .
40022001	AYesu ib̃ol p̃usan tǝtas mai galit am , ike ,
40022002	“ Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai . Ikad nakiŋ sua toutaut hǝn nǝhanan hǝn nǝlahan sinatun ulum̃an .
40022003	Eus nǝvanuan isob̃ur hǝn lǝb̃egǝm hǝn nǝlahan enan . Ale nǝboŋ nǝhanian toutaut , esǝvat naslev san gail hǝn lǝb̃ekis nǝvanuan galenan gǝmai , be lomǝtahun lǝb̃egǝmai .
40022004	Esǝvat naslev galevis am , ike , ‘ Kel mai alat notous galit gǝmai ke numaul hǝn nǝhanian tia . Namtotibun nab̃uluk ulum̃an mai natuhb̃uluk tokǝnoh gail , ale natit p̃isi eutaut tia . Mǝtegǝm tutut hǝn nǝhanan nǝlahan ! ’
40022005	Avil alat akiŋ tous galit lǝb̃egǝmai , lǝsasǝsǝloŋ husuri , luvan . Galit sua evi lan nǝtan san , togon evi lan naim p̃urp̃ur san .
40022006	Galevis am lutah gat naslev san gail , lomǝdas bun galito vagol lumat .
40022007	Akiŋ nǝlon ipaŋpaŋ masuṽ . Esǝvat navǝshǝsoltia san hǝn lǝb̃iṽabun alatenan lotogol nǝmatan ale hǝn lǝb̃epǝŋas nab̃iltivile salito .
40022008	Ale ikel mai naslev san gail ke , ‘ Nǝhanan hǝn nǝlahan eutaut tia , be alat notous galit hǝn lǝb̃egǝmai lǝsǝbar nǝsa notolǝŋoni tonor len nǝhanan sagw , sanor hǝn lǝb̃egǝmai .
40022009	Imaienan , mitivan hǝn nametp̃isal pasil gail , ale nǝvanuan ideh mǝtb̃isab̃i , usi hǝn b̃egǝm vi lan nǝhanan nǝlahan . ’
40022010	Ale naslev galenan luvan husur nap̃isal gail . Lokis galit p̃isi lotosab̃ gail b̃onb̃on , naut kǝmas lotovoi o lotosa . Ale nǝhanan nǝlahan epul hǝn nǝvanuan .
40022011	Be nǝboŋ akiŋ tob̃is lohoim san hǝn b̃eris alat lotohan , eris aulum̃an sual ei sasun nahurabat nǝlahan .
40022012	Ale ikel maii ke , ‘ Eee Tegai , gaiug gǝsasun nahurabat nǝlahan , gogǝm lohoim gegai mabe ? ’ Ris naut tob̃ut hǝn atenan .
40022013	Beti akiŋ ikel mai nǝvanuan nauman san gail ke , ‘ Baŋis gat navǝlan gǝlaru mai narien gǝlaru , bar hǝni vivile len nǝmargobut ! Len naut enan dereh litaŋ , lides batriṽoriṽ . ’ ”
40022014	AYesu imaris kotov nasoruan san ike , “ Husur aGot ekis isob̃ur be ilekis hǝn evis ŋai . ”
40022015	Ale naFarisi gail luvan . Nǝboŋ lotovan tonoŋ , Lub̃onb̃on , lusor utaut hǝn lǝb̃igol aYesu b̃ekǝkos len nasoruan san .
40022016	Beti losǝvat ahai susur salit gail mai galevis len nǝpati tovi tarhǝt siHerot van hǝn aYesu .
40022017	Gikel natsua mai ginamit bai . Inor hǝn datb̃eṽur nǝtaks van hǝn aSisa m̃au a ? Gunau mab hǝni ? ”
40022018	Be aYesu elǝboi nagǝrasian tosa salito ale ike , “ Vanuan gǝgǝras gail ! Imabe mǝtous kitev ginau hum mǝtb̃igol ke nekǝkos ?
40022019	Ṽusan ginau hǝn natenarius hǝn nǝtaks . ” Ale lulav nakoin sua enan van hǝni .
40022020	Eus galit ke , “ Nǝhon mai nahǝsan ase arupat len nakoin egai ? ”
40022021	Lusor vari ke , “ ASisa . ” Beti ikel mai galit ke , “ Imagenan , lav mai aSisa nǝsa tovi seSisa ale lav mai aGot nǝsa tovi siGot . ”
40022022	Nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan , lup̃aŋ , beti loriŋi , luvan .
40022023	Len nǝboŋ enan ŋai , naSattiusi gail ( lotokele ke na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan eb̃uer ) , logǝm hǝni , lousi
40022024	luke , “ Hai p̃usan , aMoses ikele ke , ‘ Aulum̃an ideh b̃imat anatun b̃eb̃uer , aṽan matmat tilah mai nǝbatunau enan hǝn b̃ipas anatun gail hǝn aṽan tomat b̃ikad anatun gail . ’
40022025	Ikad alatmiṽan tomǝlevru len ginamito . Ahai a m̃o ilah , ale imat , anatun eb̃uer . Ale aṽan tohusuri ilah mai asoan aten tomat .
40022026	Aṽan enan am imat , anatun eb̃uer , ale aṽan tohusuri ilah mai nǝbatunau . Ivan magenan van vǝbar alatmiṽan p̃isi lulah mai alitenan .
40022027	Ale nǝboŋ alatmiṽan p̃isi lotomat , alitenan tu imat .
40022028	Imagenan , kel mai ginamito , len na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan , alitenan dereh tevi asoan alatmiṽan tomǝlevru ta be , husur ilah mai galit p̃isi ? ”
40022029	AYesu isor var galit ke , “ Mǝtusab husur mǝtsalǝboi natosian siGot mai nǝdaŋan san .
40022030	Husur len na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan , nǝvanuan gail asike lulah , avan ideh asike idam̃ hǝn lǝb̃ilah , be dereh lesum̃an aŋel gail len nǝmav lǝsǝlah .
40022031	Be datb̃isor husur na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan , mǝtsaṽuruŋ nǝsa aGot tokele mai gamito a ? Ike ,
40022032	‘ Gagai ginau novi aGot siApraham , aGot seIsak , aGot siJakop . ’
40022033	Nǝboŋ naluṽoh gail lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan , lumaŋmaŋ len nap̃usanan san .
40022034	Nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke aYesu togol naSattiusi gail lǝsasor am , naFarisi gail lub̃onb̃on ,
40022035	ale galit sua tokad namitisau hǝn nalo eus nausian sua hǝni hǝn b̃ekǝkos len na-sor-vari-an san .
40022036	Ike , “ Hai p̃usan , len nalo gail , ta be esǝhor gail p̃isi am ? ”
40022037	AYesu isor var galit ke , “ ‘ Gelǝmas bun Nasub̃ aGot sam̃ len nǝlom̃ kavkav , nanunum̃ kavkav , mai nǝnauan sam̃ kavkav ; len gaiug kavkav . ’
40022038	Enan evi nakelean todaŋ totibau , tosǝhor gail p̃isi am .
40022039	Nakelean todaŋ tohusuri ehum enan , ike ‘ Gelǝmas bun nǝvanuan totoh pǝpadaŋ hǝn gaiug sum̃an gotolǝmas bun gaiug gabag . ’
40022040	Nakelean eru enan artodaŋ arovi nǝbathut nalo kavkav mai nap̃usanan sihai kelkel ur gail p̃isi . ”
40022041	Beti aYesu eus naFarisi gail lotob̃onb̃on ,
40022042	ike , “ Mǝtb̃inau aKristo , aGot totabtabuh lan , mǝtunau ke gai evi anatun ase , nǝpasusan sise ? ” Lusor vari ke , “ Anatun siTevit . ”
40022043	Beti aYesu eus galit ke , “ B̃imaienan , nǝboŋ aTevit tosor len aNunun aGot , bathut nǝsa ekis aKristo hǝn aMasta ? Husur aTevit ike ,
40022044	“ ‘ Nasub̃ aGot ikel mai aMasta sagw , ke “ Gebǝtah tarhǝt len navǝlagw nǝmatu , vir nǝb̃eriŋ aenemi sam̃ gail pipit nariem̃ gǝlaru hǝn lǝb̃evi ut kǝmas . ” ’
40022045	“ Imaienan , aTevit b̃ekis aKristo hǝn aMasta san , evi anatun mabe ? ”
40022046	Be sǝkad ideh tolǝboi b̃isor var aYesu . Len nǝboŋ enan van , galit p̃isi lomǝtahw hǝn lǝb̃eus nausian ideh hǝni am .
40023001	Beti aYesu isor mai naluṽoh gail mai ahai susur san gail .
40023002	Ike , “ Ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo mai naFarisi gail , lulav namilen aMoses hǝn lǝb̃ep̃usan hǝn nalo siGot .
40023003	Imaienan , sǝsǝloŋ husur galito , gol natideh lotokel mai gamito hǝn mǝtb̃igole . Avil samtigol tǝtoṽ hǝn nǝsa lotogole , husur lǝsagol nǝsa lotop̃usan hǝni .
40023004	Lukai tas natit isob̃ur , lugol nalo isob̃ur am lotodaŋ habat hǝn nǝvanuan b̃ehusur gail . Ehum lotobaŋis gat natit tomǝlas habat , ale lotoriŋi len nǝbathuvǝson nǝvanuan hǝn b̃evusi . Be lomǝtahun lǝb̃igol natideh hǝn lǝb̃esusupah mai nǝvanuan hǝn b̃erusan natgalenan tomǝlas .
40023005	Natit p̃isi lotogole , lugole hǝn nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃erisi ŋai . Galit , lukad nabokis gail lotosǝŋon natosian siGot len gail hǝn lǝb̃ibaŋis gail len navǝlalit mai nabunǝholito .
40023006	Lolǝŋon masuṽ hǝn lǝb̃ebǝtah rivuh len nab̃iltihanan ideh , lolǝŋon nǝhai bǝtbǝtah tovoi ŋai len naim nab̃onb̃onan .
40023007	Lolǝŋon masuṽ hǝn nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃ike , ‘ Ivoi , ’ mai galito len nǝmaket , lolǝmas nǝvanuan lǝb̃ekis galit , ‘ Hai p̃usan . ’
40023008	Be avan ideh satekis gamit hǝn ‘ Hai p̃usan , ’ husur mǝtukad ahai p̃usan tosua ŋai , ale gamit p̃isi mǝtop̃itp̃itoṽ sum̃an na-ke-ṽan-an gail .
40023009	Ale samtinau avan ideh len navile a pan hum totibau gol ke mǝttokisi hǝn , ‘ Tata , ’ husur esua ŋai evi aTata samit len nǝmav .
40023010	Avan ideh satekis gamit hǝn ‘ Hai p̃usan , ’ husur esua ŋai evi ahai p̃usan samito , evi aKristo .
40023011	Gamit ideh toke tetibau sǝhor gamit am , tekǝtkǝta tǝban gamito , tevi tarhǝt samito .
40023012	Avan ideh topatpat gai mǝhat , dereh tegǝm vi ut kǝmas ; avan ideh togol gai savi natideh , dereh aGot teputsani vi mǝhat .
40023013	“ Be gamit mǝttovi ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo mai naFarisi gail , mǝtovi vanuan gǝgǝras gail ŋai ! Nǝmauran samit dereh tisa vǝsa tibatbat , husur mǝtokǝkol hǝn nabopita hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail . Bathut mǝtsab̃is lan ale alat lotoke lǝb̃eb̃is lan , mǝtsǝdam̃ hǝn ke leb̃is .
40023015	“ Gamit mǝttovi ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo mai naFarisi gail , mǝtovi vanuan gǝgǝras gail ŋai ! Nǝmauran samit dereh tisa vǝsa tibatbat . Husur len nǝyaran samito , mǝtuyar len tan , wol len tas , hǝn mǝtb̃egǝgel hǝn nadǝlomian sinǝvanuan b̃esua ŋai , hǝn b̃ikad nadǝlomian seJu gail . Ale nǝboŋ tohusur nadǝlomian samito , mǝtugol egǝm isa sǝhor gamito , gol ke inor hǝn nǝhab nǝmatan ŋai .
40023016	“ Gamit mǝttoil a m̃o , mǝttosǝhar nǝvanuan gail , mǝtovi metb̃esw gail , nǝmauran samit dereh tisa vǝsa tibatbat ! Len nap̃usanan samit mǝtuke , ‘ Avan ideh tota gat na-kel-gati-an san len nahǝsan naim siGot , nakelean san savi natideh . Be avan ideh tota gat na-kel-gati-an san len nahǝsan nagol hǝn naim siGot , gai timasgol nǝsa tokel gati , salǝboi b̃imakuv dani . ’
40023017	Metb̃esw gail ! Melmel gail ! Mǝtolǝboii ke naim siGot esǝhor masuṽ hǝn nagol topat lan . Nagol enan egǝm siGot sǝb̃on , husur ŋai topat len naim siGot .
40023018	Ale len nap̃usanan samit mǝtuke , ‘ Avan ideh tota gat na-kel-gati-an san len nahǝsan nǝmel tutumavan , nakelean san savi natideh . Be avan ideh tota gat na-kel-gati-an san len nahǝsan naviolan topat len nǝmel tutumavan , gai timasgol nǝsa tokel gati , salǝboi b̃imakuv dani . ’
40023019	Metb̃esw gail ! Mǝtolǝboii ke nǝmel tutumavan esǝhor masuṽ hǝn naviolan ideh topat lan . Naviolan enan egǝm siGot sǝb̃on husur ŋai topat len nǝmel tutumavan len natutumavan van hǝn aGot .
40023020	Imaienan , avan ideh tota gat na-kel-gati-an san len nahǝsan nǝmel tutumavan , gai ita gat na-kel-gati-an san len nǝhes enan , mai len nahǝsan natideh topat lan .
40023021	Ale avan ideh tota gat na-kel-gati-an san len nahǝsan naim siGot , gai ita gat na-kel-gati-an san len nǝhes enan , mai len nahǝsan atenan totoh lan .
40023022	Ale avan ideh tota gat na-kel-gati-an san len nahǝsan nǝmav , gai ita gat na-kel-gati-an san len nahǝsan nab̃iltihai bǝtbǝtah siGot , mai len nahǝsan atenan tobǝtah lan .
40023023	“ Gamit mǝttovi ahai p̃usan hǝn nalo mai naFarisi gail , mǝtovi vanuan gǝgǝras gail ! Nǝmauran samit dereh tisa vǝsa tibatbat , husur nahudhut tosua len nasǝŋavuran hǝn naluhai hun namint , natil mai nakumin , mǝtoviol hǝn gail mai aGot . Avil mǝtsagol natit totibau gail sǝhor natgalenan len nalo . Mǝtsagol sanor van hǝn nǝvanuan gail , mǝtsalolosa hǝn galito . Mǝtsariŋ nǝlomit len aGot , mǝtsǝdaŋ lan . Ivoi hǝn mǝttagol natgalenan ale sa-nǝlomit tiboŋboŋ hǝn mǝtb̃eviol hǝn tesua len nasǝŋavuran .
40023024	Gamit mǝttoil a m̃o , mǝttosǝhar nǝvanuan gail , mǝtovi metb̃esw gail ! Mǝtohisi hǝn mǝtb̃ehusur natuhlo p̃isi , be mǝtsagol nab̃iltitit gail lotopat lan . Ehum mǝttob̃ir nǝwai tur len nǝkaliko hǝn asike mǝtb̃edǝlom nahonon ideh , be mǝtodǝlom nǝkamel mǝtsarisi .
40023025	“ Gamit mǝttovi hai p̃usan hǝn nalo mai naFarisi gail , mǝtovi vanuan gǝgǝras gail ! Nǝmauran samit dereh tisa vǝsa tibatbat , husur mǝtokǝkas navivile hǝn nab̃iliwai mai nasiloh , be nǝlolit eb̃iŋb̃iŋal . Nǝlomit epul hǝn na-lǝŋon-masuṽ-hǝn-natite-an mai nagolean hǝn natideh mǝttolǝŋoni . Mǝtsǝnau nǝvanuan ideh am .
40023026	Farisi namǝtamit tob̃esw ! Kǝkas nǝlon nab̃iliwai a m̃o , hǝn navivile am b̃iveveu .
40023027	“ Gamit mǝttovi hai p̃usan hǝn nalo mai naFarisi gail , mǝtovi vanuan gǝgǝras gail ! Nǝmauran samit dereh tisa vǝsa tibatbat , husur mǝtohum nab̃urhes lotopiti pǝhapǝhw . Navivile epǝhw , ikab buni , be butite epul hǝn nabǝlasun nǝvanuan tomat gail mai natit gail am tob̃os nǝtan .
40023028	Gamit mǝtumaienan . Nǝvanuan gail lotoris navivile samito lunau ke mǝtunor , avil len nǝlomito , mǝtopul hǝn nagǝgǝrasan , mǝtutoh hum nalo savi natideh .
40023029	“ Gamit mǝttovi hai p̃usan hǝn nalo mai naFarisi gail , mǝtovi vanuan gǝgǝras gail ! Nǝmauran samit dereh tisa vǝsa tibatbat , husur mǝtoum hǝn nab̃urhes sihai kelkel ur gail , atǝmamit gail ta sutuai lotoparu bubun galito , ale mǝtovǝhas nab̃urhes silat lotonor len nǝhon aGot .
40023030	Beti , sum̃an mǝttavoi sǝhor atǝmamit gail ta sutuai , mǝtuke , ‘ Dattatoh len nǝboŋ setǝmadat ta sutuai , asike dattab̃on mai galito nǝboŋ lotogol nǝda hihai kelkel ur gail lotosel . ’
40023031	Nǝboŋ mǝttokǝmaienan , mǝtukel koti ke mǝttovi anatulit gail , mǝttosa sum̃an alat lotoparu bubun ahai kelkel ur gail .
40023032	Gamit m̃au , nǝsa atǝmamit gail ta sutuai lototub̃at hǝni , mitigol tihav !
40023033	Mǝtovi m̃at gail mai anatun nǝvaipa gail !
40023034	Husur natenan , dereh nesǝvat ahai kelkel ur gail , nǝvanuan lotokad namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor , mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo , van hǝn gamito . Dereh mititahǝtah hǝn galevis len nǝhai balbal hǝn lǝb̃imat . Galevis am mǝtebilas habat hǝn galito len naim nab̃onb̃onan samito , hut galit van husur nab̃iltivile ṽisusua .
40023035	Ŋa nǝmatan silat lotonor p̃isi len navile a pan , dereh lipat len navǝlamito ; tub̃at len nǝda hiApel tonor , van vǝbar nǝda hiSekariah , anatun ulum̃an aParakiah ,
40023036	Nukel nakitinan mai gamito , nǝpanismen hǝn nǝmatan galen p̃isi , dereh tibar naur ta damǝŋ egai .
40023037	“ O Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! Gugol ahai kelkel ur gail lumat , gotubun ahai pispisul gail aGot tosǝvat galit van hǝn gaiug . Akis nuke nigol anatum̃ gail lib̃onb̃on hum natopǝhaṽut togol natuhman san gail lub̃onb̃on hǝn b̃ihavhav hǝn galito . Be gomǝtahuni .
40023038	Geris ! AGot eriŋ gab̃ulan naim sam̃ gol eb̃ǝb̃esw .
40023039	Husur nukel mai gamit ke , gagai van , asike mǝtoris ginau am van vǝbar mǝtb̃ike , ‘ AGot tivoi hǝn atenan togǝm len nahǝsan Nasub̃ aGot ! ’ ”
40024001	Nǝboŋ aYesu toriŋ naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot , toyar dani , ahai susur san gail logǝm hǝni hǝn lǝb̃eṽusani hǝn naim gail ei .
40024002	Be aYesu ikel mai galit ke , “ Mǝtoris naim galeg a ? Nokitin mai gamit ke dereh limasirsir p̃isi hǝn asike ikad nǝvat ideh gegai b̃epǝlah len nǝvat togon . ”
40024003	Beti nǝboŋ aYesu tobǝtah sǝb̃on len Naṽehuh Oliv , ahai susur san gail logǝm hǝni luke , “ Natgalen gotomadhakele mai ginamito levisi ŋais ? Nǝsa teṽusan nagǝmaian sam̃ ? Nǝsa teṽusan nǝboŋ navile a pan b̃inoŋ ? ”
40024004	AYesu isor var galit ke , “ Mǝtelǝlǝgau ! Avan ideh sategǝras gamito ,
40024005	husur dereh tisob̃ur legǝm len nahǝsagw , like , ‘ Ginau aKristo , ’ ale dereh legǝras tisob̃ur nǝboŋ lǝb̃ekǝmaienan .
40024006	Dereh mǝtesǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝwalan hǝn nab̃iltib̃alan gail mai na-kel-uri-an hǝn nab̃iltib̃alan gail am . Be samtemǝtahw , husur timasvisi magenan , be sǝbar nagilen sal .
40024007	Naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut sua dereh ligol nab̃iltib̃alan mai naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tile , ale nǝvanuan sekiŋ gail dereh lib̃al mai nǝvanuan sekiŋ tile gail . Dereh nǝhanian teb̃uer mai tikad nab̃iltidu gail husur naut gail .
40024008	Be natgalen p̃isi lohum natub̃atan ŋai hǝn napǝŋasan hǝn nǝpasusan . Dereh lisa van vǝsa , levisi vǝha-sob̃sob̃ur am len nǝboŋ lǝb̃egǝmai .
40024009	“ Beti dereh leriŋ gamit len navǝlan alat lǝb̃emǝdas tabtab hǝn gamito mai lǝb̃igol mǝtb̃imat . Naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tiltile dereh lemǝtahun bun gamito sil nahǝsagw .
40024010	Ale len nǝboŋ enan tisob̃ur dereh lipair dan ginau , lemǝtahun bun galit gabag , leriŋ galit gabag len navǝlan aenemi salit gail .
40024011	Ale ahai kelkel ur gǝgǝras gail dereh levisi , legǝras nǝvanuan tisob̃ur .
40024012	Ale husur nǝsaan b̃iperŋan naut p̃isi , na-lǝmlǝmas-buni-an sinǝvanuan b̃isob̃ur dereh tegǝm kǝkereh .
40024013	Avil nǝvanuan tokad nǝ-daŋ-b̃uri-an van vǝbar nagilen , gai dereh aGot tilav kuvi hǝn b̃ikad nǝmauran vi sutuai .
40024014	Ale nǝvanuan sagw gail dereh likel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi egai hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan aGot , len navile a pan kavkav , hǝn ke , naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tiltile p̃isi lǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝni bai , beti nagilen navile a pan tegǝmai . ”
40024015	Gaiug gotoṽuruŋ nategai , geṽuruŋ lǝboii . AYesu isor am ke , “ Imagenan , nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eris nǝsa ahai kelkel ur , aTaniel , totos husuri a m̃o , nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eris natit aGot tomǝtahun buni , toil len naut tolo , tomǝdas bun naut enan van vagol tob̃ǝb̃esw vi sutuai ,
40024016	len nǝboŋ enan , alat a Jutea limasgam dan naut enan vi lan naut tobaŋ ṽehuh .
40024017	Avan ideh b̃iŋavŋav mǝhat len navurun naim , timasgam tutut dan naim san , satimariŋ vi lohoim hǝn b̃itariv kukuv natite dani .
40024018	Ale ideh b̃eum marireu san , satetǝlmam hǝn b̃ilav nahurabat san .
40024019	Len nǝboŋ enan nǝmauran dereh tidaŋ vǝsa habat hǝn apǝhaṽut ideh totian o tovǝhasus .
40024020	Be mitisor tuṽ vi tǝban aGot ke nǝ-gam-yav-an samit satipat len nahǝbati naut susus o len nǝSappat ideh .
40024021	Nokǝmaienan husur len nǝboŋ natgalen b̃evisi , na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an dereh tidaŋ habat sǝhor nǝboŋ ta sutuai len natub̃atan , vǝbar nǝboŋ ta damǝŋai , ale asike idaŋ sǝhori tǝtas am boŋ ideh .
40024022	Asike aGot tagol na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an tam̃idol len nǝboŋ galenan , nǝvanuan p̃isi lǝtǝmat . Avil aGot dereh tigol na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an sinǝvanuan p̃isi tem̃idol m̃os alat , gai tolekis hǝn galito , lotovi esan .
40024023	“ Beti avan ideh b̃ikel mai gamit ke , ‘ Mǝteris , aKristo bogai ! ’ o ‘ Gai saga ! ’ samtedǝlomi .
40024024	Husur akristo gǝgǝras gail mai ahai kelkel ur gǝgǝras gail dereh levisi . Dereh ligol namerikel nasuhunian nǝvanuan gail lotop̃aŋ habat lan . Lǝtalǝboi lǝtagǝras nǝvanuan gail aGot tolekis hǝn galito , dereh ligole len namerikel galenan .
40024025	Nalǝlǝgauan enan , nukele hǝn mǝtb̃elǝboi nǝsa b̃evisi .
40024026	Imagenan , nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃ikel mai gamit ke , ‘ Mǝteris , aKristo satotoh len naut masmas tob̃ǝb̃esw ! ’ samtivan varisi . Lǝb̃ike , ‘ Mǝteris , satosusuah lohoim , ’ samtedǝlomi .
40024027	Husur , nǝboŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan b̃egǝmai , dereh tehum nasǝm̃oropun togol nǝmav kavkav tom̃ial , nǝvanuan p̃isi lerisi .
40024028	Len naut ideh natit tomat topat lan , nab̃iltiman namǝsav tohanhan natit tomat dereh lemǝlah gǝm b̃on ei . ”
40024029	AYesu isor am , ike , “ Nǝboŋ na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an hǝn nǝboŋ galenan b̃inoŋ , ‘ dereh namityal timotmot , mai nahǝbati asike em̃ial ; dereh nam̃eso gail lerus vi pan dan nǝmav mai natit gail lotokad nǝdaŋan len nǝmav dereh lekurkur habat . ’
40024030	Beti natit tovǝhot nagǝmaian siNatun Nǝvanuan dereh tevisi len nǝmav , ale naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan gail p̃isi len navile a pan dereh lelǝŋon tisa habat , litaŋ . Beti dereh leris aNatun Nǝvanuan togǝm len nǝmavukasw len nǝdaŋan mai nǝyalyalan totibau .
40024031	Len nab̃iltiwalan hǝn nǝtrampet
40024032	AYesu ike , “ Ivoi hǝn mǝtb̃elǝboi sǝhot natsua nǝhai nafik b̃eṽusani . Nǝboŋ nǝpashǝt nafik sǝmasmas am be todum̃oh , mǝtolǝboii ke nahǝbati naut pudpud egǝm pǝpadaŋ .
40024033	Len naṽide tomagenan , nǝboŋ mǝtb̃eris natgalen p̃isi notomadhasor husuri , dereh mǝtelǝboii ke natǝlmaman siNatun Nǝvanuan satogǝmai , ehum gai tia bopita .
40024034	Nukel nakitinan mai gamito , naur egai asike lumat vǝbar natgalen p̃isi lǝb̃isarpoh .
40024035	Nǝmav mai navile a pan dereh arimasig , be nasoruan sagw gail asike lumasig boŋ ideh . ”
40024036	AYesu isor am ike , “ Nǝmariboŋ enan o namityal enan , avan ideh salǝboii . Aŋel gail len nǝmav mai aNatun aGot , galit lǝsalǝboii , avil aGot Tata sǝb̃on , gai elǝboii .
40024037	Nagǝman siNatun Nǝvanuan dereh tehum nǝboŋ siNoah gail .
40024038	Len nǝboŋ siNoah gail , nǝboŋ nilev sagǝm sal , nǝvanuan gail luhan , lomun , lulah mai ludam̃ hǝn nǝlahan gail van vǝbar nǝboŋ aNoah tob̃is len nǝak .
40024039	Nǝvanuan gail lǝsǝnau sǝhot nǝsa b̃evisi van vǝbar nilev egǝm lev kuv galit p̃isi .
40024040	“ Len nǝboŋ enan , dereh tikad naulum̃an toru artoum marireu . AGot dereh tilav kuv tesua , teriŋ tesua .
40024041	Dereh tikad napǝhaṽut toru artolis dasdas namisurhuwit . AGot dereh tilav kuv tesua , teriŋ tesua .
40024042	Imagenan , mǝtehulahul , husur mǝtsalǝboi nǝboŋ aMasta samit b̃egǝmai .
40024043	Be mǝtelǝboi sǝhot nategai : amahean naim talǝboi namityal nǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah tagǝmai , amahean talele hǝn nǝvanuan asike tǝlavutur vi lohoim san .
40024044	Gamit am mitimasutaut , husur aNatun Nǝvanuan dereh tegǝm len namityal mǝtsǝvatvat viri . ”
40024045	Ale aYesu ib̃ol p̃usan , ike , “ Avan sua ikad naslev eru , be ta be ivoi sǝhor togon ? Naslev sua idaŋ len nauman san , ikad namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor . Ale amasta san itabtabuh lan hǝn b̃ekǝtkǝta tǝban naslev san gail len naim san , hǝn b̃evǝŋan galito len namityal tonor hǝni .
40024046	Amasta b̃ivahim , b̃isab̃ naslev enan togol nauman san , aslev enan dereh tehǝhaṽur habat .
40024047	Nukel nakitinan mai gamito , amasta enan dereh titabtabuh len naslev enan hǝn b̃ekǝtkǝta tǝban natit p̃isi san .
40024048	Be naslev togon isa . Hum ma gai toke , ‘ Amasta sagw dereh titoh a tut tebǝlav . ’
40024049	Beti etub̃at ṽas naslev gail lototoh len navǝlan , ale ihan , emun mai alat lototǝrog akis .
40024050	Ale amasta dereh tetǝlmam len nǝmariboŋ naslev enan sǝvatvat viri mai namityal naslev salǝboii .
40024051	Dereh amasta tita kotovi , teriŋi len naut nǝvanuan gǝgǝras lototohtoh lan . Len naut enan lutaŋ habat , kat b̃urb̃ur nariṽolit bathut lolǝŋon isa vǝsa batbat . ”
40025001	Beti aYesu isor husur natǝlmaman san dan nǝmav hum nakiŋ , ike , “ Datolǝboi datb̃enǝnoṽ hǝn natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav , mai navensus tosǝŋavur lotolav nam̃ial salit , yar van hǝn lǝb̃ebubur mai naulum̃an b̃ilah .
40025002	Galit erim lovi hoṽon , erim lukad namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor .
40025003	Navensus lotovi hoṽon , lupat nam̃ial salit gail be lǝsǝpat naoil ideh .
40025004	Navensus lotokad namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor , lupat nam̃ial salit gail mai lupat nab̃iliwai hǝn naoil gail am .
40025005	“ Nǝboŋ naulum̃an b̃ilah tovǝlo , navensus gail p̃isi losusuh metanoṽ , gol lupatmari .
40025006	Tub̃loh len mariug nǝkaian sua evi mǝhat , ‘ Mǝteris ! Naulum̃an b̃ilah bogai ! Gǝm risi , ke “ Ivoi , ” maii ! ’
40025007	Ale navensus gail lule mǝhat , logut kuv nadurinen nawik hǝn nam̃ial salit gail .
40025008	Be torim lotovi hoṽon lukel mai torim lotokad nalǝboian ke , ‘ Lav naoil ideh samit mai ginamito , husur nam̃ial sinamit gail lǝsǝpaŋ savoi , dereh limat . ’
40025009	Be alat lotokad nalǝboian luke , ‘ Ao , datb̃igol b̃imaienan , dereh naoil tem̃idol hǝn gidat p̃isi . Mitia ṽur ideh samito len naim p̃urp̃ur . ’
40025010	Ale luvan hǝn lǝb̃eṽuri . Be nǝboŋ lotoyar van sal , naulum̃an b̃ilah evisi . Beti navensus torim lotoutaut tia , lutah maii , lob̃is lohoim hǝn nǝlahan . Ale nǝvanuan nauman ekǝkol gat nabopita .
40025011	Nǝboŋ namityal topair , navensus lotoṽur naoil lotǝlmam , lukai ke , ‘ Nasub̃ , Nasub̃ , sǝŋav hǝn nabopita hǝn ginamito ! ’
40025012	Ris tosor var galit ke , ‘ Nukel nakitinan mai gamito , nǝsalǝboi kas gamito . ’ ”
40025013	AYesu imaris kotov nǝb̃ol enan ike , “ Imagenan , mǝtehulahul hǝn asike mǝtb̃esum̃an navensus lotovi hoṽon , husur mǝtsalǝboi nǝmariboŋ o namityal hǝn natǝlmaman sagw . ”
40025014	AYesu isor tǝtas husur natǝlmaman san , ike , “ Natohan pipihabǝlan aGot len nǝmav imaiegai : Ikad avan sua toutaut hǝn b̃ivan len nǝyaran sua . Ekis naslev san gail gǝmai ale eriŋ natit san gail len navǝlalito .
40025015	Ilav nǝvat mai galit ṽisusua tonor hǝn namitisau salito . Ilav nǝtalent torim mai naslev sua , ilav nǝtalent toru mai naslev sual am , ale ilav tosua mai naslev togon .
40025016	Naslev tokad nǝtalent torim eum lan van ikad erim am .
40025017	Len naṽide tomaienan , naslev tokad toru , eum lan van ikad eru am .
40025018	Be aten tokad nǝtalent tosua , evivile , ehir nab̃ur len tan ale itavun susuan nǝvat simasta san .
40025019	“ Idareh buni amasta sislev galenan etǝlmam hǝn b̃elǝboi nǝsa lotogole len nǝvat san .
40025020	Naslev , amasta tolav nǝtalent torim maii , ipat nǝtalent torim am gǝm hǝni ike , ‘ Nasub̃ , gulav nǝtalent torim mai ginau , ale len torim enan nopisan erim eg am . ’
40025021	Amasta ikel maii ke , ‘ Nauman sam̃ ikab ! Govi naslev tovoi , todaŋ len ginau . Gudaŋ len natit tokǝkereh notoriŋi len navǝlam̃ , imagenan dereh nitabtabuh len gaiug hǝn nǝb̃eriŋ natit tisob̃ur len navǝlam̃ . Gegǝmai , gehǝhaṽur mai ginau ! ’
40025022	“ Beti naslev , amasta tolav nǝtalent toru maii , egǝm hǝni ike , ‘ Nasub̃ , gulav nǝtalent toru mai ginau , ale len toru enan nopisan eru eg am . ’
40025023	Amasta ikel maii ke , ‘ Nauman sam̃ ikab ! Govi naslev tovoi , todaŋ len ginau . Gudaŋ len natit tokǝkereh notoriŋi len navǝlam̃ , imaienan dereh nitabtabuh len gaiug hǝn nǝb̃eriŋ natit tisob̃ur len navǝlam̃ . Gegǝmai , gehǝhaṽur mai ginau ! ’
40025024	“ Beti naslev , amasta tolav nǝtalent tosua maii , egǝm hǝni ike , ‘ Nasub̃ , nolǝboii tia ke govi naulum̃an totaltal , len nǝmatuan gulav nǝhanian dan naut gǝsǝmabule lan , gotǝtariv wit len naut gǝsǝdaŋdaŋ namisurhute lan .
40025025	Imagenan nomǝtahw , ale nua susuan nǝtalent sam̃ len tan . Nǝvat sam̃ bogai . ’
40025026	Amasta san isor vari ke , ‘ Govi naslev tosa vǝsa gotovekan . Gǝb̃inau ke notovi naulum̃an totaltal , gǝb̃inau ke notolav nǝhanian dan naut nǝsǝmabule lan , gǝb̃inau ke nototǝtariv wit len naut nǝsǝdaŋdaŋ namisurhute lan ,
40025027	imabe gǝsariŋ nǝvat sagw len nalulutar ? Gǝtagol tomaienan , nǝboŋ nototǝlmam , nǝtǝlav nǝvat sagw mai naintǝres han . ’
40025028	Ale ikel mai nǝvanuan nauman san gail ke , ‘ Lav kuv nǝtalent dan ategai , lavi mai atea tokad tosǝŋavur .
40025029	Husur avan ideh toum tovoi len nǝsa tokade , dereh nilav tisob̃ur am maii hǝn b̃epul hǝni . Be avan ideh tom̃idol , avan ideh saum savoi len nǝsa tokade , dereh nilav kuv tokǝkereh gai tokade , dani .
40025030	Naslev sagol natideh savoi , bar hǝni vivile len nǝmargobut , len naut enan dereh tikad nǝtaŋan mai na-desdes-batriṽoriṽ-an . ’
40025031	“ Nǝboŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan b̃egǝmai len namǝnas hǝn nǝyalyalan san , mai aŋel gail p̃isi , dereh tebǝtah len nab̃iltihai bǝtbǝtah san toyalyal hum nakiŋ .
40025032	Beti naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tiltile gail p̃isi dereh lib̃onb̃on len nǝhon . Ale dereh tepǝpehun galito hum nǝvanuan nasipsip topǝpehun nasipsip gail dan nǝnani gail .
40025033	Dereh teriŋ nasipsip gail len nǝmatu san mai nǝnani gail len nǝmair .
40025034	Beti nakiŋ dereh tikel mai alat len nǝmatu san ke , ‘ Gamit , aTǝmagw tovoi buni hǝn gamito , mǝtegǝmai ! Mititoh pipihabǝlan aTǝmagw len naut toutaut hǝni tia m̃os gamito len natub̃atan , nǝboŋ togol navile a pan .
40025035	Husur nǝboŋ notomalkǝkat , mǝtovǝŋan ginau ; nǝboŋ notomaduh , mǝtulav nǝwai mai ginau ; nǝboŋ notovi metb̃os , mǝtokis ginau vi lohoim samito ;
40025036	nǝboŋ notomalmal hǝn nahurabat , mǝtukol nahurabat len ginau ; nǝboŋ notomǝsah , mǝtokǝtkǝta tǝban ginau ; nǝboŋ nototoh len naim bǝbaŋis , mǝtogǝm , m̃ǝdoŋ tǝban ginau . ’
40025037	Beti alat lotonor dereh lisor vari ke , ‘ Nasub̃ , namtoris gotomalkǝkat namtovǝŋan gaiug ŋais ? Namtoris gotomaduh namtulav nǝwai mai gaiug ŋais ?
40025038	Namtoris gaiug gotovi metb̃os namtous gaiug vi lohoim sinamit ŋais ? Namtoris gotomalmal hǝn nahurabat namtukol nahurabat len gaiug ŋais ?
40025039	Namtoris gotomǝsah o namtom̃ǝdoŋ tǝban gaiug ŋais len naim bǝbaŋis ? ’
40025040	Ale nakiŋ dereh tisor var galit ke , ‘ Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke , nǝboŋ mǝttogole van hǝn nǝbathudud ideh sagw tovi ut kǝmas ŋai , mǝtugole van hǝn ginau . ’
40025041	“ Beti dereh tipair , tikel mai alat len nǝmair san ke , ‘ Gamit , aGot togol nǝmauran samit tosa vǝsa , mǝtevi tut dan ginau , mǝtevi lan nǝhab topaŋ vi sutuai aGot toutaut hǝni tia m̃os natǝmat mai aŋel san gail !
40025042	Husur nǝboŋ notomalkǝkat , mǝtsavǝŋan ginau ; nǝboŋ notomaduh , mǝtsǝlav nǝwai mai ginau ;
40025043	nǝboŋ notovi metb̃os , mǝtsakis ginau vi lohoim samito ; nǝboŋ notomalmal hǝn nahurabat , mǝtsakol nahurabat ideh len ginau ; nǝboŋ notomǝsah o nototoh len naim bǝbaŋis , mǝtsam̃ǝdoŋ tǝban ginau . ’
40025044	Beti dereh lisor vari ke , ‘ Nasub̃ , ŋais namtoris gaiug gotomalkǝkat , o gotomaduh , o gotovi metb̃os , o gotomalmal , o gotomǝsah , o gototoh len naim bǝbaŋis be namtsavi tarhǝt sam̃ ? ’
40025045	Ale dereh tisor var galit ke , ‘ Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke , nǝboŋ mǝtsagole van hǝn nǝbathudud ideh sagw tovi ut kǝmas ŋai , mǝtsagole van hǝn ginau . ’
40025046	Beti alatenan dereh levi tut , vi lan nǝpanismen topat vi sutuai , be alat lotonor levi lan nǝmauran vi sutuai . ”
40026001	Nǝboŋ aYesu tokǝmaienan tonoŋ , ikel mai ahai susur san gail ike ,
40026002	“ Mǝtolǝboii tia ke nǝboŋ nǝmariboŋ b̃eru b̃inoŋ dereh tikad nǝPasova , ale aNatun Nǝvanuan , dereh leriŋi len navǝlan alat lǝb̃ip̃os gati len nǝhai balbal . ”
40026003	Len namityal enan ab̃iltihai tutumav mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail , lub̃onb̃on len nab̃iltiim seb̃iltihai tutumav , nahǝsan aKaiafas .
40026004	Lusor utaut hǝn lǝb̃igol nagǝrasian ale tah gat aYesu hǝn lǝb̃igol b̃imat .
40026005	Be luke , “ Sadatigole len Nǝhanan egai , hǝn asike nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃eluṽoh hǝn lǝb̃ib̃al taṽtaṽor , mǝdas natit gail . ”
40026006	Len nǝboŋ enan , aYesu itoh len naut a Petani len naim seSimon tokad naleprosi a m̃o .
40026007	Ale napǝhaṽut sua tolav nab̃otel lotoum hǝni hǝn nǝvat topǝhw , egǝm hǝn aYesu tohan . Ilav nab̃otel enan topul hǝn naoil pǝhpǝhas tosusau , nǝvat han totibau , ale eb̃iri len nǝkadun aYesu .
40026008	Nǝboŋ ahai susur gail lotoris natenan , nǝlolit epǝŋasi . Luke , “ Imabe tomǝdas natenan ?
40026009	Ivoi am tap̃ur hǝni m̃os nǝvat tosob̃ur ale tǝlav nǝvat enan mai namǝsal gail . ”
40026010	Be aYesu tolǝboi natenan ikel mai galit ke , “ Imabe mǝtugol nǝlon alitegai isa ? Gai igol natit tokab hǝn ginau .
40026011	Mitinau nategai ! Namǝsal gail lutoh mai gamit akis , be ginau , asike nutoh tabtab hǝn ginau .
40026012	Nǝboŋ alitegai tob̃ir naoil len ginau , eutaut hǝn nibegw hǝn lǝb̃itavuni .
40026013	Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke , len naut p̃isi len navile a pan lotokel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi lan , dereh lisor husur nǝsa alitegai togole , gol ke nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃inau gati . ”
40026014	Beti , ahai susur lotovi 12 , galit sua , nahǝsan aJutas Iskariot , ivan hǝn ab̃iltihai tutumav gail ,
40026015	ike , “ Nǝb̃eriŋ aYesu len navǝlamito , mǝtudam̃ hǝn mǝtb̃ilav nǝvat tevis mai ginau ? ” Ale lulav nakoin nasilva tovi 30 maii .
40026016	Len nǝboŋ enan van , aJutas idas p̃isal hǝn b̃eriŋ aYesu len navǝlalito .
40026017	Len nǝmariboŋ metǝkav hǝn Nǝhanan hǝn nabǝta sǝkad nayis lan , ahai susur gail logǝm hǝn aYesu , lousi ke , “ Golǝŋon ke namteutaut hǝn gǝb̃ihan nǝPasova a be ? ”
40026018	Ale ike , “ Mǝtevi lan nab̃iltivile Jerusalem . Dereh mǝteris naulum̃an sual ei , ale kel maii ke , ‘ Ahai p̃usan ike : Nǝboŋ sagw egǝm pǝpadaŋ . Dereh nihan nǝhanian hǝn nǝPasova mai ahai susur sagw gail len naim sam̃ . ’ ”
40026019	Ŋa ahai susur gail lugol nǝsa aYesu tokel mai galito , ale loutaut hǝn nǝhanian hǝn nǝPasova .
40026020	Nǝboŋ namityal tomasur , aYesu itah mai ahai susur lotovi 12 len natev hǝn lǝb̃ihan .
40026021	Nǝboŋ lotohanhan sal , ike , “ Nukel nakitinan mai gamit ke , gamit sua dereh teriŋ ginau len navǝlan aenemi sagw gail . ”
40026022	Ahai susur gail nǝlolit isa masuṽ , ale galit ṽisusua lotub̃at usi ke , “ Nasub̃ , ase lai ? Savi ginau a ? ”
40026023	Isor var galit ke , “ Gamit mǝttohanhan mai ginau , gamit sua toriŋ navǝlan len nasiloh mai navǝlagw , dereh teriŋ ginau len navǝlan aenemi sagw gail .
40026024	Husur aNatun Nǝvanuan dereh timasmat hum lototos husuri a m̃o , avil atenan toriŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan len navǝlan aenemi san gail , nǝmauran sitenan tisa vǝsa tibatbat ! Tavoi am hǝn atenan ke anan asike tǝpasi ! ”
40026025	Ale aJutas , gai b̃eriŋi len navǝlan aenemi san gail , gai am eusi ke , “ Hai p̃usan , savi ginau a ? ” Ale aYesu isor vari ke , “ Evoi , gaiug boh gukele . ”
40026026	Nǝboŋ lotohan tin sal , aYesu ilav nabǝta , ale esipa lan , eb̃uri , beti ilavi mai ahai susur gail , ike , “ Lavi , hani , nibegw bogai . ”
40026027	Ale nǝboŋ tolav nab̃iliwai topul hǝn nǝwain , esipa hǝni ale ilavi mai galito , ike , “ Gamit p̃isi mǝtemun lan ,
40026028	husur nǝda hagw bogai , aGot tota gat na-kel-gati-an san lan mai nǝvanuan san gail .
40026029	Ale nukel mai gamit ke , nǝwain egai , len natohan pipihabǝlan aTǝmagw , nǝwain eg dereh tiveveu , ale gagai van asike nomun nǝwain egai van vǝbar nǝboŋ nǝb̃emuni mai gamit ei . ”
40026030	Beti lokǝkai hǝn nǝb̃e hǝn nalotuan ale lovivile , lovi lan Naṽehuh Oliv .
40026031	Beti aYesu ikel mai galit ke , “ Len mariug egai dereh gamit p̃isi mitigam dan ginau . Husur len natosian siGot ike , “ ‘ Dereh niṽabun nǝvanuan nasipsip , ale navǝshǝsipsip ligam ṽisusua . ’
40026032	Avil , nǝboŋ nǝb̃imat ale aGot b̃igol nǝb̃ile mǝhat , dereh neil a m̃o hǝn gamito vi lan naut a Kalili . ”
40026033	Ale aPita isor vari , ike , “ Naut kǝmas nǝvanuan p̃isi lǝb̃igam dan gaiug , ginau asike nugam dan gaiug boŋ ideh ! ”
40026034	AYesu isor vari ke , “ Nukel nakitinan mai gaiug ke , len mariug eg ŋai , a tahw hǝn natoulum̃an b̃ekǝkǝraiko , dereh gikel vǝha-tor hǝni ke gǝsalǝboi ginau ! ”
40026035	APita ikel maii ke , “ Ao , naut kǝmas nǝb̃imat mai gaiug , asike nukele ke nǝsalǝboi gaiug ! ” Ale ahai susur gail p̃isi lokǝmaienan .
40026036	Beti aYesu iyar mai galito vi lan naut a Ketsemane , ale ikel mai ahai susur gail ke , “ Mǝtebǝtah gegai , ale nivan ea hǝn nǝb̃isor tuṽ . ”
40026037	Esǝhar aPita mai anatun aSepeti gǝlaru , aJemes mai aJon , etub̃at lolosa , nǝlon isa vǝsa habat .
40026038	Ale ikel mai galit ke , “ Nulolosa masuṽ ! Ehum nalolosaan ikabut gol nǝlogw van numat ! Mititoh gegai , mitilele mai ginau ! ”
40026039	Nǝboŋ toyar van kǝkereh am , ib̃ov len tan , kǝta vi pan , ike , “ Tata sagw , b̃ike b̃inor len nalǝŋonian sam̃ , gilav kuv nab̃iliwai hǝn na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an egai dan ginau .
40026040	Beti etǝlmam van hǝn ahai susur totor enan , isab̃ lotopatmari . Ikel mai aPita ke , “ Mǝtsǝdaŋ sǝbar mǝtb̃ilele mai ginau len nǝhaua tosua ŋai a ?
40026041	Mǝtehulahul ale sor tuṽ hǝn asike mǝtb̃iteh len nǝsaan totaltal ke mǝtehusuri . Naut kǝmas nǝlomito elǝŋon b̃igol nǝsa tonor , nibemit sǝdaŋ , edǝdasi . ”
40026042	Ale aYesu eriŋ galit tǝtas , isor tuṽ , ike , “ Tata sagw , gǝb̃ike sanor len nalǝŋonian sam̃ hǝn gǝb̃ilav kuv nab̃iliwai hǝn na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an egai dan ginau , avil gǝb̃ike nemuni , gigol nǝsa gotolǝŋoni ! ”
40026043	Nǝboŋ tosor tuṽ tonoŋ etǝlmam tǝtas , isab̃ lotopatmari husur namǝtalit inoṽ masuṽ .
40026044	Ŋa eriŋ galit tasi am , ivan , isor mai aTǝman tǝtas hum togole tia .
40026045	Beti etǝlmam van hǝn ahai susur totor , ikel mai galit ke , “ Mǝtupat sal a ? Mǝtuŋavŋav sal a ? Mǝteris ! Namityal egǝm pǝpadaŋ . Avan sua dereh teriŋ aNatun Nǝvanuan len navǝlan alat nǝsaan ta bogai !
40026046	Mitile mǝhat , dativan . Mǝteris , atenan b̃eriŋ ginau len navǝlalito satogǝm pǝpadaŋ . ”
40026047	Nǝboŋ aYesu tosorsor sal , aJutas tosua len tosǝŋavur pisan toru , egǝmai . Itah mai nab̃iltiluṽoh lototǝgau nab̃u nǝb̃alan mai nǝbatw gail . Ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail losǝvat naluṽoh enan .
40026048	Ale aJutas isor utaut hǝn naṽusanian sua mai galit a m̃o , ike , “ Nǝboŋ nǝb̃esum̃ nǝtarhon atenan , gai bolai . Tah gati . ”
40026049	Ale vǝha-sua ŋai ivan hǝn aYesu ike , “ Ivoi , Hai p̃usan , ” ale esum̃ nǝtarhon .
40026050	AYesu ikel maii ke , “ Tegai , gaiug gigol nǝsa gotogǝm m̃osi . ” Beti logǝm tǝban aYesu , lutah gati .
40026051	Ŋa galit sua lototah mai aYesu eliv kuv nab̃u nǝb̃alan san , ita kotov nǝdariŋan naslev seb̃iltihai tutumav .
40026052	Beti aYesu ikel maii ke , “ Riŋ tǝlmam hǝn nab̃u sam̃ , bathut avan ideh tob̃al hǝn nab̃u nǝb̃alan , dereh nab̃u nǝb̃alan tigol nǝmatan san !
40026053	Gamit mǝtsalǝboii ke nolǝboi nǝb̃eus aTǝmagw hǝn na-vi-tarhǝte-an san . Ale nǝtausi , gai tasǝvat nab̃iltivǝshǝŋel tovi 12 gag ŋai .
40026054	Nǝtagol tomagenan , natosian siGot lotoke timasvisi maiegai , lisarpoh mabe ? ”
40026055	Len namityal enan ŋai aYesu ikel mai naluṽoh ke , “ Imabe mǝtogǝm , lav nab̃u nǝb̃alan mai nǝbatw gail gǝmai hǝn mǝtb̃itah gat ginau hum notovi vanuan nǝb̃alan toke tib̃al mai alat lotoil a m̃o ? Imabe mǝtsǝtah gat ginau len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot ? Nobǝtah , nop̃usan ei len nǝmariboŋ p̃isi .
40026056	Avil nǝsa tovisi gagai evisi hǝn natosian sihai kelkel ur b̃isarpoh . ” Beti ahai susur san p̃isi loriŋi , lugam mǝtahw dani .
40026057	Nǝboŋ lotogam dani tonoŋ , alat lototah gat aYesu losǝhari vi lan naim siKaiafas tovi b̃iltihai tutumav , ale ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail lub̃onb̃on ei .
40026058	Be aPita ehusuri , iyar a tut dani vǝbar naholǝvat todar vis naim seb̃iltihai tutumav . Ale nǝboŋ tob̃is lan , ebǝtah ei mai nǝvanuan nauman gail hǝn b̃eris nǝsa b̃evisi .
40026059	Len naim , ab̃iltihai tutumav mai nǝSanhitrin p̃isi ludas vanuan gǝgǝras gail lǝb̃idam̃ hǝn lǝb̃elibliboŋ ke aYesu togol tosa , gol alat lotoil a m̃o lolǝboi lǝb̃igol b̃imat sile .
40026060	Be lǝsǝsab̃ nalibliboŋan ideh tonor hǝn aYesu b̃imat sile , naut kǝmas nǝvanuan gǝgǝras isob̃ur lotogǝmai . Namǝkot hǝn galito , eru arogǝmai .
40026061	Aruke , “ Ategai ike , ‘ Nolǝboi nǝb̃igol naim siGot b̃imasirsir ale um tǝtas hǝni len nǝmariboŋ b̃itor . ’ ”
40026062	Beti ab̃iltihai tutumav ile mǝhat ikel mai aYesu ke , “ Imabe gǝsakel natideh hǝn gǝb̃etǝtas gol gaiug ? Na-kel-koti-an sǝlaru ekitin a ? ”
40026063	Be aYesu sasor . Ale ab̃iltihai tutumav ikel maii ke , “ Nukel idaŋ mai gaiug len nahǝsan aGot nǝkadun nǝmauran , ke , gǝb̃evi aKristo , aNatun aGot , gikele mai ginamito ! ”
40026064	AYesu isor vari ke , “ Gaiug gukele tia . Be nukel mai gamit ke , gagai van dereh mǝteris aNatun Nǝvanuan b̃ebǝtah len navǝlan nǝmatu siGot tovi aB̃iltidaŋan . Dereh mǝteris b̃egǝmai len nǝmavukasw hǝn nǝmav . ”
40026065	Beti ab̃iltihai tutumav , nǝhon emǝkanun taṽtaṽor , itar nahurabat san hǝn b̃eṽusan tomǝtahun nasoruan siYesu . Ike , “ Gai isor mǝdas aGot ! Imabe datolǝŋon nǝvanuan ideh am hǝn b̃ikel kot nǝsaan sitegai ? Gamit mǝtosǝsǝloŋ hǝn tosor mǝdas aGot !
40026066	Gamit mǝtunau mab hǝni ? ” Lusor vari ke , “ Inor hǝn b̃imat ! Timasmat ! ”
40026067	Beti loṽulai nǝhon aYesu , lotuhi , luṽosi .
40026068	Lohǝlasi ke , “ Kristo , gǝtavi aKristo gepǝhav utaut ! Kel mai ginamito , ase iṽos gaiug ? ”
40026069	Len namityal enan aPita ebǝtah vivile len naholǝvat todar vis naim seb̃iltihai tutumav , ale natǝbarehreh tovi slev egǝm hǝni ike , “ Gaiug gutah mai aYesu ta Kalili . ”
40026070	Be len nǝhon alat lototoh ei aPita ike sakitin . Ike , “ Gusor husur nǝsa ? Ginau nǝsalǝboi nǝsa gotokele ! ”
40026071	Ale evi lan nametlǝkau , beti natǝbarehreh togon tovi slev erisi , ikel mai galit ei ke , “ Ategai itah mai aYesu ta Nasaret . ”
40026072	Ale aPita ikel tasi ke sakitin , ita gat nasoran san len nahǝsan aGot ike , “ Ginau nǝsalǝboi atenan ! ”
40026073	Len namityal tovan kǝkereh galevis lotoil pǝpadaŋ logǝm hǝni , lukel mai aPita ke , “ Kitin , gaiug am govi galit sua . Nǝboŋ namttosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nadolom̃ , namtosǝsǝloŋ lǝboii ke govi auleKalili , nadolom̃ ikel uri . ”
40026074	Beti len nahǝsan aGot aPita ita gati ke nǝsa tokele evi nakitinan . Ike , “ Len nahǝsan aGot nokitin , ginau nǝsalǝboi atenan ! Asike nǝb̃ekitin , aGot tipansem ginau ! ” Vǝha-sua ŋai natoulum̃an ekǝkǝraiko .
40026075	Beti aPita inau tǝlmam hǝn nǝsa aYesu tokele tia ke , “ A tahw hǝn natoulum̃an b̃ekǝkǝraiko , dereh gikel vǝha-tor hǝni ke gǝsalǝboi ginau . ”
40027001	Pelan han , dudulan som̃ilan , ab̃iltihai tutumav p̃isi mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail , lub̃onb̃on tǝtas hǝn lǝb̃ihol kitev nap̃isal hǝn lǝb̃igol aYesu b̃imat .
40027002	Beti lubaŋis gati , losǝhari van , loriŋi len navǝlan aPilate tovi gavna ta Rom .
40027003	AJutas , toriŋ aYesu len navǝlan aenemi san gail , nǝboŋ torisi ke nǝSanhitrin toriŋi ke aYesu b̃imat , aJutas ipair dan nǝsa togole . Ilav tǝlmam hǝn nakoin nasilva tovi 30 van hǝn ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail .
40027004	Isor tǝvah mai galit ke , “ Ginau nugol nǝsaan husur noriŋ ategaii len navǝlamito hǝn b̃imat naut kǝmas sagol kas natideh tosa . ” Ris lotoke , “ Natenan savi natideh len ginamito . Ipat len gaiug . ”
40027005	AJutas ibar hǝn nakoin nasilva gail len naim siGot . Beti evivile , itahǝtah hǝn gai gabag hǝn b̃imat .
40027006	Ab̃iltihai tutumav gail lulav nakoin galenan luke , “ Sanor len nalo hǝn datb̃eriŋ nǝvat egai hǝn b̃ib̃on mai nǝvat hǝn naim siGot bathut eb̃iŋb̃iŋal , eṽur nǝda hǝn nǝmatan sivan sua . ”
40027007	Imagenan , luhol b̃onb̃on . Nǝboŋ lotohol tonoŋ , loṽur nǝmarireu sivan sua togol natit hǝn nǝtan b̃ulau . Loṽur nǝtan enan hǝn b̃egǝm vi ut natǝtavunan simetb̃os gail .
40027008	Husur natenan , lokis nǝtan enan hǝn Marireu hǝn Nǝda van vǝbar nǝboŋ ta damǝŋai .
40027009	Beti nǝsa ahai kelkel ur , aJeremiah totosi , isarpoh . Ike , “ Lulav nakoin nasilva tovi 30 , nǝvat alat a Israel lotodam̃ hǝn lǝb̃eṽur atenan hǝni ,
40027010	ale loṽur nǝmarireu sivan sua togol natit hǝn nǝtan b̃ulau , hum Nasub̃ aGot tokele hǝn ginau . ”
40027011	Nǝboŋ lotosǝhar aYesu van hǝn nǝgavna ta Rom tonoŋ , eil len nǝhon . Ale agavna Pilate eusi ke , “ Gaiug govi kiŋ seJu gail a ? ” AYesu isor vari ke , “ Gaiug boh gukele . ”
40027012	Be nǝboŋ ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail lotoil hirhir lan , sor tasi , aYesu sakel natideh .
40027013	Beti aPilate eusi ke , “ Gǝsasǝsǝloŋ hǝn natit tosob̃ur lotosor tas gaiug hǝni a ? ”
40027014	Be aYesu sasor vari , sakel kas natuhsoruan ideh , gol nǝgavna ip̃aŋ habat lan .
40027015	Len Nǝhanan nǝPasova p̃isi , nǝgavna ikad naṽide sua . Idam̃ hǝn avan sua totoh len naim bǝbaŋis b̃evivile husur nalǝŋonian sinaluṽoh .
40027016	Len nǝboŋ enan , len naim bǝbaŋis , ikad naulum̃an sua nǝvanuan p̃isi lotolǝboii , nahǝsan aYesu Parappas .
40027017	Nǝboŋ naluṽoh lotob̃onb̃on sal , aPilate eus galit ke , “ Mǝtolǝŋon ke nigol ase tevivile ? AYesu Parappas o aYesu lotokisi hǝn aKristo ? ”
40027018	( APilate elǝboi buni ke naJu gail loriŋ aYesu len navǝlan husur lototab̃ulol bulosi . )
40027019	Len namityal enan , aPilate ebǝtah len nǝhai bǝtbǝtah hǝn nakotan . Nǝboŋ tobǝtah maienan , asoan esǝvat napisulan van hǝni toke , “ Sagigol natideh hǝn atenan tonor , bathut damǝŋai len nab̃ǝb̃er , nolǝŋon isa masuṽ husuri . ”
40027020	Avil ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail lusorsor mai naluṽoh hǝn lǝb̃igol husur galito , us aPilate hǝn b̃igol aParappas b̃evivile mai aYesu b̃imat .
40027021	Imaienan , nǝboŋ agavna tous galit tǝtas ke , “ Mǝtolǝŋon nǝb̃igol gǝlar ta be b̃evivile m̃os gamito ? ” Lusor vari ke , “ Parappas ! ”
40027022	APilate esǝhoṽut , eus galit ke , “ B̃imagenan , nigol nǝsa hǝn aYesu lotokisi hǝn aKristo ? ” Galit p̃is luke , “ Timat len nǝhai balbal ! ”
40027023	Ris aPilate tous galit ke , “ Bathut nǝsa ? Gai igol nǝsa tosa ? ” Be lukai habat van am ke , “ Timat len nǝhai balbal ! ”
40027024	Nǝboŋ aPilate tolǝboii ke edǝdas b̃igol natideh hǝn b̃egǝgel hǝn nǝnauan salito , be nab̃iltimǝdasian etub̃at len naluṽoh , ilav nasiloh topul hǝn nǝwai . Len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail ekǝkasǝval .
40027025	Beti nǝvanuan gail p̃isi lusor vari ke , “ Nǝda hǝn nǝmatan san tipat len ginamito , mai len nǝpasusan sinamito ! ”
40027026	Beti igol aParappas evivile m̃os galito , be igol nasoltia san tobilas habat hǝn aYesu .
40027027	Beti nasoltia sigavna gail losǝhar aYesu vi lohoim sisoltia gail , ale galit p̃isi lub̃onb̃on garu lan .
40027028	Lukol nahurabat san dani , lukol nahurabat bisibis hum sekiŋ lan .
40027029	Lovisvis hǝn nǝhau tokad nasunite tohum nab̃ulgǝgau , ale loriŋi len nǝkadun aYesu hum nǝkraun sekiŋ . Loriŋ natsua hun nǝhaie len navǝlan nǝmatu hum nǝhai sekiŋ . Beti lotǝŋedur bathurien , lotub̃at sor vilesi ke , “ Sal suh nakiŋ seJu gail ! ”
40027030	Loṽulaii , ale lusab̃ul natenan hun nǝhaie dani , luṽas nǝkadun hǝni .
40027031	Nǝboŋ lotosor vilesi tonoŋ , lukol nahurabat bisibis dani , lukol nahurabat san lan tǝtas , ale losǝhari van hǝn lǝb̃ip̃os gati len nǝhai balbal .
40027032	Len nǝyaran salit dan nab̃iltivile , lobubur mai auleSairin sua nahǝsan aSimon . Lugol atenan ipat nǝhai balbal siYesu .
40027033	Nǝboŋ lotobar naut a Kolkota ( namilen nahǝsenan tovi Naut hǝn Nabǝlashukadhutǝmat ) .
40027034	Lulav nǝwain lotobul hǝn natit tokon masuṽ lan maii , be nǝboŋ aYesu tomun risi , emǝtahuni .
40027035	Beti lup̃os gati len nǝhai balbal . Nǝboŋ lotop̃os gati tonoŋ , lopǝpehun nahurabat san , bar hǝn nǝvat hǝn lǝb̃isab̃ ase b̃ilav nahurabat ṽisusua .
40027036	Ale lobǝtah , kǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn aYesu ei .
40027037	Lutos gat nǝsa aYesu togole tosa , ale loriŋ na-kel-uri-an enan len nǝhai balbal a mǝhat hǝn nǝkadun . Ike , “ AYesu bogai , Kiŋ seJu gail . ”
40027038	Ikad nǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah eru artotahǝtah mai aYesu . Sual itahǝtah len nǝhai balbal len nǝmatu siYesu , togon len nǝmair san .
40027039	Nǝvanuan gail lotoṽot , lohǝlas aYesu , sor mǝdas nahǝsan . Loŋit nǝholit van hǝni ,
40027040	luke , “ Gaiug golǝboi gǝb̃igol naim siGot b̃imasirsir ale len nǝmariboŋ b̃itor um tǝlmam hǝni a ? B̃imagenan , gǝb̃evi aNatun aGot , lav kuv gaiug gabag ! Mariŋ dan nǝhai balbal ! ”
40027041	Len naṽide tomaienan , ab̃iltihai tutumav gail , alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail mai ahai p̃usan gail hǝn nalo lusor vilesi , luke ,
40027042	“ Gai ilav kuv nǝvanuan tile gail be edǝdas b̃ilav kuv gai ! Inau ke tovi kiŋ seIsrael a ? B̃imagenan , timariŋ dan nǝhai balbal ale dereh datedǝlomi ke tovi kiŋ .
40027043	Eriŋ nǝlon len aGot mai ike tovi aNatun aGot . Imagenan , gagai aGot b̃elǝŋoni , tilav kuvi . ”
40027044	Nǝvanuan vǝnvǝnah gǝlaru artotahǝtah tǝban aYesu , gǝlar am arokǝmaienan , arohǝlasi .
40027045	Len natub̃lial nǝmargobut ikabut gol p̃is naut kavkav van vǝbar namityal totor ut mǝdau .
40027046	Ale len namityal totor enan , aYesu ikai habat len nasoruan matmat san ke , “ Eli , eli , lema sapahtani ! ” namilen , “ Got sagw , Got sagw , goriŋ gab̃ulan ginau sil nǝsa ? ”
40027047	Nǝvanuan galevis lotoil ei lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni , lunau suluṽi , lunau ke tokis aElijah .
40027048	Vǝha-sua ŋai galit sua ilav nasponts
40027049	Be galevis am luke , “ Riŋi ! Datebunus risi ke aElijah dereh tegǝm lav kuvi o teb̃uer . ”
40027050	Beti aYesu ikai habat tǝtas am , emǝsol , imat .
40027051	Len namityal enan ŋai , nǝkaliko mǝtortor totahǝtah len naim siGot , tub̃at a mǝhat , emǝtar vǝbar naut a pan , igol nahudhut eru .
40027052	nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan losǝŋav . Ale aGot igol nǝvanuan isob̃ur lotovi esan lule mǝhat dan nǝmatan .
40027053	Ale lovivile dan nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan gail . Husur na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan siYesu lob̃is len nab̃iltivile siGot , a Jerusalem , ale lovisi hǝn nǝvanuan isob̃ur .
40027054	Nasenturion mai nasoltia gail lotokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn aYesu len nǝhai balbal , nǝboŋ lotoris nadu mai natit gail am lotovisi , lomǝtahw habat . Luke , “ Kitin , ategai evi aNatun aGot ! ”
40027055	Len naut enan ikad napǝhaṽut tosob̃ur lotohusur aYesu , kǝtkǝta tǝban len nǝyaran san a Kalili gǝmai . Alatenan loil a tut dan nǝhai balbal , lokǝta ris nǝsa tovisi .
40027056	Galit galevis lovi aMeri ta Maktala ; togon aMeri anan aJemes mai aJosef ; togon asoan aSepeti , anan aJemes mai aJon .
40027057	Nǝboŋ namityal pǝpadaŋ b̃imasur , aJosef tovi auleArimatea sua tokad natite mai tohusur aYesu ,
40027058	ivan hǝn aPilate . Eus niben aYesu . APilate idam̃ hǝni ale ikele idaŋ ke lipat niben mai aJosef .
40027059	Ŋa aJosef eruŋ gole len nǝkaliko tovi linen toveveu .
40027060	Eriŋi len nab̃urhuvat nǝtavunan san toveveu , tota p̃up̃uli tia len nǝvat . Erib hǝn nab̃iltivat hǝn b̃ipat gol nabopita hǝn nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan enan , ale ivan .
40027061	AMeri ta Maktala mai aMeri togon arobǝtah a m̃o , a tut kǝkereh dan nabopita hǝn nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan .
40027062	Pelan han , tovi nǝmariboŋ tohusur Nǝboŋ hǝn Nautautan hǝn nǝPasova , ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai naFarisi gail lub̃onb̃on , luvan hǝn aPilate .
40027063	Ale luke , “ Nasub̃ , namtunau tǝlmam hǝn nǝsa nǝvanuan gǝgǝras egaii tokele nǝboŋ tomaur sal . Ike , ‘ Len nǝmariboŋ titor dereh aGot tigol nile mǝhat . ’
40027064	Imaienan , namtuke gikele hǝn nasoltia sam̃ gail ke lekǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan vǝbar nǝmariboŋ titor . Asike datb̃igole , ahai susur san gail hum ma lǝb̃evǝnoh niben ale kel mai nǝvanuan gail ke tole mǝhat dan nǝmatan tia ! Ale b̃imaienan , nagǝgǝrasan enan dereh tesǝhor nagǝgǝrasan tokele a m̃o . ”
40027065	APilate isor var galit ke , “ Sǝhar nasoltia na-kǝtkǝta-kǝkol-an gail van , ale len namitisau ideh mǝttokade , mǝtekǝtkǝta kǝkol gat nab̃urhuvat . ”
40027066	Ale luvan , lokǝkol gat nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan , loriŋ na-burut-gati-an lan ale loriŋ nasoltia gail hǝn lǝb̃ekǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝni . Lugol natgalenan len nǝSappat .
40028001	Nǝboŋ nǝSappat enan tonoŋ , nǝmav topitau dudulan som̃ilan , len nǝmariboŋ metǝkav hǝn nawik ,
40028002	Vǝha-sua ŋai ikad nab̃iltidu , bathut aŋel sua siNasub̃ evi pan dan nǝmav , ale erib kuv nab̃iltivat topat gol nab̃urhuvat , ebǝtah lan .
40028003	Nǝnahǝnah han em̃ial hum nǝkabil mai nahurabat san epǝhw yesyes hum nasno .
40028004	Nasoltia gail lotokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn nab̃urhuvat , ninelit epil lan , lom̃inm̃inikot , luteh matmatiov .
40028005	Beti aŋel isor mai napǝhaṽut gǝlaru , ike , “ Samremǝtahw ! Nolǝboi mǝruke mǝreris aYesu lotogol tomat len nǝhai balbal .
40028006	Be gai satoh gegai , husur aGot igol ile mǝhat tia sum̃an ŋai aYesu tokele . Mǝregǝm ris naut topat lan .
40028007	Mirivan tutut ! Kel mai ahai susur san gail ke , ‘ Sǝsǝloŋ ! AGot igol ile mǝhat dan nǝmatan . Dereh teil a m̃o hǝn gamito vi lan naut a Kalili . Ale dereh mǝterisi ei . ’ Enan ŋai na-kel-uri-an sagw . ”
40028008	Napǝhaṽut gǝlaru arugam tutut dan nab̃urhuvat . Aromǝtahw be aropul hǝn nakemkeman ale arusaṽsaṽut hǝn arb̃ikele mai ahai susur san gail .
40028009	Vǝha-sua ŋai aYesu ebubur mai gǝlaru . Ike , “ Ivoi ! ” Arogǝm hǝni , arotǝgau gat narien gǝlaru , arulotu hǝni .
40028010	Beti aYesu ikel mai gǝlaru ke , “ Samremǝtahw . Mirivan , kel mai aṽagw gail ke levi lan naut a Kalili , ale dereh leris ginau ei . ”
40028011	Nǝboŋ napǝhaṽut gǝlaru artovan sal , nasoltia galevis lotokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn nab̃urhuvat nǝmatan lovi lan nab̃iltivile . Ale lukel ur natit p̃isi tovisi mai ab̃iltihai tutumav gail .
40028012	Ab̃iltihai tutumav gail lub̃onb̃on mai alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan gail ale ludam̃ hǝn na-sor-utaut-an sua . Lulav nǝvat isob̃ur mai nasoltia gail ,
40028013	lukel mai galit ke , “ Mǝtekǝmaiegai ke , ‘ Ahai susur san gail logǝm len mariug , lovǝnoh niben nǝboŋ namttopat . ’
40028014	Agavna Pilate b̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan , dereh namtetǝŋov nǝlon hǝn asike mǝtb̃ikad nǝpanismen ideh . ”
40028015	Imaienan , nasoltia gail lulav nǝvat enan , lugol nǝsa ab̃iltiJu gail lotokele . Na-kel-uri-an enan salito , naJu gail lukele van vǝbar nǝboŋ ta damǝŋai .
40028016	Beti ahai susur lotovi 11 lovi Kalili vi lan naṽehuh aYesu tokel mai galit tia hǝn lǝb̃evi lan .
