44019015	Avil nǝboŋ lotogole , nanunun nǝmargobut isor var galit ke , “ Nolǝboi aYesu ! Nǝsatǝtan hǝn aPol , avil gamit ase ? ”
44019016	Beti naulum̃an tokad nanunun nǝmargobut emǝlah van hǝn galito , idaŋ masuṽ , esǝhor galito gol ke lugam dan naim enan b̃urmalmal mai nǝda halit isel .
44019017	Nǝboŋ alat lototoh a Efesus , naJu gail mai alat a Kris p̃isi , lotosǝsǝloŋ lǝboi natenan , galit p̃isi lumaŋmaŋ lan ale loputsan nahǝsan Nasub̃ aYesu .
44019018	Galit lusob̃ur lotogǝm vi vanuan nadǝlomian , lusor tǝvah , lukel vǝhot nǝsa tosa lotogole .
44019019	Galit galevis lotogolgol nabehi a m̃o , lusah tuan nalob̃ulat na-golgol-behi-an salit gail , ale lopǝŋas p̃isi len nǝhon nǝvanuan gail . Lǝtake lǝtap̃ur hǝn nalob̃ulat gail , nǝvat halit tavi nakoin nasilva tavi 50,000 .
44019020	Len naṽide tomagenan aGot eṽusan nǝdaŋan san , ŋa nǝvanuan lusob̃ur am losǝsǝloŋ hǝn nasoruan siNasub̃ tobar nǝlolit am .
44019021	Nǝboŋ natgalenan lotonoŋ , len nanunun aPol inau ke tiyar tur len naprovens Masetonia mai a Akaia vi Jerusalem . Ike , “ Nǝboŋ nǝb̃ivan ei b̃inoŋ nimasvi Rom am . ”
44019022	Ŋa esǝvat nǝvanuan na-vi-tarhǝte-an san eru , aTimoti mai aErastus vi Masetonia , be gai sǝb̃on itoh ebǝlav kǝkereh am len naprovens Asia .
44019023	Len nǝboŋ enan , len nab̃iltivile Efesus ikad nab̃iltib̃alan tomǝdas alat lotohusur nap̃isal siNasub̃ .
44019024	Ikad naulum̃an sual ei , nahǝsan aTemetrius toum hǝn natuhlablab hǝn naim nalotuan siArtemis hǝn nasilva . Eliv nǝvat isob̃ur m̃os alat lotoum len nasilva .
44019025	Igol esan gail lub̃onb̃on mai alat lotoum len nasilva am , ale ike , “ Lalum̃an , mǝtolǝboii ke dattolav nǝvat tosob̃ur len nabisnis egai .
44019026	Mǝtoris lǝboii , mǝtosǝsǝloŋ lǝboii ke , savi geg a Efesus sǝb̃on ŋai , be len pǝpadaŋ hǝn naprovens Asia kavkav , atenan , aPol , esǝhar nǝvanuan isob̃ur . Egǝras galit ke nagot gail , nǝvanuan lotoum hǝni , lǝsavi got kitin .
44019027	Ehum nǝhes hǝn nauman sidato b̃egǝm b̃isa , mai len nǝnauan salit p̃isi ehun naim nalotuan siArtemis , nagot tovi pǝhaṽut toyalyal , b̃egǝm vi ut kǝmas . Alitenan , nǝyalyalan san dereh timasig len nǝnauan silat a Asia mai navile a pan lotolotu hǝni ! ”
44019028	Nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni , nǝlolit ipaŋpaŋ masuṽ , lukai habat ke , “ Artemis ta Efesus iyalyal buni ! ”
44019029	Sǝdareh nab̃iltivile enan epul hǝn nadǝdarŋab̃uan mai nǝlol paŋpaŋ . Naluṽoh lom̃ur vi lan naut hǝn nab̃iltib̃onb̃onan , loliv gargar aKaius mai aAristarkus , auleMasetonia gǝlaru artoyar mai aPol .
44019030	Be nǝboŋ aPol toke tivan hǝn b̃isor mai naluṽoh , ahai susur gail lomǝtahusi .
44019031	Beti galevis am , lotoil a m̃o len naprovens Asia , lotolǝmas aPol , lopisul van hǝni ke , satevi lan nab̃iltib̃onb̃onan .
44019032	Len naut enan galevis lukai hǝn natsua , galevis am lukai hǝn natsua tile am husur nab̃onb̃onan edǝdarŋab̃u , ale isob̃ur lǝsalǝboii ke nab̃onb̃onan salit m̃os nǝsa .
44019033	NaJu gail lorusan aAleksada vi m̃o ale galevis len naluṽoh lukel maii hǝn nǝsa b̃ikele . Beti eb̃il hǝn navǝlan hǝn lǝb̃emǝdau hǝn b̃isor gol gai gabag .
44019034	Nǝboŋ naluṽoh lotokǝta lǝboii ke aAleksada tovi Ju , lomǝtahuni , lub̃on hǝn lotokai ke , “ Artemis ta Efesus iyalyal buni ! ” Imaienan hǝn nǝhaua toru .
44019035	Nǝboŋ aklak hǝn nab̃iltivile tosor ṽǝhṽǝh naluṽoh hǝn lǝb̃emǝdau ike , “ Lalum̃an a Efesus , nǝvanuan p̃isi lolǝboii ke nab̃iltivile Efesus ekǝtkǝta tǝban naim nalotuan siArtemis toyalyal mai nǝvat mot san toteh dan nǝmav .
44019036	Husur ke sǝkad avan ideh hǝn b̃ike natgalenan lǝsakitin , mǝtemǝdau , samtigol natit tomelmel .
44019037	Mǝtosǝhar alaruenan gǝm gegai be arsavi vanuan navǝnvǝnahan gǝlaru hǝn naim nalotuan mai arsasǝvar nagot pǝhaṽut sidato .
44019038	ATemetrius mai alat lotoum len nasilva maii lǝb̃isor mǝtahun avan ideh , nakotan gail losǝŋav , ikad nǝmatsistret gail ; ivoi ke leriŋ nakoblenan salito len nakotan galen ideh .
44019039	Mǝtb̃elǝŋon natideh am , datib̃onb̃on tivoi hum nalo tokele , hǝn datb̃igole tinor .
44019040	Husur nǝsa tovisi damǝŋai , hum ma alat a Rom lǝb̃isor tas gidato husur na-b̃onb̃on-b̃unoh-an sidato top̃erhado , bathut savi m̃os natideh . ”
44019041	Nǝboŋ tokǝmaienan tonoŋ , esǝvat galit ke livan .
44020001	Nǝboŋ nǝwalan hǝn nadǝdarŋab̃uan enan tonoŋ , aPol ekis ahai susur gail gǝmai . Nǝboŋ togol lotolǝŋon tovoi am len nǝlolito , esudǝlam̃ galito ale evi Masetonia .
44020002	Iyar tur len naut gail a Masetonia , isor habat mai nǝvanuan nadǝlomian gail ei gol lolǝŋon ivoi am len nǝlolito . Beti ibar naut a Kris .
44020003	Itoh ei hǝn nahǝbati itor . APol eutaut hǝn b̃iwol vi Siria nǝboŋ tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke tokad na-sor-utaut-an seJu lotovi enemi san gail hǝn lǝb̃emǝdasi . Imagenan egǝgel hǝn nǝnauan san , inau ke tiyar tur len naprovens Masetonia vi Siria .
44020004	Nǝvanuan galevis lutah mai aPol , ikad aSopata tovi anatun aPirrhus ta Perea , aAristarkus mai aSekudus ta Tessalonika , aKaius ta Terpe , aTimoti mai alaruevis ta Asia , aTikikus mai aTrofimus .
44020005	Alatenan lotovan a m̃o lutoh vir ginamito len naut a Troas .
44020006	Husur nǝboŋ hǝn Nǝhanan hǝn nabǝta sǝkad nayis lan , namtoriŋ naut a Filippi , namtuwol vi Troas len nǝmariboŋ erim . Namtub̃on tǝtas mai galito ale namtutoh ei nawik esua .
44020007	Len nǝmariboŋ nametǝkav hǝn nawik , namtub̃on mai nǝvanuan nadǝlomian gail hǝn namtb̃ihan b̃onb̃on . APol isor van hǝn galito vǝbar tub̃loh len mariug husur pelan han dereh tivan .
44020008	Len narum̃ a mǝhat namttob̃onb̃on lan , ikad nam̃ial isob̃ur .
44020009	Amantuhmar sua , nahǝsan aEutikus , ebǝtah len natuhbopita tosǝŋav . Ale nǝboŋ aPol tosorsor van , namǝtan atenan inoṽ van vǝbar ipat buŋbuŋol , iteh dan naim nastori totor vi pan . Nǝboŋ lotopat risi lusab̃i ke tomat .
44020010	Be aPol evi pan , ipat husuri , eriŋ navǝlan garu lan , ale ike , “ Samtinau masuṽ hǝni , imaur tia ! ”
44020011	Beti galit p̃isi lotǝlmam vi mǝhat , aPol ilav nabǝta , eb̃uri ale luhan b̃onb̃on hǝni . Nǝboŋ lotohani tonoŋ , aPol isor tǝtas vǝbar nǝmav topitau , ale ivan .
44020012	Beti galit losǝhar nǝmantuhmar tomaur vahim . Lolǝŋon ivoi habat am len nǝlolito .
44020013	Namtovi m̃o vi lan nǝwag wol ale namtuwol vi Assos hǝn namtb̃eusan aPol ei husur isor utaut maienan hǝn b̃iyar vi Assos len tan sǝb̃on .
44020014	Nǝboŋ tobubur mai ginamito len naut a Assos , namtousani ale namtuwol vi Mitilin .
44020015	Pelan han namtoriŋ naut enan , namtuwol van salsal a tut hǝn naholoul Kios . Pelan han am namtubar naholoul Sam̃os ale pelan tǝtas am namtubar navile a Miletus .
44020016	APol ike tiwol tukot a Efesus hǝn asike b̃itoh b̃ebǝlav len naprovens Asia , husur etutut hǝn ke hum ma b̃ibar naut a Jerusalem a tahw hǝn nǝboŋ hǝn naPentikost .
44020017	Len naut a Miletus episul vi Efesus , eus ke alat lotoil a m̃o silat siYesu ei legǝm risi .
44020018	Nǝboŋ lotogǝm hǝni ikel mai galit ke , “ Mǝtolǝboi naṽide hǝn nǝmauran sagw len nǝboŋ metǝkav notobar naprovens Asia , ale nototah mai gamit len natohan sagw ei kavkav .
44020019	Noum siNasub̃ . Len na-lǝŋon-isa-an sagw , nǝlogw emǝdau , nǝsǝnau ginau , namǝtarur sagw isel , be nudaŋ b̃uri naut kǝmas natit p̃isi tosa naJu gail lotogole nǝboŋ lotosor utaut hǝn lǝb̃emǝdas ginau .
44020020	Nǝsatǝgau gat natideh b̃evi tarhǝt samito , nusor vǝhot na-kel-uri-an tovoi , noṽusan gamito len nǝhon nǝvanuan p̃isi mai len naim ṽisusua .
44020021	Nukel p̃uli mai naJu gail mai alat a Kris ke lipair m̃au dan nǝsaan van hǝn aGot , ale leriŋ nǝlolit m̃au len aYesu , aMasta sidato .
44020022	“ Gagai aNunun aGot italtal hǝn ke , ginau nǝb̃evi Jerusalem naut kǝmas ke nǝsalǝboi nǝsa b̃evisi hǝn ginau ei .
44020023	Nolǝboii ŋai ke , len navile p̃isi notovi lan aNunun aGot ikel nalǝlǝgauan mai ginau ke , nǝvanuan gail dereh leriŋ ginau len naim bǝbaŋis mai ligol ginau nelǝŋon tisa masuṽ .
44020024	Avil nunau ke nǝmauran sagw evi ut kǝmas hǝn ginau . Nolǝŋon ŋai ke nibar nagilen nǝgaman sagw , ale um vurvur nauman Nasub̃ aYesu tolavi mai ginau , ke , nikel kot na-kel-uri-an tovoi hǝn navoian aGot toviol kǝmas hǝni .
44020025	“ Len nǝyaran sagw , nukel ur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot mai gamito , be gagai nolǝboii ke asike mǝtoris nǝhogw am .
44020026	Imaienan nukel koti mai gamit ke , len nǝboŋ damǝŋai nǝsa b̃evisi hǝn gamit tipat len gamito ! Asike ipat len ginau am ,
44020027	bathut nǝsatǝgau gat natideh hǝn nǝb̃esusuani dan gamito . Nukel nalǝŋonian kavkav siGot mai gamito .
44020028	Mǝtelǝlǝgau hǝn gamito , mǝtekǝtkǝta tǝban navǝshǝsipsip samito lotovi alat siYesu . ANunun aGot igol ke mǝttoil a m̃o hǝn alat siGot , aGot toṽur galit hǝn nǝda hiNatun san .
44020029	Ginau nolǝboii ke , nǝboŋ nǝb̃ivan tia dereh galevis legǝm len gamito sum̃an nalipah katkat gail . Dereh lemǝdas navǝshǝsipsip siYesu .
44020030	Gamit galevis , dereh lile mǝhat , pair hǝn nakitinan hǝn lǝb̃egǝras ahai susur gail , hǝn ahai susur gail lǝb̃ehusur galito .
44020031	Imagenan mǝtehulahul ! Mitinau gati ke , len nasihau totor nǝsǝŋavŋav be nukel nalǝlǝgauan tabtab mai gamit ṽisusua len nalennǝyal mai nalenmariug . Vǝha-sob̃sob̃ur nutaŋis gamit p̃isi .
44020032	“ Gagai neriŋ gamit len navǝlan aGot . Mitinau gat nasoruan husur navoian san tolǝboi b̃igol mǝtb̃idaŋ am mai b̃eviol mai gamit hǝn nǝsa b̃evi samit balai , gamit mǝttovi siGot .
44020033	Nǝsalǝŋon nagol , nasilva o nahurabat sivan ideh .
44020034	Gamit , mǝtolǝboii ke , noum hǝn navǝlagw hǝn ke ginau mai alat lototah mai ginau , namtsǝpar titideh .
44020035	Len natit p̃isi notogole , noṽusani ke datimasum tidaŋ magenan hǝn datb̃evi tarhǝt silat lǝsǝdaŋ . Mitinau gat nasoruan siNasub̃ aYesu toke , ‘ AGot tigol navoian van hǝn alat lotoviol sǝhor alat lotolav naviolan . ’ ”
44020036	Nǝboŋ aPol tosor tonoŋ , etǝŋedur , gai mai galit p̃isi ale isor tuṽ .
44020037	Galit p̃isi lutaŋ habat ; lolugum̃ gat aPol , losum̃ nǝtarhon .
44020038	Lulolosa masuṽ bathut nǝsa tokele ke , asike lorisi am . Beti losǝhari vi lan nǝwag wol .
44021001	Nǝboŋ namttoriŋ galit tia , namtuwol inor van vǝbar naut a Kos , ale pelan han namtubar naholoul Rotes , beti namtovi Patara .
44021002	Nǝboŋ namttosab̃ nǝwag wolwol b̃evi Fonisia , namtusah lan , namtuwol .
44021003	Namtoris naholoul Saiprus , ale nǝboŋ namttowol dani len nǝmair sinamito namtuwol vi Siria . Namtubar naut a Tair husur nǝwag wol tedǝdaŋ tite ei .
44021004	Namtusab̃ ahai susur galevis , ale namtutoh ei nǝmariboŋ emǝlevru . Len aNunun aGot galit lukel mai aPol ke satevi mǝhat vi Jerusalem .
44021005	Nǝboŋ namttotoh ei tonoŋ , namtoriŋ naut enan len nǝyaran sinamito . Galit p̃isi mai asoalit mai anatulit luyar mai ginamito vi lan nǝtarhǝvile . Len nabitas ei ginamit p̃isi namtotǝŋadur , namtusor tuṽ ,
44021006	ale namtosudǝlam̃ ginamit gabag . Namtusah len nǝwag wol , be galito luvahim .
44021007	Namtuwol a Tair van vǝbar naut a Ptolemais . Len naut enan namtuke , “ Ivoi , ” mai nǝvanuan nadǝlomian gail ale namtutoh mai galito hǝn nǝmariboŋ esua .
44021008	Pelan han namtovi Sisarea ale namtutoh mai a Filip tokelkel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi , tovi vanuan sua len natikon lotomǝlevru .
44021009	Gai ikad anatvavin ivat lotovi vensus lotokel ur nǝsa aGot tokel mai galito .
44021010	Nǝboŋ namttotoh ei len nǝmariboŋ galevis , ahai kelkel ur sua , nahǝsan aAkapus egǝm len naut a Jutea gǝm vi pan .
44021011	Egǝm hǝn ginamito , ilav nǝhau tutuṽ siPol ale ibaŋis gat gabag narien mai navǝlan p̃isi hǝni . Ike , “ ANunun aGot ekǝmaiegai ke , ‘ Naulum̃an nǝhau tutuṽ egai tovi esan , alat a Jutea len naut a Jerusalem dereh libaŋis gati hǝn lǝb̃eriŋi len navǝlan alat lǝsavi Ju . ’ ”
44021012	Nǝboŋ namttosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natgalenan , ginamit mai alat lotosuh ei namtoŋiri ke , aPol satevi Jerusalem .
44021013	Beti aPol isor var ginamit ke , “ Mǝtumabe ? Mǝtutaŋ , ale nǝlogw itaŋis habat hǝn gamito . Be savi nǝ-baŋis-gati-an ŋai notoutaut hǝni , noutaut hǝn nǝb̃imat len naut a Jerusalem sil nahǝsan Nasub̃ aYesu . ”
44021014	Husur namttohisi sob̃uer , namtsasor am be namtuke , “ Nǝsa Nasub̃ tolǝŋoni m̃au tevisi . ”
44021015	Husur nǝboŋ galenan namtoutaut ale namtovi mǝhat vi Jerusalem .
44021016	Ahai susur galevis a Sisarea lutah mai ginamito , ale losǝhar ginamit vi lan naim siMnason , auleSaiprus sua tovi ahai susur a m̃o tia , ale namtutoh maii .
44021017	Nǝboŋ namttobar naut a Jerusalem , nǝvanuan nadǝlomian gail lohǝhaṽur hǝn namttogǝmai .
44021018	Pelan han namtutah mai aPol hǝn namtb̃eris aJemes , ale alat lotoil a m̃o silat siYesu logǝmai .
44021019	APol ikel na-ke-ivoi-an mai galito , ale isor husur natit p̃isi ṽisusua aGot togole len alat lǝsavi Ju nǝboŋ aPol toum m̃os galito .
44021020	Alat lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natgalenan lusor sal suh aGot ale lukel mai aPol ke , “ Wawa , goris lǝboii ke naJu gail lusob̃ur masuṽ logǝm vi vanuan nadǝlomian gail . Galit p̃isi lolǝŋon buni ke lehusur nalo .
44021021	Losǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-kel-uri-an husur gaiug ke , gotoṽusan naJu gail lotosuh mai alat lǝsavi Ju ke lipair dan aMoses , saletiv dalus anatulit gail ale salehusur naṽide seJu gail .
44021022	Dereh lesǝsǝloŋ hǝn gotogǝmai , ale namtigol nǝsa ?
44021023	Gigol nǝsa namttokel mai gaiug bai . Ikad ivat len ginamito lotogol na-kel-gati-an van hǝn aGot .
44021024	Gitah mai galito , gigol giveveu len nǝhon aGot mai galito , ale lav nǝvat mai galit hǝn lǝb̃esir nǝkadulito . Imagenan nǝvanuan p̃isi dereh lelǝboii ke , nǝsa lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni husur gaiug sakitin , avil ke gaiug gugol husur nalo siMoses .
44021025	Be tarhǝt alat lǝsavi Ju , namtutosi tia ke salihan namǝŋod tovi violan len natutumavan van hǝn nǝlablab , salihan nǝda o namǝŋod nǝhau tobaŋis bun navǝdolon mai saligol naitian tosa . ”
44021026	Pelan han aPol esǝhar alalum̃an ale lugol luveveu . Beti eb̃is len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot hǝn b̃ikel ur nǝboŋ hǝn nanoŋan hǝn naveveuan salito , nǝboŋ ahai tutumav b̃etutumav hǝn naviolan m̃os galit ṽisusua .
44021027	Nǝboŋ nǝmariboŋ tomǝlevru pǝpadaŋ hǝn tonoŋ , naJu galevis ta Asia loris aPol len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot . Nasoran salito igol naluṽoh kavkav nǝlolit ipaŋpaŋ van lutah gat aPol ,
44021028	lukai ke , “ UleIsrael gail , mǝtevi tarhǝt sinamito ! Ategai evi naulum̃an toṽusan nǝvanuan p̃isi len naut p̃isi . Len nap̃usanan san isor tas nǝvanuan sidat gail , nalo sidato mai naut egai . A mǝhat hǝn natgalenan , esǝhar auleKris gail vi lan naut siGot , gol ke naut tolo egai eb̃iŋb̃iŋal len nǝhon aGot . ”
44021029	( Lokǝmaienan husur lotoris aTrofimus ta Efesus
44021030	Beti nǝvanuan len nab̃iltivile kavkav , nǝlolit ipaŋpaŋ , lom̃ur b̃onb̃on , tah gat aPol , liv gargari dan naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot , ale vǝha-sua ŋai nabopita gail lokǝkol .
44021031	Nǝboŋ lotohisi hǝn lǝb̃iṽabuni , na-kel-uri-an ibar nakomada toil a m̃o hǝn nasoltia gail p̃isi siRom ei ,
44021032	Vǝha-sua ŋai esǝhar nasoltia mai nasenturion
44021033	Beti nakomada egǝm hǝn aPol , itah gati , ale ikel mai nasoltia gail ke , libaŋis gati hǝn natsen teru . Ale eus naluṽoh ke nahǝsan ase mai igol nǝsa .
44021034	Galevis len naluṽoh lukai hǝn natsua , galevis am lukai hǝn natsual am . Ale husur edǝdas b̃elǝboi nǝsa tovisi bathut nǝwalan , ike nasoltia gail lesǝhar aPol vi lan naim sisoltia gail .
44021035	Nǝboŋ aPol tobar na-mel-pǝlpǝlau-an hǝn naim sisoltia gail , lupati husur nab̃iltilol paŋpaŋ sinaluṽoh .
44021036	Naluṽoh lotohusur galito lukaikai ke , “ Ṽabuni ! Ṽabuni ! ”
44021037	Nǝboŋ lotosǝhsǝhar aPol vi lohoim sisoltia gail , aPol eus nakomada ke , “ Nolǝboi nǝb̃isor mai gaiug ? ” Atenan isor vari ke , “ Golǝboi nasoruan ta Kris a ?
44021038	Be gaiug gǝsavi uleIjip togol nǝb̃alan mai a Rom a m̃o , ale tosǝhar alalum̃an lotogolgol nǝmatan lotovi 4000 vi lan naut masmas a ? ”
44021039	APol ike , “ Ao , ginau novi naJu , auleTarsus a Silisia , naulum̃an hǝn nab̃iltivile enan . Nous gaiug ke , nolǝboi nǝb̃isor mai nǝvanuan galeg bai a ? ”
44021040	Nǝboŋ todam̃ hǝni aPol eil len na-mel-pǝlpǝlau-an ale eb̃il hǝn navǝlan van hǝn naluṽoh . Nǝboŋ naut tob̃ut , isor mai galit len nasoruan seIpru gail ke ,
44022001	“ Lalum̃an , aṽagw gail mai atǝmagw gail , mǝtesǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-sor-gole-an sagw tokitin . ”
44022002	Nǝboŋ lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke tosor len nasoruan seIpru gail , naut eb̃ut habat ale ike ,
44022003	“ Ginau novi Ju sua , anagw ipas ginau len naut a Tarsus a Silisia . Notibau len nab̃iltivile egai . Nǝboŋ notosǝkul , ahai p̃usan sagw aKamaliel . Len nap̃usanan san nosǝkul lǝboi bun nalo setǝmadit ta sutuai . Nolǝŋon masuṽ hǝn notohusur aGot sum̃an gamit p̃isi damǝŋai .
44022004	Ginau nomǝdas tabtab hǝn alat lotohusur nap̃isal siNasub̃ , nugol isa hǝn galito van vǝbar nǝmatan salito . Nubaŋis gat alalum̃an mai alatpǝhaṽut , bar hǝn galit len naim bǝbaŋis .
44022005	Ab̃iltihai tutumav mai alat lotoil a m̃o seJu gail lolǝboi lǝb̃ikel koti m̃os ginau ke notokitin . Galit lulav nalob̃ulat napisulan gail mai ginau van hǝn naJu gail a Tamaskus . Ale nuvan hǝn nǝb̃ibaŋis gat alat lototoh ei , sǝhar tǝlmam hǝn galit vi Jerusalem hǝn lǝb̃ipanis .
44022006	“ Nǝboŋ notoyar van , pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut a Tamaskus tub̃lial , vǝha-sua ŋai nam̃ial togǝm len nǝmav tom̃ial habat ebilas ginau .
44022007	Ale nuteh len tan , nosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nadoldol tous ginau ke , ‘ Sol , Sol , gomǝdas tabtab hǝn ginau hǝn nǝsa ? ’
44022008	Nusor vari ke , ‘ Gaiug ase Nasub̃ ? ’ Beti ikel mai ginau ke , ‘ Ginau aYesu ta Nasaret gotomǝdas bun ginau . ’
44022009	Alat lototah mai ginau loris nam̃ial tom̃ial habat be lǝsasǝsǝloŋ hǝn nadoldol tosor mai ginau .
44022010	Nousi ke , ‘ Nasub̃ , nigol nǝsa bai ? ’ Nasub̃ ikel mai ginau ke , ‘ Gile mǝhat , geb̃is len nab̃iltivile a Tamaskus . Avan sual ei dereh tikel mai gaiug natit p̃isi notoriŋi len gaiug hǝn gǝb̃igole . ’
44022011	Nodǝdas nǝb̃ekǝta sil nam̃ial enan tobilas ginau . Ŋa alat lototah mai ginau lotǝgau navǝlagw , losǝhar ginau vi lan naut a Tamaskus .
44022012	“ Naulum̃an sua , nahǝsan aAnanias egǝm hǝn ginau . Evi vanuan tohusur kitin hǝn nap̃isal siGot mai tohusur nalo , ale naJu gail ei luke tovoi .
44022013	Eil tǝban ginau ale ike , ‘ Wawa Sol , gekǝta vi mǝhat , nakǝtaan sam̃ etǝlmam ! ’ Vǝha-sua ŋai nokǝta vi mǝhat , norisi .
44022014	Beti ike , ‘ AGot setǝmadit ta sutuai itabtabuh len gaiug hǝn gǝb̃elǝboi nalǝŋonian san , hǝn gǝb̃eris Nǝvanuan Nanoran mai hǝn gǝb̃esǝsǝloŋ hǝn nadolon .
44022015	Husur dereh gevi vanuan san hǝn gǝb̃ikel kot nǝsa gotorisi mai gotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni mai nǝvanuan p̃isi .
44022016	Ale govǝlo hǝn nǝsa ? Gile mǝhat , gibaptais , ale gisor mai Nasub̃ hǝn b̃ekǝkas kuv nǝsaan sam̃ gail . ’
44022017	“ Notǝlmam vi Jerusalem ale nǝboŋ notosor tuṽ len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot , noris na-kǝta-risi-an sua togǝm len nǝmav ei .
44022018	Noris aYesu tokel mai ginau ke , ‘ Getutut , gam dan naut a Jerusalem husur asike lodǝlom na-kel-koti-an sam̃ husur ginau . ’
44022019	Ale nuke , ‘ Nasub̃ , galit lolǝboii ke , len naim nab̃onb̃onan p̃isi seJu nubaŋis gat alat lotoriŋ nǝlolit len gaiug ale nuṽas galito .
44022020	Ale nǝboŋ nǝda hiSteven tosel , gai tosor vi tarhǝt sam̃ , ginau noil pǝpadaŋ , nudam̃ mai alat lototubuni . Nokǝta tǝban nahurabat salito . ’
44022021	Beti ikel mai ginau ke , ‘ Givan , nesǝvat gaiug vi tut van hǝn naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tiltile gail . ’ ”
44022022	Naluṽoh losǝsǝloŋ hǝn aPol vǝbar tokǝmaienan . Be nǝboŋ toke aGot tosǝvati van hǝn alat lǝsavi Ju , lukai habat ke , “ Lav kuvi dan navile a pan ! Sanor ke b̃imaur am . ”
44022023	Lukai van ale lubarbar hǝn nahurabat salit gail mai nǝmasiav vi mǝhat .
44022024	Nakomada ikel mai nasoltia gail ke , lesǝhar aPol vi lohoim salito ale bilasi , usi hǝn lǝb̃isab̃i ke , husur nǝsa naluṽoh lotokai van hǝni maienan .
44022025	Avil nǝboŋ lotoliv gat navǝlan mai narien aPol , baŋis gat gail hǝn lǝb̃ebilasi , eus nasenturion toil tǝban ke , “ Inor ke mǝtebilas auleRom sua nakotan sǝsab̃i ke tosab ? ”
44022026	Nǝboŋ nasenturion tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn natenan , ivan hǝn nakomada ale ikel maii ke , “ Guke gigol nǝsa ? Atenan evi auleRom . ”
44022027	Nakomada egǝm hǝn aPol , eusi ke , “ Kel mai ginau , govi auleRom m̃au ? ” Ale ike , “ Evoi . ”
44022028	Beti nakomada ike , “ Nulav nǝvat tosob̃ur mai alat a Rom hǝn notogǝm vi uleRom . ” Ris aPol toke , “ Be ginau boh , nǝboŋ lotopas ginau novi uleRom . ”
44022029	Vǝha-sua ŋai alalum̃an pǝpadaŋ hǝn lǝb̃ebilas aPol mai lǝb̃eusi hǝn nausian gail , lovi tut dani . Nakomada am emǝtahw husur inau lǝboii ke , tobaŋis gat aPol tovi uleRom kitin hǝn natsen .
44022030	Pelan han nakomada ike telǝboii ke alat lotoil a m̃o seJu gail lukot hǝn aPol hǝn nǝsa . Ale isah rub̃at aPol , ale ikele idaŋ ke ab̃iltihai tutumav mai nǝSanhitrin kavkav lebǝtah . Beti esǝhar aPol vi pan , gol ke eil a m̃o len nǝholito .
44023001	Nǝboŋ aPol tokǝta mǝtaltal van hǝn nǝSanhitrin ike , “ Lalum̃an , aṽagw gail , len nǝmauran kavkav sagw len nǝhon aGot nǝlogw imasil vǝbar damǝŋai . ”
44023002	Beti ab̃iltihai tutumav , aAnanias ikel mai alat lotoil tǝban aPol ke liṽos nabuŋon .
44023003	APol ipair van hǝni ike , “ AGot tiṽas gaiug , gohum napisbile tob̃iŋb̃iŋal gotopiti topǝhapǝhw !
44023004	Alat lotoil tǝban luke , “ Imabe gotosor tosa hǝn ab̃iltihai tutumav siGot ? ”
44023005	Ale aPol ike , “ Aṽagw gail , nǝsalǝboii ke tovi b̃iltihai tutumav , husur len natosian siGot ike , ‘ Sagisor tisa hǝn avan ideh toil a m̃o hǝn nǝvanuan sam̃ gail . ’ ”
44023006	Nǝboŋ aPol tokǝta lǝboii ke galevis lovi Sattiusi , galevis am lovi Farisi , ikai van hǝn nǝSanhitrin ke , “ Aṽagw gail , novi Farisi sua , notovi anatun siFarisi gail . Lukot hǝn ginau husur nǝ-vatvat-viri-an mai na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan ! ”
44023007	Nǝboŋ tokǝmaienan , naFarisi gail mai naSattiusi gail lotub̃at sor b̃alb̃al ale nab̃onb̃onan egǝm nǝtarhǝt eru .
44023008	( NaSattiusi gail luke sǝkad na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan , sǝkad aŋel ideh o nanunun ideh , be naFarisi gail lodǝlomi ke ikad galen p̃isi . )
44023009	Na-sor-b̃alb̃al-an iwal habat . Galevis lotovi hai p̃usan hǝn nalo siMoses lotovi Farisi am , lule mǝhat , lusor b̃al habat ke , “ Namtsǝsab̃ natideh tosab len ategai . Hum ma nanunun ideh o aŋel ideh m̃au tosor maii . ”
44023010	Nǝboŋ lotosor b̃alb̃al van , nakomada emǝtahw ke , dereh lisah pǝpas aPol , ale ikel mai nasoltia gail ke , levi pan , ale len nǝdaŋan salito lesǝhar kuvi dan nǝSanhitrin vi lan naim sisoltia gail .
44023011	Len mariug enan Nasub̃ eil tǝban aPol ike , “ Gitah gat nǝlom̃ ! Gukel kot natit gail husur ginau len naut a Jerusalem , imagenan gimaskel koti len naut a Rom am . ”
44023012	Len nadudulan naJu gail lub̃onb̃on , luta gat na-kel-gati-an ke lukolkol hǝn nǝhanan mai namunan van vǝbar nǝboŋ lǝb̃igol aPol b̃imat .
44023013	Nǝvanuan lotob̃onb̃on len na-sor-utaut-an enan lusob̃ur sǝhor 40 .
44023014	Luvan hǝn ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai alat lotoil a m̃o seJu gail ale luke , “ Namtukel gati ke sanamtihan ris natideh vir namtb̃igol aPol b̃imat .
44023015	Imaienan , gamito mai nǝSanhitrin , mitikel mai nakomada ke , tesǝhar aPol van hǝn gamito sum̃an ke mǝtb̃ike mǝtb̃isab̃ nakitinan am husuri . Namtoutaut hǝn namtb̃igole b̃imat a tahw hǝn b̃ibar gamito . ”
44023016	Nǝboŋ ailoan ulum̃an matmat siPol tosǝsǝloŋ hǝn na-sor-utaut-an enan , evi lan naim sisoltia gail , eb̃is lan ale ikel uri mai aPol .
44023017	APol ekis nasenturion sua gǝmai ale ike , “ Gesǝhar nǝmantuhmar egai van hǝn nakomada samito hǝn b̃ikel ur natsua mai atenan . ”
44023018	Ŋa esǝhari van hǝn nakomada . Nasenturion ikel maii ke , “ APol , dattotah gati len naim sidato , ekis ginau , ale eus ginau ke nesǝhar nǝmantuhmar egai gǝm hǝn gaiug . Ikad natsua hǝn b̃ikele mai gaiug . ”
44023019	Nakomada etǝgau navǝlan ailoan aPol , elivi hǝn arb̃isor sǝb̃olaru . Eusi ke , “ Guke gikel ur nǝsa mai ginau ? ”
44023020	Isor vari ke , “ NaJu gail ludam̃ mai galit gabag ke , pelan dereh leus gaiug hǝn gǝb̃esǝhar aPol vi pan van hǝn nǝSanhitrin hǝn lǝb̃isab̃ nakitinan am husuri , be logǝgǝras .
44023021	Sagedǝlom galito . Lalum̃an lotosob̃ur sǝhor 40 losusuah , toh vir nagǝmaian siPol . Lukel gati ke salihan , salemun vǝbar lǝb̃igol aPol b̃imat . Gagai loutaut vir gaiug ke gǝb̃idam̃ hǝn nǝsa lotousi . ”
44023022	Imagenan , nakomada enan ike nǝmantuhmar tivan , ale ikel maii ke , “ Sagikel mai avan ideh ke gotokel ur nategai mai ginau . ”
44023023	Beti ekis nasenturion eru gǝmai , ike , “ Mǝreutaut hǝn nasoltia lotovi 200 , nasoltia nahos lotovi 70 mai nasoltia nǝsaran lotovi 200 hǝn lǝb̃evi Sisarea len namityal tomǝlapat damǝŋ len mariug .
44023024	Mǝreutaut hǝn nahos vir aPol , ale sǝhar aPol van hǝn aFeliks tovi gavna ei . ”
44023025	Itos nalob̃ulat maiegai ke :
44023026	Ginau notovi Klautius Lisias nutos nategai van hǝn aGavna tovoi , aFeliks : Ivoi .
44023027	NaJu gail lutah gat ategai hǝn lǝb̃iṽabuni . Nǝboŋ notosab̃i ke tovi uleRom , ginau mai nasoltia gail namtuvan hǝni ale nulav kuvi dan galito .
44023028	Husur ke notoke nelǝboi nǝsaan lotoke togole , nosǝhari van hǝn nǝSanhitrin salito .
44023029	Nusab̃i ke lotokot hǝni husur na-sor-b̃alb̃al-an hǝn nalo salito , be nǝmatan o naim bǝbaŋis sanor hǝn nǝsa lotoke togole .
44023030	Nǝboŋ notosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke tokad na-sor-utaut-an hǝn lǝb̃emǝdas ategai , vǝha-sua ŋai nosǝvati van hǝn gaiug . Nukel mai alat lotosor tas ategai ke likel mai gaiug nǝsaan lotonau ke togole . Sipa .
44023031	Imagenan nasoltia gail lugol husur nakelean sinakomada salito . Len mariug losǝhar aPol vi Antipatris .
44023032	Pelan han nasoltia gail lotoyar , lotǝlmam vi lan naim sisoltia gail , be nasoltia nahos gail luvan mai aPol sal .
44023033	Nǝboŋ lotobar naut a Sisarea lulav nalob̃ulat napisulan mai aFeliks tovi gavna ei , ale loriŋ aPol len navǝlan .
44023034	Nǝboŋ aFeliks toṽuruŋ nalob̃ulat , eus a Pol ke naut san matmat a be . Ale nǝboŋ tosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke tovi uleSilisia ,
44023035	ike , “ Dereh nikot hǝn gaiug nǝboŋ alat lotosor tas gaiug lǝb̃ibar naut egai . ” Beti ikel mai nasoltia galevis ke lekǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn aPol len nab̃iltiim siHerot , gai toum hǝni tia sutuai .
44024001	Len nǝboŋ torim tohusur enan , ab̃iltihai tutumav , aAnanias , egǝm mai galevis lotoil a m̃o seJu mai avan sua , nahǝsan aTertullus tovi ulum̃an tokad namitisau hǝn nalo . Ale lukel uri mai agavna nǝsa lotoke likot hǝn a Pol sile .
44024002	Nǝboŋ lotokis aPol vi lohoim , aTertullus etub̃at sor tas aPol , ike , “ AFeliks gotovi gavna , bathut namitisau sam̃ hǝn nautautan namtohǝhaṽur hǝn natǝm̃at topat tobǝlav mai natgalevis gotogǝgel hǝni tovoi len nǝkantri egai .
44024003	Akis len naut p̃isi namtosipa hǝn nǝsa gotogole , aFeliks gotoyalyal .
44024004	Nomǝtahun nǝb̃igol gǝb̃ivekan . Imagenan , nous ke , gaiug gesǝsǝloŋ kǝkereh hǝn ginamito len navoian gotokade tabtab .
44024005	“ Ategai , namtusab̃i ke tovi ulum̃an namǝdasian togol nǝ-b̃al-mǝtahuni-an len naJu p̃isi len navile a pan kavkav . Eil a m̃o hǝn naluṽoh lotosab ,
44024006	Ategai igol risi hǝn tomǝdas naim siGot hǝn tob̃iŋb̃iŋal len nǝhon aGot , imagenan namtutah gati . Nǝboŋ gǝb̃eusi , dereh gisab̃i ke , natit p̃isi namttokel mai gaiug ke aPol tosa lan , ekitin . ”
44024008	
44024009	NaJu gail ei lub̃on mai aTertulus , luke nǝsa tokele ekitin .
44024010	Nǝboŋ agavna totinuh van hǝn aPol hǝn b̃isor , aPol ikel maii ke , “ AFeliks aGavna , nolǝboii ke , len nasihau tosob̃ur gotopǝpehun nanoran dan nǝsaban len nǝkantri egai tia . Imaienan nohǝhaṽur hǝn nǝb̃isor husur natgalenan lotokel ke notogol tosa be sakitin .
44024011	Sǝdaŋ hǝn gǝb̃isab̃i ke , sǝbar nǝmariboŋ tovi 12 tovan , novi mǝhat vi Jerusalem hǝn nǝb̃ilotu .
44024012	Naut kǝmas nǝsa lotokele , lǝsǝsab̃i ke notosor b̃alb̃al mai avan ideh , lǝsǝsab̃i ke notogol nadǝdarŋab̃uan len naluṽoh len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot , len naim nab̃onb̃onan seJu ideh o len naut ideh len nab̃iltivile .
44024013	Lukel mai gaiug ke notogol tosa , be lodǝdas lǝb̃eṽusan nakitinan hǝn nǝsa lotokele .
44024014	Nukel lǝboi nategai mai gaiug ke , nulotu hǝn aGot setǝmanamit ta sutuai hǝn Nap̃isal siNasub̃ alategai lotoke tosab . Nodǝlom natit p̃isi len nalo siMoses mai len natosian sihai kelkel ur gail .
44024015	Sum̃an nǝsa alategai ma lotodǝlomi , ginau nuvatvat vir nǝboŋ aGot b̃igol na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan hǝn alat lotonor mai lǝsanor .
44024016	Imaienan nohisi ke nǝlogw imasil len nǝhon aGot mai nǝvanuan p̃isi tabtab .
44024017	“ Husur nasihau tosob̃ur notǝlmam hǝn nǝb̃eviol hǝn nǝvat mai nǝvanuan sagw gail lotom̃idol ale hǝn nǝb̃etutumav .
44024018	Nǝboŋ notogol natenan mai notogol ginau notoveveu tia , lusab̃ ginau len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot , be sǝkad naluṽoh , sǝkad nadǝdarŋab̃uan ideh .
44024019	Avil ikad naJu galevis a Asia ei . Galit , lǝb̃elǝboi natideh notogol tosa , ivoi hǝn lǝb̃itoh gegai len nǝhom̃ .
44024020	Galit gabag m̃au , likel mai gaiug natideh sanor lotosab̃i len ginau nǝboŋ notoil len nǝhon nǝSanhitrin salito !
44024021	Sum̃an ma tovi nategai notokai habat hǝni nǝboŋ notoil len nab̃onb̃onan salit ke , ‘ Lukot hǝn ginau damǝŋai husur nuvatvat vir na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan ! ’ ”
44024022	Beti aFeliks tolǝboi masuṽ hǝn Nap̃isal siNasub̃ , igol nakotan evǝlo , ike , “ Nǝboŋ aLisias , nakomada b̃egǝmai , neriŋ na-sor-sab̃i-an sagw husur gaiug . ”
44024023	Ale ikel mai nasenturion ke , tekǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝn aPol be teriŋi hǝn b̃iyaryar kǝkereh , ale tidam̃ hǝn nǝvanuan siPol gail lekǝtkǝta tǝban .
44024024	Nǝmariboŋ galevis tohusuri aFeliks egǝm mai asoan , nahǝsan aTrusilla , tovi Ju sua . Episul hǝn aPol b̃egǝm hǝni ale esǝsǝloŋ hǝn tosor husur nadǝlomian len aYesu Kristo .
44024025	APol ihol husur nanoran , mai nǝdaŋan hǝn avan ideh b̃ike , “ Aoa , ” hǝn nǝsaan , mai nǝboŋ aGot b̃ikot hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi . Nǝboŋ tokǝmaienan , aFeliks emǝtahw , ike , “ Givan bai , nǝb̃isab̃ nǝboŋ ideh am , dereh nepisul hǝn gaiug hǝn gǝb̃egǝmai . ”
44024026	Bathut aFeliks tonau ke hum ma aPol b̃ilav nǝvat maii hǝn b̃imakuv , episul vǝha-sob̃sob̃ur hǝni hǝn b̃egǝm hol maii .
44024027	Nǝboŋ nasihau toru togam gole tonoŋ aPorsius Festus ilav namilen aFeliks . Ale husur aFeliks tolǝŋon ke naJu gail lehǝhaṽur hǝni , eriŋ aPol totoh tin len naim bǝbaŋis .
44025001	Len nǝmariboŋ itor husur nagǝmaian san len naut a Jutea , aFestus eriŋ naut a Sisarea vi mǝhat vi Jerusalem .
44025002	Len naut enan ab̃iltihai tutumav gail mai alat lotoil a m̃o seJu gail , lukel uri mai aFestus nǝsa lotoke aPol togol tosa . Ale loŋiri ke ,
44025003	b̃ike lǝb̃ehǝhaṽur hǝni , tilav aPol gǝm vi Jerusalem . ( Lusor utaut hǝni tia ke ligol aPol timat len nap̃isal . )
44025004	AFestus isor var galit ke , “ Namtotǝgau gat aPol a Sisarea , ale asike idareh ginau nivan ei .
44025005	Imaienan , alat lotoil a m̃o hǝn gamito , litah mai ginau . B̃ikad natideh tosa len atenan , likel ur nǝsa togol tosa len nakotan sagw ei . ”
44025006	AFestus itoh mai galit len naut enan len nǝmariboŋ sasǝhor tomǝlevtor o tosǝŋavur ale evi pan vi Sisarea . Pelan han ebǝtah len nakotan ale ike lesǝhar aPol gǝmai .
44025007	Nǝboŋ aPol togǝmai tonoŋ , naJu gail lotogǝm a Jerusalem loil dar vis aPol , lukel ur nǝsa lotoke aPol togol tosa avil lodǝdas lǝb̃eṽusan sǝhoti ke tovi kitinan .
44025008	APol isor vi tarhǝt san gabag ke , “ Nǝsagol natideh tob̃ur kotov nalo seJu gail , tomǝdas naim siGot o tomǝdas aSisa . ”
44025009	Be husur aFestus toke tigol naJu gail lehǝhaṽur , eus aPol ke , “ Guke gevi Jerusalem hǝn nǝb̃ikot hǝn gaiug ei sil natgalegai a ? ”
44025010	Ale aPol isor vari ke , “ Gagai noil a m̃o len nǝhai bǝtbǝtah nakotan tovi nakotan seSisa ; ale egai nakotan tonor hǝn nǝb̃ikot lan . Gaiug golǝboi buni tia ke nǝsagol natideh tosab van hǝn naJu gail .
44025011	Nǝb̃igol natideh tosa , tonor hǝn nǝb̃imat sile , asike nugam dan nǝmatan enan , avil nǝsa naJu galegai lotokel ke notogol tosa asike b̃ekitin , sǝkad avan ideh tolǝboi b̃eriŋ ginau len navǝlalito . Nous ke aSisa tebǝtah len nakotan sagw . ”
44025012	Beti nǝboŋ aFestus tosor husur natenan mai esan gail lotokad namitisau , isor var aPol ke , “ Gous ke aSisa tebǝtah len nakotan sam̃ , ale dereh givan hǝn aSisa . ”
44025013	Nǝboŋ nǝmariboŋ galevis tovan , aAkrippa aKiŋ
44025014	Arutoh ei nǝmariboŋ isob̃ur ale len natohan sǝlaru aFestus isor husur nakotan siPol mai akiŋ , ike , “ Ikad avan sua aFeliks toriŋi len naim bǝbaŋis gegai .
44025015	Ale nǝboŋ nototoh len naut a Jerusalem , ab̃iltihai tutumav mai alat lotoil a m̃o seJu gail , lukel mai ginau nǝsa lotoke aten togol tosa ale lous ke ginau nisab̃ sǝhoti ke timaspanis .
44025016	Nukel mai galit ke , savi naṽide silat aRom hǝn lǝb̃eriŋ avan ideh len navǝlan alat lotoke tipanis . Be len nakotan atenan timaskad nab̃onb̃onan mai alat lotosor tasi hǝn b̃isor vi tarhǝt san gabag .
44025017	Imaienan nǝboŋ lotogǝm b̃on gegai , nǝsavǝlo be pelan han ŋai nobǝtah len nakotan , ale nukele ke lesǝhar aPol gǝmai .
44025018	Nǝboŋ alat lotosor tasi lotoil , lǝsakel ur natideh gai togol tosa hum notovatvat viri .
44025019	Be lusor tastasi husur nǝbathut nalotuan galevis salito , mai avan sua tomat , nahǝsan aYesu , aPol toke tomaur .
44025020	Husur nǝsalǝboii ke timabe hǝn nǝb̃ep̃usp̃us kitev nakitinan husur natgalenan , nous aPol ke b̃ehǝhaṽur m̃au ke tevi Jerusalem hǝn b̃ikot ei sil na-sor-tastasi-an galenan .
44025021	Avil nǝboŋ aPol tous ke titoh vir nakotan seSisa , nukele ke letǝgau gati vir nǝb̃esǝvati van hǝn aSisa . ”
44025022	AAkrippa ikel mai aFestus ke , “ Ginau am nuke nesǝsǝloŋ hǝn atenan . ” AFestus ike , “ Pelan beti gesǝsǝloŋ hǝni . ”
44025023	Ŋa pelan han aAkrippa mai aPernis arogǝm len naṽivan totibau hǝn arb̃ipat gǝlar mǝhat , arob̃is len narum̃ hǝn nab̃onb̃onan . Nakomada gail mai nǝvanuan totibau gail len navile , lutah mai gǝlaru . Beti aFestus ikele ke lesǝhar aPol gǝmai .
44025024	Ale aFestus ike , “ Akrippa aKiŋ mai galit lototoh mai ginamito , mǝtoris ategai . NaJu gail p̃isi lous taltal hǝn ginau len naut a Jerusalem mai gegai hǝni , lukai ke sanor hǝn b̃imaur am .
44025025	Nǝsǝsab̃i ke togol natideh hǝn b̃imat sile . Ale nǝboŋ toke tivan hǝn aSisa , noriŋi ke nesǝvati van .
44025026	Avil nǝsalǝboii ke nitos nǝsa husur ategai van hǝn aSisa . Imaienan nosǝhari gǝm a m̃o len nǝhomit p̃isi , mai gaiug m̃au Akrippa aKiŋ . Nǝboŋ namtb̃eus nausian gail van hǝni hum ma nǝb̃isab̃ natideh hǝn nǝb̃itos gati .
44025027	Husur len nǝnauan sagw sanor savoi hǝn nǝb̃esǝvat avan ideh notobaŋis gati van , be na-tos-gati-an hǝn nǝsa togol tosa eb̃uer . ”
44026001	AAkrippa ikel mai aPol ke , “ Gisor m̃os gaiug gabag bai . ” Ale aPol ibar hǝn navǝlan , etub̃at sor vi tarhǝt san gabag ke ,
44026002	“ Len nǝhom̃ damǝŋai , nohǝhaṽur hǝn nǝb̃isor vi tarhǝt sagw gabag . Nisor tas nǝsa naJu gail lotokel ke notogol tosa .
44026003	Nohǝhaṽur husur gaiug , aAkrippa aKiŋ , golǝboi naṽide p̃isi mai na-sor-b̃alb̃al-an seJu gail . Imagenan noŋir gaiug ke , gesǝsǝloŋ mǝdau vir ginau .
44026004	NaJu p̃isi lolǝboi naṽide hǝn nǝmauran sagw nǝboŋ notokǝkereh vǝbar damǝŋai , len natub̃atan len nǝmauran sagw nǝboŋ nototoh mai nǝvanuan sagw gail , ale len naut a Jerusalem .
44026005	Galit lǝb̃ike lǝb̃ikel uri , lolǝboi ebǝlav tia ke notovi Farisi sua ale naFarisi gail ludaŋ hǝn lǝb̃ehusur p̃is naṽide hǝn nalotuan seJu gail .
44026006	Damǝŋai noil len nakotan husur nǝ-vatvat-viri-an sagw len nǝsa aGot tokel gati mai atǝmadat ta sutuai .
44026007	Na-kel-gati-an enan , nahǝmar tovi 12 sidato luvatvat viri ke tisarpoh , ale ludaŋ len nalotuan van hǝn aGot tabtab m̃osi . Bathut nǝ-vatvat-viri-an enan , naJu gail lukot hǝn ginau , aKiŋ .
44026008	Imab mǝtsalǝboi mǝtb̃edǝlomi ke aGot togol alat lotomat lule mǝhat dan nǝmatan ?
44026009	A m̃o ginau am nunau ke nimasgol natit tisob̃ur hǝn nǝb̃emǝdas nahǝsan aYesu ta Nasaret .
44026010	Ale len naut a Jerusalem nugole imaienan . Ab̃iltihai tutumav gail lulav nǝ-dam-hǝni-an mai ginau ale nokǝkol gat alat siGot len naim bǝbaŋis , ale len nakotan nudam̃ hǝn nǝmatan hum nǝpanismen salito .
44026011	Len naim nab̃onb̃onan p̃isi seJu nupansem galito vǝha-sob̃sob̃ur , nohisi ke galit ideh lǝb̃isor mǝdas nahǝsan aYesu . Nǝlogw epǝŋas galit hum notovinvinu ale nomǝdas tabtab hǝn galito van vǝbar nab̃iltivile gail a tut .
44026012	“ Len nǝyaran galen sual a tut , novi Tamaskus len nǝdaŋan seb̃iltihai tutumav gail ale nukad nalob̃ulat hǝn nǝ-dam-hǝni-an salito .
44026013	AKiŋ , len natub̃lial , nǝboŋ notohusur nap̃isal , noris nam̃ial togǝm len nǝmav tom̃ial sǝhor namityal , tom̃ias ginau mai alat lotoyar mai ginau .
44026014	Ginamit p̃isi namtuteh len tan , beti nosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nadoldol tosor mai ginau len nasoruan seIpru gail ke , ‘ Sol , Sol , gomǝdas tabtab hǝn ginau hǝn nǝsa ? Nǝboŋ gotomǝtahun ginau , gaiug sǝb̃om̃ gosǝnah hun nab̃uluk tosǝvat nǝhai tokan , amahean toturi hǝni hǝn b̃iyar b̃inor . ’
44026015	Nousi ke , ‘ Gaiug ase Nasub̃ ? ’ Ale Nasub̃ ike , ‘ Ginau aYesu gotomǝdas bun ginau !
44026016	Be gile mǝhat , geil len nariem̃ gǝlaru . Novisi hǝn gaiug hǝn nǝb̃itabtabuh len gaiug hǝn gǝb̃evi vanuan nauman sagw , ale hǝn gǝb̃ikel kot natit gail gotorisi husur ginau mai natit gail nǝb̃evisi hǝn gaiug lan .
44026017	Dereh netǝgau gat gaiug , nilav kuv gaiug dan alat lotomǝtahun gaiug , nǝvanuan sam̃ gail mai alat lǝsavi Ju notosǝvat gaiug van hǝn galit gagai .
44026018	Nosǝvat gaiug van hǝn galit hǝn gǝb̃esǝŋav hǝn namǝtalito ale hǝn gǝb̃ipair hǝn galit dan nǝmargobut van hǝn nam̃ial , dan nǝdaŋan siSetan van hǝn aGot . Timagenan hǝn lǝb̃ikad narub̃atian dan nǝsaan , ale hǝn lǝb̃ikad namilelit len alat lotoveveu husur nadǝlomian salit len ginau . ’
44026019	“ Imaienan , aAkrippa aKiŋ , nosǝsǝloŋ husur atenan togǝm len nǝmav , ale nugol nǝsa tokele .
44026020	Nukel ur mai nǝvanuan p̃isi ke , lipair dan nǝsaan salit van hǝn aGot , ale nǝsa lǝb̃igole timasnor hǝn nǝpairan dan nǝsaan . Nukel ur naten len naut a Tamaskus metǝkav , beti len naut a Jerusalem , ale len naut a Jutea kavkav . Ale nuvan hǝn alat lǝsavi Ju , nukel uri mai galit am .
44026021	Husur natenan , naJu gail lutah gat ginau len naholǝvat todar vis naim siGot , ale lugol risi ke , ligol nimat .
44026022	Vǝbar damǝŋai aGot evi tarhǝt sagw . Ale noil gegai , nukel ur nǝsa notorisi mai nǝvanuan kǝmas gail mai nǝvanuan gail lotoyalyal . Nǝsa notokele ep̃itoṽ ŋai hǝn nǝsa ahai kelkel ur gail mai aMoses lotokele ke tevisi .
44026023	Luke aKristo , aGot totabtabuh lan , telǝŋon tisa , ale husur ke tevi nametǝkav hǝn na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan , tikel ur nam̃ial mai nǝvanuan sidat gail mai alat lǝsavi Ju ! ”
44026024	Nǝboŋ aPol tosor vi tarhǝt san gabag sal aFestus isor habat kǝkol hǝni ke , “ Pol govinu ! Na-b̃iltilǝboi-sǝhoti-an sam̃ igol ke gotovinvinu ! ”
44026025	Be aPol ike , “ Nǝsavinvinu , aFestus gotoyalyal , avil nukel kot nasoruan tokitin , tokad nǝnauan tovoi .
44026026	AKiŋ elǝboi natgalenan tia , husur enan nolǝboi nǝb̃ekǝmaienan maii . Nunau lǝboii ke natideh gail sasusuah lan , husur natgalenan lǝsavisi hum lotosusuah be lovisi p̃arp̃ar .
44026027	Akrippa aKiŋ , godǝlom nǝsa ahai kelkel ur gail lototos gati a ? Nolǝboii ke gotodǝlomi . ”
44026028	AAkrippa ikel mai aPol ke , “ Len namityal tom̃idol maiegai , gunau ke gotolǝboi gǝb̃igol ke nǝb̃egǝm vi Kristen a ? ”
44026029	APol isor vari ke , “ Nous aGot ke len namityal tom̃idol o tobǝlav , savi gaiug ŋai be galit p̃isi am lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn ginau damǝŋai , legǝm sum̃an ginau ! Avil natsen galegai eb̃uer . ”
44026030	Beti aKiŋ , aGavna mai aPernis , mai alat lotobǝtah mai galito , galit p̃isi lule mǝhat .
44026031	Nǝboŋ lotoriŋ narum̃ enan lukel mai galit gabag ke , “ Atenan sagol natideh tonor hǝn b̃imat o b̃itoh len naim bǝbaŋis . ”
44026032	AAkrippa ikel mai aFestus ke , “ Atenan , asike tausi ke tavi lan nakotan seSisa , talǝboi tavivile . ”
44027001	Nǝboŋ aFestus toriŋi ke namtb̃iwol vi Itali , loriŋ aPol mai galevis lotobǝbaŋis am len navǝlan nasenturion sua , nahǝsan aJulius , tovi gai sua len Nab̃iltiluṽoh Nasoltia SeSisa .
44027002	Namtusah len nǝwag wol ta Atramittium toke b̃iwol vi lan navile gail bitas len naprovens Asia , ale namtotub̃at wol . AAristarkus , auleMasetonia sua ta Tessalonika , itah mai ginamito .
44027003	Pelan han namtubar naut a Siton , ale aJulius , tovoi hǝn aPol , idam̃ hǝn ke aPol b̃ivahut van hǝn nabubur san gail hǝn lǝb̃ekǝtkǝta tǝban .
44027004	Namtovi lau dan naut enan ale namtuwol susuah tarhǝbab a Saiprus husur nǝlan eṽuv gol ginamito .
44027005	Nǝboŋ namttowol tukot husur naut a Silisia mai a Pamfilia tonoŋ , namtubar naut a Mira a Lisia .
44027006	Len naut enan nasenturion isab̃ nǝwag wolwol sua ta Aleksadria toke tevi Itali ale eusan ginamit lan .
44027007	Len nǝmariboŋ isob̃ur namtuwol manmaneh . Namtohusur nabitas a Knitus be nawolan idaŋ masuṽ . Pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut a Knitus nǝlan eṽuv gol nǝgaman sinamito ale namtuwol tarhǝholoul a Krit sǝhor nabuŋon a Salm̃one .
44027008	Nawolan sinamit husur nabitas enan idaŋ vǝbar naut sua nahǝsan tovi Naut Susuahan Tokab , pǝpadaŋ hǝn nab̃iltivile a Lasea .
44027009	Nǝmariboŋ isob̃ur ivan tia , ale nǝtas isa hǝn nawolan husur Nǝboŋ hǝn Nabǝbaŋan
44027010	ke , “ Lalum̃an , noris ke dereh nawolan egai tidaŋ habat ale natit tisob̃ur timasig , savi nǝkako mai nǝwag ŋai , be nǝmauran tisob̃ur am . ”
44027011	Avil nasenturion sadǝlom masuṽ hǝn nǝsa aPol tokele , esǝsǝloŋ hǝn ahai wolwol mai amahean nǝwag wol ŋai .
44027012	Husur ke naut hǝn nasusuahan enan sanor hǝn namtb̃itoh lan len nahǝbati naut susus , isob̃ur len galit p̃isi luke namtiwol dani hǝn hum ma namtb̃ibar naut a Finiks hǝn namtb̃itoh ei len nahǝbati naut susus . Naut enan evi naut susuahan tokǝta vi nǝsautwes mai nanotwes .
44027013	Nǝboŋ nǝlan toṽuv kǝkereh len nasaut , lunau ke lǝb̃ibar naut a Finiks ŋa loliv naga , lotub̃at wol tukot pǝpadaŋ hǝn naholoul a Krit .
44027014	Avil sǝdareh nǝlan paru , nahǝsan aNotis , eṽuv idaŋ tukot len naholoul a Krit gǝmai .
44027015	Husur nǝlan iṽas nǝwag wol gol ke edǝdas b̃iwol len nǝlan topat gol nǝhon maienan , namtupair , sarmar mai nǝlan .
44027016	Nǝboŋ namttogam tarhǝbab len natuhholoul , nahǝsan a Kauta , namtolǝboi namtb̃eliv natuhb̃ot vi mǝhat len nǝwag wol , naut kǝmas ke todaŋ , ale namtubaŋis gati .
44027017	Nǝboŋ tovi mǝhat tonoŋ , lopis garu hǝn nǝwag wol hǝn nab̃iltihau hǝn asike b̃imap̃ul . Beti husur lomǝtahw ke likos len nasǝhau a Sirtis , lubar hǝn nǝlai tovi aga , ale nǝtas isar hǝn galito , nǝwag wol igam mǝdau .
44027018	Nǝtas ekur habat hǝn ginamito gol ke pelan han lotub̃at bubulan nǝkako len tas .
44027019	Ale len nǝmariboŋ totor han lubar hǝn nahudhutit hǝn nǝwag len tas hǝn navǝlalit ŋai hǝn lǝb̃imaur .
44027020	Len nǝmariboŋ isob̃ur namityal mai nam̃eso gail lǝsavisi . Nǝlan paru iṽas habat hǝn ginamito van gol ke namtsadǝlomi am ke namtb̃imaur .
44027021	Nǝboŋ ebǝlav lǝsǝhan , beti aPol ile mǝhat , ikel mai galit ke , “ Lalum̃an , ivoi mǝttasǝsǝloŋ hǝn nalǝlǝgauan sagw . Asike mǝttawol dan naut a Krit , natit gail hǝn nǝwag asike lǝtǝmap̃ulp̃ul , asike lǝtǝmasig .
44027022	Be nukel mai gamit ke , ivoi mǝtetǝgau gat nǝlomito husur nǝmauran samito asike imasig , nǝwag wol ŋai dereh timasig .
44027023	AGot tovi esagw notoum san , nino len mariug aŋel san eil tǝban ginau
44027024	ike , ‘ Sagemǝtahw Pol . Dereh gimaur , geil m̃au len nakotan seSisa , ale aGot eviol hǝni mai gaiug tia hǝn nǝmauran salit p̃isi lotosah len nǝwag wol mai gaiug . ’
44027025	Imagenan , lalum̃an , mǝtelǝŋon tivoi am len nǝlomito husur nukad nadǝlomian len aGot ke dereh tesum̃an nǝsa tokele mai ginau .
44027026	Be datimaskos len naholoul ideh bai . ”
44027027	Nǝboŋ nawik eru togam gole , len mariug , nǝboŋ nǝtas tosar hǝn ginamit tukot len Nǝtas Atria , tub̃loh len mariug alat lotoum len nǝwag wol lunau ke lusal gǝm pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut ideh .
44027028	Lugol ris nǝsarehan hǝn nǝtas , sab̃i ke namita
44027029	Lomǝtahw ke hum ma namtb̃ikos len nǝvat , ale lubar hǝn naga ivat bathuwag beti lusor tuṽ vir nalennǝyal b̃egǝmai .
44027030	Galevis lotoum len nǝwag wol lohisi ke ligam dan nǝwag , ale loriŋ natuhb̃ot vi pan gǝras ke libar hǝn naga gail dan nǝmashuwag .
44027031	Be aPol ikel mai nasenturion mai nasoltia gail ke , “ Alatenan asike lǝb̃itoh len nǝwag wol , asike mǝtolǝboi mǝtb̃imakuv dan nǝmatan . ”
44027032	Beti nasoltia gail luta kotov nǝhau totah gat natuhb̃ot , gol ke isal .
44027033	Pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut b̃ilan aPol eŋir galit p̃isi ke lihan , ike , “ Damǝŋ nǝmariboŋ evi 14 mǝttotoh van mǝtsǝhan , ale nǝhanan samit eb̃uer .
44027034	Imaienan , ivoi ke mitihan natideh hǝn b̃evi tarhǝt samito . Mitimasgole hǝn mǝtb̃imaur . Husur nasivur ideh len nǝkadumit asike imasig . ”
44027035	Nǝboŋ tokǝmaienan tonoŋ , len nǝholit p̃isi ilav nabǝta , esipa len aGot , eb̃ur nabǝta ale etub̃at hani .
44027036	Galit p̃isi lolǝŋon ivoi am len nǝlolito ale luhan .
44027037	
44027038	Nǝboŋ lotohanukub tonoŋ , lobubulan nawit len tas hǝn b̃igol nǝwag wol b̃emǝlala .
44027039	Nǝboŋ naut tolan , lǝsaris lǝboi naut be lokǝta bunus nab̃urhuut sua tokad nabion lotoke ligol nǝwag wol tikos lan , be lǝsalǝboii ke timaienan o ledǝdasi .
44027040	Ŋa luta kokotov nǝhau hǝn naga gail hǝn lǝb̃ipat butitas . Nǝboŋ lotogol nauman en sal , lusah rub̃at nǝhau gail lotopis gat nǝṽos wolwol gǝlaru hǝni . Beti loliv nǝlai mashuwag vi mǝhat hǝn nǝlan b̃eṽuvi , ale luwol vahut bitas .
44027041	Lubar naut nawilel tolev ale lukos . Nǝmashuwag edǝdas b̃erus be nab̃iltitas iṽas nǝbathuwag van van vǝmap̃ulp̃ul .
44027042	Nasoltia gail lusor utaut hǝn lǝb̃igol alat lotobaŋis gat galito limat hǝn asike lǝb̃egǝgar yav .
44027043	Avil nasenturion ike aPol timaur , ale ikai tas na-sor-utaut-an enan . Ikele ke , alat lotolǝboi nagǝgaran lemǝlah len tas a m̃o , gǝgar vahut .
44027044	Ale ikel mai alat lotosuh ke , ideh litah gat nǝtarhai , ideh litah gat nahudhuwag . Imagenan galit p̃isi lubar nabitas , lumaur .
44028001	Nǝboŋ namttovahut namtusab̃i ke nahǝsan naholoul enan evi Malta .
44028002	Husur naus eus mai naut esusus , alat lotosuh ei luvoi habat hǝn ginamito . Lotuŋ nǝhab , ale lukel nahǝhaṽuran salito mai ginamito .
44028003	APol itariv nǝhab galevis , be nǝboŋ toriŋi len nǝhab , nǝm̃at sua , nǝvaipa
44028004	Nǝboŋ alat a Malta lotoris nǝm̃at totahǝtah len navǝlan , lusorsor mai galit gabag ke , “ Ategai evi naulum̃an togol nǝmatan . Naut kǝmas gai sǝmat len tas , nagot pǝhaṽut sidato , aNoran
44028005	Be aPol ekur kuv nǝm̃at vi lan nǝhab ale aPol imaur sal .
44028006	Luvatvat viri ke dereh aPol titob o titeh tutut timat . Avil lutoh viri ebǝlav sob̃uer . Natideh savisi hǝni . Ale logǝgel hǝn nǝnauan salito , lotub̃at kele ke evi nagot sua .
44028007	Pǝpadaŋ hǝn naut enan ikad nǝtan sinǝvanuan totibau hǝn naholoul , nahǝsan aPuplius . Gai ike , “ Ivoi , ” mai ginamito ale ekǝtkǝta tǝban ginamit len nǝmariboŋ itor .
44028008	Len nǝboŋ enan atǝman aPuplius emǝsah . Ipat len nǝmel , epud mai ep̃irp̃ir . APol ivan hǝni , isor tuṽ . Nǝboŋ tonoŋ eriŋ navǝlan gǝlar lan ale imaur .
44028009	Husur natenan , galit p̃isi len naholoul lotomǝsah , logǝm hǝn aPol ale lumaur .
44028010	Loputsan ginamit hum namttovi vanuan toyalyal gail . Ale nǝboŋ namttoutaut hǝn namtb̃iwol vi lau , lousan natit p̃isi b̃evi tarhǝt sinamit len nawolan sinamito .
44028011	Husur nahǝbati itor namtovi lau len nǝwag wolwol ta Aleksadria tokir len naholoul enan len nahǝbati naut susus . Ikad Namǝlav Larmiṽan
44028012	Namtubar naut a Sirakus , ale namtutoh ei nǝmariboŋ itor .
44028013	Beti namtoriŋ naut enan namtubar naut a Rekium . Pelan han nǝlan len nǝsautwes etǝvah , namtoriŋ naut enan , ale hois han namtubar naut a Puteoli .
44028014	Len naut enan namtusab̃ nǝvanuan nadǝlomian lotous ginamit hǝn namtb̃itoh mai galito len nawik esua . Imagenan namtogǝm vǝbar naut a Rom .
44028015	Nǝboŋ nǝvanuan nadǝlomian gail ei lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝni ke namttogǝmai , logǝm van vǝbar Nǝmaket siAppius mai Naim Ŋavŋav Itor
44028016	Nǝboŋ namttobar naut a Rom , ludam̃ hǝn aPol b̃itoh sǝb̃on len naim sua mai nasoltia tokǝtkǝta kǝkol hǝni .
44028017	Len nǝmariboŋ totor tohusuri , aPol ekis naJu gail lotoil a m̃o gǝmai . Nǝboŋ lotob̃onb̃on ikel mai galit ke , “ Lalum̃an , aṽagw gail , naut kǝmas nǝsagol natideh tomǝdas nǝvanuan sidat gail mai naṽide setǝmadat ta sutuai , naJu gail lutah gat ginau len naut a Jerusalem ale loriŋ ginau len navǝlan alat a Rom .
44028018	Nǝboŋ lotous nausian gail mai ginau , luke leriŋ ginau nivan husur lǝsǝsab̃ natideh tonor hǝn nǝb̃imat .
44028019	Avil nǝboŋ naJu gail lotosor mǝtahuni , igol ke nous ke nikot len nakotan seSisa , naut kǝmas nǝsǝkad natideh hǝn nab̃ikot hǝn nǝvanuan sagw gail sile .
44028020	Bathut natgalenan , nokis gamit gǝmai hǝn nǝb̃eris gamit mai sor mai gamito . Nukad natsen galegai sil nǝ-vatvat-viri-an seIsrael , tovi aKristo . ”
44028021	Ale lusor vari ke , “ Namtsǝlav nalob̃ulat ideh a Jutea tosor husur gaiug , mai avan ideh tobar naut egai sakel uri o sakel natideh tosa husur gaiug .
44028022	Be namtuke namtesǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝnauan sam̃ gail , husur namtolǝboii ke , nǝvanuan gail len naut p̃isi lusor tas naluṽoh egaii hǝn nalotuan totile . ”
44028023	Loriŋ gat nǝboŋ sua vir aPol ale galit isob̃ur logǝm vi lan naim totoh lan . Tub̃at dudulan vǝbar nalenmariug aPol isor vahvah mai galito , ikel ur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot ale len nalo siMoses , mai natosian sihai kelkel ur gail , ikel natgalenan hǝn lǝb̃egǝgel hǝn nǝnauan salit husur aYesu .
44028024	Galevis lunau ke aPol ekitin , galevis am lǝsadǝlomi .
44028025	Husur nǝnauan salit sasua , lotub̃at riŋ naut enan . Ale aPol isor tǝtas am ke , “ ANunun aGot ekitin nǝboŋ tokel mai atǝmadat ta sutuai len ahai kelkel ur , aIsaiah ,
44028026	ke , “ ‘ Givan hǝn nǝvanuan galegai , gike , “ Len nasǝsǝloŋan samito , dereh mǝtesǝsǝloŋ be asike mǝtosǝsǝloŋ lǝboi nǝsa notokele , ale len nakǝtaan samito , dereh mǝtekǝta be asike mǝtokǝta lǝboi nǝsa notogole . ”
44028027	Husur nǝkadun alategai egǝm ṽonṽon , pǝpadaŋ nǝdariŋalit eb̃ulb̃ulol , ale namǝtalit ib̃er . Asike lǝtǝmagenan , namǝtalit takǝta ris nǝsa notogole , nǝdariŋalit tasǝsǝloŋ hǝn nǝsa notokele , nǝlolit talǝboi natgalenan , ale lǝtǝpair van hǝn ginau , ale nǝtagol galit lǝtǝmaur . ’
44028028	“ Ale ginau nuke mǝtelǝboii ke , nǝ-lav-kuvi-an enan dan nǝsaan , aGot esǝvati tia van hǝn alat lǝsavi Ju , ale galit dereh lesǝsǝloŋ balai ! ”
44028030	Len nasihau eru aPol itoh ei len naim gai torentem , ale ehǝhaṽur hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi lotogǝm hǝni .
44028031	Ikel ur natohan pipihabǝlan aGot , ep̃usan husur Nasub̃ aYesu Kristo len na-il-b̃uri-an , ale sǝkad avan ideh tomǝdasi .
45001001	Ginau , aPol , nutos nalob̃ulat napisulan egai . Novi naslev sua seKristo , aYesu , aGot totabtabuh len ginau hǝn nǝb̃evi hai pispisul m̃os na-kel-uri-an san tovoi .
45001002	Sutuai , nǝboŋ aYesu savisi sal , aGot ikel gati ke dereh tikel vǝhot na-kel-uri-an san tovoi . Ale ikel vǝhoti len nǝsa ahai kelkel ur gail lototosi len natosian siGot .
45001003	Na-kel-uri-an tovoi ehusur aNatun aGot , aYesu . Len nǝmauran san len navile a pan , ikad nǝpasian len nǝbathuyah siTevit tovi Kiŋ .
45001004	
45001005	Len gai , aGot eviol kǝmas hǝn navoian mai ginau ,
45001006	Gamit a Rom , mǝtovi galit galevis . AGot ekis gamit am hǝn mǝtb̃evi seKristo .
45001007	Ginau aPol , nutos nalob̃ulat napisulan egai van hǝn gamit p̃isi a Rom , aGot tolǝmas bun gamito , gai tokis gamit hǝn mǝtb̃evi esan sǝb̃on . AGot atǝmadato mai Nasub̃ aYesu Kristo areviol kǝmas hǝn navoian mai gamito , arigol nǝlomit tikad natǝm̃at .
45001008	Nuke nikele bai ke , len aYesu Kristo , nosipa vi tǝban aGot hǝn gamit p̃isi , husur nǝvanuan gail lukel ur nadǝlomian samito len navile a pan kavkav .
45001009	AGot notoum san len nǝlogw kavkav nǝboŋ notokel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi husur aNatun ulum̃an , aGot elǝboii ke notokitin nǝboŋ notokel ke notosor tuṽ m̃os gamit tabtab .
45001010	Akis vǝbar damǝŋai len na-sor-tuṽ-an sagw , nous aGot ke , b̃elǝŋoni , dereh tigol nap̃isal ideh hǝn nǝb̃em̃ǝdoŋ tǝban gamito .
45001011	Husur nolǝŋon masuṽ hǝn nǝb̃eris gamito , hǝn ke , len nagǝmaian sagw , mǝtb̃ikad naviolan ideh seNunun aGot hǝn b̃igol mǝtb̃idaŋ am .
45001012	Nolǝŋon masuṽ hǝn nǝb̃eris gamito hǝn datb̃igol datb̃elǝŋon b̃ivoi am len nǝlodat gabag , nuke nevi tarhǝt samit len nadǝlomian samito mai gamit am mǝtevi tarhǝt sagw len nadǝlomian sagw .
45001013	Bathudud nadǝlomian gail , nuke mǝtelǝboii ke notonau utaut hǝn nǝb̃em̃ǝdoŋ tǝban gamito . Nugol vǝha-sob̃ur hǝni be natgalevis lupatpat gol ginau vǝbar damǝŋai . Nuke neum samito ale nauman sagw len gamito tikad naṽite hum notokade len alat lǝsavi Ju len naut tiltile gail am .
45001014	Nolǝboii ke aGot eriŋ nauman len ginau ale nimasgole m̃os nǝvanuan gail p̃isi , nǝvanuan nab̃iltivile gail mai auleut gail , alat lotokad nalǝboian mai alat lototǝtan hǝni .
45001015	Husur natenan , noutaut , nolǝŋon nǝb̃ikel ur na-kel-uri-an tovoi mai gamit a Rom am .
45001016	Nahurugw sǝsa hǝn na-kel-uri-an tovoi . Evi nǝdaŋan siGot m̃os nǝ-lav-kuvi-an dan nǝsaan silat lotokad nadǝlomian : m̃os naJu gail a m̃o , beti alat lǝsavi Ju .
45001017	Husur na-kel-uri-an tovoi ikel vǝhot nap̃isal hǝn aGot b̃igol datb̃inor len nǝhon . Nap̃isal enan etub̃at len nadǝlomian van van , inoŋ len nadǝlomian . Hum natosian siGot toke , “ Len nadǝlomian nǝvanuan nanoran ikad nǝmauran . ”
45001018	AGot len nǝmav evǝhot nǝlol paŋpaŋ san . Nǝlon epǝŋas nǝsaan silat lotomǝtahun aGot , lotopul hǝn nǝsaan . Galit , len nǝsaan salito , losusuan nakitinan .
45001019	Galit lolǝboi nakitinan husur aGot , bathut igol ip̃arp̃ar hǝn galito .
45001020	Naut kǝmas lotodǝdas lǝb̃eris nǝdaŋan san topat vi sutuai mai nab̃oruan san hum aGot ; be nǝdaŋan mai nab̃oruan san arup̃arp̃ar len natit p̃isi togole . Husur len natub̃atan nǝboŋ aGot togol navile a pan , van vǝbar damǝŋai , nǝvanuan gail loris natit aGot togol gail . Imaienan lǝsalǝboi lǝb̃etǝtas gol galito .
45001021	Husur ke , naut kǝmas lotolǝboi aGot maienan , lǝsǝsal suh nǝyalyalan san sum̃an tovi Got , lǝsasipa vi tǝban . Be nǝnauan salito egǝm vi ut kǝmas , nǝnauan salit sǝkad nǝ-nau-lǝboii-an lan , lopul hǝn nǝmargobut ŋai .
45001022	Lukel ke lotokad namitisau hǝn nǝmauran tonor , be logǝm vi hoṽon gail .
45001023	Lugel nǝyalyalan siGot totoh vi sutuai hǝn nǝlablab gail lotokad nǝnahǝnah hǝn nǝvanuan lǝb̃imat , nǝman namǝsav gail , narivatvat gail mai natit lotokǝlkǝlah .
45001024	Imagenan , aGot eriŋ gab̃ulan galito hǝn lǝb̃igol natideh lotolǝŋoni len nǝlolito , gol ke , len nab̃iŋb̃iŋalan salito , lomǝdas nibelit gabag len naitian tosa lotogolgole .
45001025	Lugel nakitinan husur aGot hǝn nalibliboŋan . Ale lulotu hǝn natit aGot togol gail , lugol lotovi slev salit gail . Lǝsalotu hǝn aGot togol natgalenan , be gai inor hǝn nǝ-sal-suhi-an van vi sutuai . Ganan !
45001026	Husur lotogol natgalenan aGot eriŋ gab̃ulan galito hǝn lǝb̃igol naṽide tob̃iŋb̃iŋal ideh lotolǝŋoni . Alatpǝhaṽut salit tu lupair dan nap̃isal hǝn naitian mai asoalit gail hǝn lǝb̃igol naitian mai galit gabag .
45001027	Len naṽide tomaienan alalum̃an lupair dan naitian mai alatpǝhaṽut , nǝlolit isahsah len galit gabag . Alalum̃an lob̃ur kotov naṽide tonor , lugol tob̃iŋb̃iŋal mai galit gabag . Ale sil nǝsaan lotogol gail , nǝpanismen tonor hǝn nǝsa galit sǝb̃olit lotogole ibar galito .
45001028	Bathut lotonau ke na-lǝboi-aGot-an savi natideh , aGot eriŋ gab̃ulan galit hǝn lǝb̃itoh len nǝ-nau-sabsab-an salito . Imaienan lugol nǝsa sanor hǝn lǝb̃igole .
45001029	Logǝm pul hǝn nǝsaan tiltile gail : nab̃oruan sasa , na-lǝŋon-masuṽ-hǝn-natite-an hǝn natite , nǝsasaan , lutab̃ulol bulos avan ideh husur nǝsa tokade . Lugolgol nǝmatan , lopul hǝn naṽitṽituhan mai nagǝgǝrasan . Lohǝhaṽur hǝn lǝb̃igol na-lǝŋon-isa-an len nǝvanuan gail , lukel nǝmadun nǝvanuan gail ,
45001030	lusor mǝdas nahǝsalito . Lomǝtahun bun aGot , len naṽivan salit lǝsǝnau avan ideh am . Nǝholit ileleah ale lusor patpat galit mǝhat . Lukad namitisau hǝn lǝb̃inau tabtab hǝn nap̃isal toveveu hǝn lǝb̃igol nǝsaan . Lǝsagol nǝsa atata mai anana artokele .
45001031	Len naṽide hǝn nǝmauran salito ehum lotomelmel , lob̃ur kotov na-kel-gati-an salit gail , na-lǝmas-buni-an eb̃uer len galito , nǝlolit sǝtaŋis avan ideh , ehum lǝsǝkad nalolosaan ideh .
45001032	Lolǝboii ke , bathut aGot tonor , ikele ke , nǝvanuan gail lotogol naṽide lotomaienan limasmat . Avil lohusur naṽide galen sal . Savi natenan ŋai , be lohǝhaṽur hǝn lǝb̃eris nǝvanuan gail am lǝb̃ehusur naṽide salito .
45002001	Gaiug gotosab̃ sǝhoti ke nǝvanuan tile am timaspanis , gǝsalǝboi gǝb̃etǝtas gol gaiug , husur gaiug am gusa sum̃an galito . Nǝboŋ gotosab̃ sǝhoti ke avan ideh timaspanis husur nǝsaan san , be gaiug gusab̃ sǝhoti ke gaiug am gimaspanis , husur gaiug gugol nǝsaan top̃itp̃itoṽ .
45002002	Datolǝboii ke , nǝboŋ aGot tosab̃ sǝhoti ke nǝvanuan limaspanis sil lotogol natenan , nǝ-sab̃-sǝhoti-an san inor hǝn nakitinan .
45002003	Imagenan , gaiug , nǝboŋ gotosab̃ sǝhoti ke galit limaspanis be gaiug gohusur naṽide top̃itoṽ hum galito , gunau ke gotolǝboi gǝb̃igam yav dan nǝpanismen siGot a ? Ao !
45002004	Gǝsalǝboii ke aGot tovoi masuṽ hǝn gaiug a ? Gai satutut hǝn b̃emǝtahun gaiug ; len nasusumaran , itoh mǝdau mai gaiug . Gǝsalǝboii a ? Hum ma natgalenan lǝsavi natideh len gaiug . AGot ivoi hǝn gaiug hǝn b̃esǝhar gaiug van hǝn nǝpairan dan nǝsaan , gǝsǝnau sǝhoti a ?
45002005	Be gaiug guhaihai , nǝkadum̃ iṽonṽon , gomǝtahun gǝb̃ipair dan nǝsaan sam̃ . Bathut gotomaienan gugol ke nǝpanismen sam̃ gabag evivi mǝhat am , husur nǝboŋ hǝn nǝlol paŋpaŋ dereh tegǝmai . Evi nǝboŋ aGot b̃ikel vǝhot nǝ-sab̃-sǝhoti-an san tonor , mai nǝpanismen .
45002006	AGot dereh tilav nap̃urp̃uran mai nǝvanuan p̃isi tinor hǝn nǝsa lotogole .
45002007	Dereh tilav nǝmauran vi sutuai mai alat lotosusumar hǝn lǝb̃igol navoian , lotodaŋ len aGot hǝn b̃eviol hǝn nǝyalyalan , nǝ-sal-suh-galito-an mai nǝmauran topat vi sutuai .
45002008	Be len nab̃iltilol paŋpaŋ san , dereh nǝlon aGot tepǝŋas alat lotonau galit sǝb̃olito ŋai , lǝsagol nǝsa nakitinan tokele , be lotopul hǝn nǝsaan len nǝmauran salito .
45002009	Na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an mai nǝmauran todaŋ dereh aribar nǝvanuan p̃isi lotogolgol nǝsaan : naJu gail a m̃o , beti alat lǝsavi Ju .
45002010	Be alat lotogolgol navoian , dereh aGot tisal suh galito , teputsan nahǝsalito , teriŋ natǝm̃at len nǝlolito : naJu gail a m̃o , beti alat lǝsavi Ju .
45002011	Husur naṽide siGot ep̃itoṽ van hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi , ideh satile .
45002012	Alat lǝsǝkad nalo siGot be lotogol nǝsaan , dereh limasig naut kǝmas lǝsǝkad nalo . Avil alat lotokad nalo be lotogol nǝsaan , nalo dereh tisab̃ sǝhoti ke limaspanis .
45002013	Husur savi alat lotosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nalo aGot togol lotonor len nǝhon ; be alat lotogol nǝsa nalo tokele , dereh aGot teriŋi ke galit linor len nǝhon .
45002014	Husur , alat lǝsavi Ju lǝsǝkad nalo siGot , lǝb̃ehusur nab̃oruan salito ale gol nǝsa nalo tokele , ehum lotokad nalo len nǝlolito , naut kǝmas lǝsasǝsǝloŋ hǝni boŋ ideh .
45002015	Len naṽide salito imasil ke aGot totos gat nalo len nǝlolito , husur nǝlolit gail mai nǝnauan salit sǝb̃olit arukel vǝhot nǝsaan mai galito o arukel mai galit ke lotonor .
45002016	Dereh aGot tigol natgalenan len nǝboŋ b̃epǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan len natit gail nǝvanuan p̃isi lotosusuani . Napǝpehunian enan , dereh teriŋi len navǝlan aKristo aYesu , hum na-kel-uri-an sagw tovoi tokele .
45002017	Be gaiug gotovi Ju , gumabe ? Gaiug gudaŋ len nalo siGot , gusor patpat gaiug mǝhat hum aGot tovi amaheam̃ .
45002018	Gaiug golǝboi nǝsa Nasub̃ tolǝŋoni , golǝboi nǝsa tonor mai nǝsa tosa husur nalo san eṽusan gaiug .
45002019	Len nǝnauan sam̃ gunau suluṽi ke gotolǝboi gǝb̃esǝhar nǝvanuan gail , lotovi metb̃esw len nǝnauan salito . Gunau suluṽi ke gotohum nam̃ial tolǝboi b̃em̃ias nap̃isal m̃os alat lototoh len nǝmargobut .
45002020	Gunau suluṽi ke gotovi hai p̃usan m̃os alat lotovi hoṽon mai alat lǝsǝmatmatu len nadǝlomian salito . Gaiug gotovi Ju gunau maien hǝni husur gukad nalo siGot tovi nǝkadun nalǝboian mai nakitinan .
45002021	Imaienan , gǝb̃eṽusan avan ideh gail , imabe gǝsaṽusan gaiug gabag ? Gukel uri ke , “ Samtevǝnvǝnah ! ” be gaiug , govǝnvǝnah a ?
45002022	Gukele ke , “ Samtigol naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan ! ” be gaiug , gugol naitian tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan a ? Gaiug gomǝtahun bun nǝlablab gail , be naim nalotuan hǝn nǝlablab gail , govǝnah lan a ?
45002023	Gaiug gusor patpat nalo siGot mǝhat , be gob̃ur kokotov nalo enan mǝdas nahǝsan aGot a ?
45002024	Husur natosian siGot ike , “ Gamit mǝttovi Ju , naluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tiltile lusor mǝdas nahǝsan aGot sil gamito . ”
45002025	Gǝb̃igol husur nǝsa nalo siGot tokele , na-tiv-dalusi-an seJu evi natit tovoi husur ipat len nalo . Be gǝb̃eb̃ur kokotov nalo , na-tiv-dalusi-an sam̃ savi natideh . Ehum gǝsavi Ju . Ehum gǝsǝkad na-tiv-dalusi-an len gaiug boŋ ideh .
45002026	Imagenan , alat lǝsǝkad na-tiv-dalusi-an , galit lǝb̃igol husur nǝsa nalo tokele , len nabunusian siGot esum̃an lotokad na-tiv-dalusi-an tia , esum̃an lotovi Ju gail .
45002027	Ale alat lotogol husur nǝsa nalo tokele be lǝsǝkad na-tiv-dalusi-an , galit dereh lisab̃ sǝhoti ke , gaiug gotovi Ju gotokad na-tiv-dalusi-an , gimaspanis husur gukad nalo be gob̃ur kokotovi .
45002028	Savi nǝpasian o na-tiv-dalusi-an nǝvanuan tokade len niben togol tovi Ju kitin .
45002029	Ao . NaJu kitin evi Ju m̃au len nǝlon . Ale na-tiv-dalusi-an kitin evi na-tiv-dalusi-an hǝn nǝlon . Na-gol-husur-nalo-an edǝdas b̃igol na-tiv-dalusi-an kitin len nǝlon , ao , aNunun aGot igole . Ale dereh aGot tisal suh nǝvanuan tomaienan . Nǝvanuan gail asike lǝb̃isal suhi , be aGot m̃au dereh tisal suhi .
45003001	B̃imagenan , ivoi mabe hǝn avan ideh b̃evi Ju ? Ivoi mabe hǝn b̃ikad na-tiv-dalusi-an ?
45003002	Ivoi habat len natit p̃isi ! Metǝkav ikad natsua : aGot eriŋ nasoruan san len navǝlan naJu gail .
45003003	Be galit galevis asike lǝb̃idaŋ len aGot , gunau ke nǝ-par-dǝlomi-an salito igol aGot sǝdaŋ len na-kel-gati-an san gail a ?
45003004	Ao ! Satimaienan ! AGot ekitin , akis igol nǝsa tokele , naut kǝmas nǝvanuan p̃isi lovi vanuan nalibliboŋan gail . Hum aTevit aKiŋ tokele sutuai ke , “ Nasub̃ aGot , natit p̃isi gotokele m̃au , ekitin . Avan ideh b̃ike b̃isor tas gaiug len nakotan , dereh tisab̃ sǝhoti ke gotonor , gokitin , ale dereh gewin len nakotan enan . ”
45003005	Be nǝsaan sidat b̃eṽusan p̃arp̃ar hǝn nanoran siGot , datekǝmabe ? Datolǝboi datb̃ike aGot sanor nǝboŋ topansem gidato a ? Ao ! Ikad nǝvanuan lotonau tomaienan ,
45003006	be nǝnauan salit sakitin . AGot asike tanor , asike talǝboi tapǝpehun navoian dan nǝsaan hǝn navile a pan .
45003007	Ikad nǝvanuan lotoke , “ Be nalibliboŋan sagw b̃igol p̃arp̃ar hǝn nakitinan siGot gol nǝvanuan gail lǝb̃isal suh nǝyalyalan san , b̃imaienan , imabe aGot ipansem ginau sal sil nalibliboŋan sagw hum tovi saan ? ”
45003008	Ale nǝvanuan galevis lusor mǝdas ginamito . Lukel ke , namtuke , “ Namtigol nǝsaan hǝn nǝsaan b̃igol navoian ! ” Alat lotokǝmaienan , dereh lipanis , ale ivoi hǝn lǝb̃ipanis !
45003009	Ale datekǝmabe ? Mǝtunau ke ginamit namttovi Ju , len nǝhon aGot namtuvoi sǝhor nǝvanuan tile gail am a ? Ao , namtsǝmaienan . Noil hirhir len nǝsa notokele tia ke , nǝvanuan p̃isi , naJu gail mai alat lǝsavi Ju , galit p̃isi lugolgol nǝsaan . Nǝsaan iwol hǝn nǝmauran salito .
45003010	Hum natosian siGot toke , “ Sǝkad nǝvanuan nanoran ideh , sasua kasi .
45003011	Sǝkad avan ideh tokad nalǝboian kitin , sǝkad avan ideh tolǝŋon ke telǝboi aGot
45003012	Galit p̃isi lupair dani , naṽide salit p̃isi isa batbat . Sǝkad avan ideh togol navoian , sasua kasi . ”
45003013	“ Nasoruan salit isa hum nǝb̃on nab̃irimat tob̃os nǝtan . Namealito igol nagǝgǝrasan . Nǝsa lotokele igol nasǝnahan , hum nabehi hǝn nǝm̃at togole nǝboŋ tohat nǝvanuan . ”
45003014	“ Nabuŋolit epul hǝn nasoruan namǝdasian mai na-mǝtahun-buni-an . ”
45003015	“ Lusaṽsaṽut hǝn lǝb̃igol nǝmatan .
45003016	Lugol namǝdasian mai na-lǝŋon-isa-an len naut p̃isi lotovi lan .
45003017	Lǝsalǝboi lǝb̃itoh mai nǝvanuan tile ideh len natǝm̃at . ”
45003018	“ Lǝsamǝtahw len nǝyalyalan siGot . Lǝsǝnau . ”
45003019	Gidat datolǝboii ke natideh nalo tokele , ikele van hǝn alat lototoh len navǝlan nalo , hǝn nǝvanuan gail asike lǝb̃elǝboi lǝb̃etǝtas gol galit am , ale hǝn b̃imasil ke nǝvanuan p̃isi len navile a pan dereh likot len nakotan siGot .
45003020	Imaienan , avan ideh salǝboi b̃inor len nǝhon aGot husur togol husur nalo . Nalo ipat ŋai hǝn datb̃ebunus lǝboi nǝsaan sidato lan .
45003021	Be gagai , aGot evǝhot nap̃isal hǝn datb̃inor len nǝhon , ale na-gol-husur-nalo-an savi natideh hǝni . Nap̃isal enan , nalo siMoses mai ahai kelkel ur gail lopǝhav utaut hǝni sutuai tia .
45003022	AGot eriŋi ke dattonor len nǝhon nǝboŋ dattoriŋ nǝlodat len aYesu Kristo . Imaienan hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi lotokad nadǝlomian . Nǝvanuan p̃isi lop̃itp̃itoṽ ,
45003023	husur nǝvanuan p̃isi lugol nǝsaan , ŋa lutoh a tut , a tut masuṽ dan aGot , lǝsanor kasi hǝn lǝb̃ibar nǝyalyalan san .
45003024	Avil , len naviolan hǝn navoian aGot toviol kǝmas hǝni , len aKristo aYesu toṽur nǝmakuvan sidato , aGot eriŋi ke dattonor len nǝhon .
45003025	AGot eviol hǝn aYesu hum naviolan hǝn natutumavan , hǝn nǝmatan san b̃idakuv nǝlol paŋpaŋ siGot , nǝlon topǝŋas nǝvanuan gail sil nǝsaan salito . Len nadǝlomian lotokade len nǝmatan siYesu m̃os galito , aGot erub̃at nǝsaan salit dan galito . Natutumavan hǝn aYesu igol nanoran siGot ip̃arp̃ar , bathut ke , satutut hǝn tomǝtahun galito , ekǝta sǝhor nǝsaan silat ta m̃o , ta sutuai , sǝpansem galito .
45003026	AGot igol natgalenan hǝn nanoran san b̃imasil len nǝboŋ ta damǝŋai . Igol tomaienan hǝn gai gabag b̃inor , ale hǝn b̃igol nǝvanuan lǝb̃inor len nǝhon , lǝb̃ikad navoivoian maii nǝboŋ lotokad nadǝlomian len aYesu topanis salito .
45003027	Imagenan , datolǝboi datb̃isor patpat gidat mǝhat hǝn natideh a ? Aoa ! Datolǝboi datb̃ikad navoivoian mai aGot len nalo dattogol husuri a ? Ao ! Datukad navoivoian mai aGot husur datukad nadǝlomian len aYesu .
45003028	Nǝbathusoruan sagw imaiegai ke : len nadǝlomian dattokade , aGot eriŋi ke dattonor len nǝhon , savi len nalo dattogol husuri .
45003029	AGot evi Got seJu gail ŋa ? Be alat lǝsavi Ju , gai savi aGot salito a ? Evoi ! Evi aGot salito am !
45003030	Husur Got esua ŋai . Len nadǝlomian eriŋi ke nǝvanuan gail lunor len nǝhon , naut kǝmas lotokad na-tiv-dalusi-an o lǝsǝkade .
45003031	Namilen ke nadǝlomian igol nalo evi ut kǝmas a ? Ao Sǝmaienan ! Nǝboŋ dattoriŋ nǝlodato len aGot , datugol husur nalo len nakitinan .
45004001	Ginamit namttovi Ju , ivoi hǝn namtb̃inau aApraham tovi atǝmanamit ta sutuai . Datb̃isor husur nap̃isal hǝn nǝvanuan b̃egǝm b̃inor len nǝhon aGot , aApraham isab̃i ke imabe ?
45004002	AGot tǝsab̃ aApraham tanor len nǝhon husur natit aApraham togol gail , aApraham tǝkad natesua hǝn tasor patpat gai mǝhat lan . Be sǝmaienan . Avan ideh salǝboi b̃isor patpat gai mǝhat len nǝhon aGot .
45004003	Husur natosian siGot ike , “ AApraham edǝlom na-kel-gati-an siGot , ale husur natenan aGot eriŋi ke tovi vanuan nanoran . ”
45004004	Nǝvanuan toum , nap̃urp̃uran san savi naviolan , be evi p̃urp̃uran hǝn nauman san .
45004005	Be datsǝmaienan mai aGot . AGot evi aGot toriŋi ke nǝvanuan nǝsaan lunor len nǝhon . AGot sariŋi ke galit lunor len nǝhon hum tovi nap̃urp̃uran hǝn nauman salito , be eriŋi ke lunor len nǝhon hum tovi naviolan husur nadǝlomian lotokade lan .
45004006	Mitinau aTevit tokǝmaienan , nǝboŋ tosor husur nahǝhaṽuran silat aGot toriŋi ke galit lotonor len nǝhon , naut kǝmas nauman salit gail . ATevit ike ,
45004007	“ Alat aGot torub̃at na-b̃ur-kotov-nalo-an salit gail dan galito , navoian siGot igol lukab hǝni . Alat aGot tokas kuv nǝkabut salit hǝn nǝsaan salit gail , navoian siGot igol lukab hǝni .
45004008	Evoi , lukab hǝni , lohǝhaṽur hǝni , husur aGot asike itos gat nǝsaan salito gail am hum nǝkabut salito . ”
45004009	Be nahǝhaṽuran enan , ipat m̃os alat lotokad na-tiv-dalusi-an ŋa ? Ao ! Ipat m̃os galito mai alat lǝsǝkade sal . Husur datuke , “ AApraham edǝlom na-kel-gati-an siGot , ale husur natenan aGot eriŋi ke tovi vanuan nanoran . ”
45004010	Be natenan evisi ŋais ? Evisi a m̃o len na-tiv-dalusi-an siApraham o a tahw lan ? Imasil ke aGot eriŋi ke tovi nǝvanuan nanoran nǝboŋ sǝkad na-tiv-dalusi-an sal .
45004011	Na-tiv-dalusi-an aApraham tokade a tahw , evi nǝ-ta-gati-an togol top̃arp̃ar ke , aGot toriŋi ke , inor len nǝhon . Imaienan , imasil ke aApraham ikad navoivoian mai aGot bathut nadǝlomian tokade tia ale na-tiv-dalusi-an san egǝm a tahw .
45004012	Ale alat lotokad na-tiv-dalusi-an , lǝb̃ikad nadǝlomian top̃itoṽ hum nadǝlomian aApraham atǝmadat tokade nǝboŋ sǝkad na-tiv-dalusi-an sal , aApraham evi atǝman alatenan am .
45004013	Sutuai aGot ikel gati ke tilav navile a pan mai aApraham mai nǝpasusan san gail . Nǝboŋ aGot tokel na-kel-gati-an enan , savi husur aApraham togol husur nalo , be husur , len nadǝlomian aApraham tokade lan , aGot eriŋi ke inor len nǝhon .
45004014	Husur na-kel-gati-an siGot tǝpat m̃os alat lotogol husur nalo ŋai , nadǝlomian asike tavi natideh , ale na-kel-gati-an enan san asike tǝsarpoh .
45004015	Be nalo igol nǝpanismen siGot egǝm hǝn alat lotob̃ur kotovi . Be nalo tab̃uer , na-b̃ur-kotov-nalo-an am tab̃uer .
45004016	Imaienan , len nadǝlomian ŋai aGot eriŋi ke gidat datunor len nǝhon , hǝn datb̃ikad na-viol-kǝmas-an san , hǝn nǝpasusan siApraham p̃isi lǝb̃ikad nǝsa aGot tokel gati . Ale datb̃ikad nadǝlomian len aGot sum̃an aApraham , dereh datikad nǝsa aGot tokel gati , naut kǝmas dattovi Ju dattokad nalo o datsǝmaienan . Husur aApraham evi tata sidat p̃isi dattokad nadǝlomian .
45004017	Hum aGot tokel maii len natosian san ke , “ Nugol gaiug govi tata sinaluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tiltile gail . ”
45004018	Naut kǝmas nǝ-lon-uri-an , len nǝ-vatvat-viri-an , aApraham ikad nadǝlomian hǝn b̃egǝm vi tata sinaluṽoh hǝn nǝvanuan naut tiltile gail , hum aGot tokel maii ke , “ Nalilim̃eso gotorisi , nǝpasusan sam̃ dereh lisob̃ur maienan . ”
45004019	Ale nadǝlomian siApraham sateh naut kǝmas nǝdam̃ han pǝpadaŋ tovi 100 ; naut kǝmas tonau ke niben pǝpadaŋ hǝn tomat mai aSarah tobutoh .
45004020	Gai sariŋ gab̃ulan na-kel-gati-an siGot . Eriŋ nǝlon len aGot gol ke nadǝlomian san idaŋ am , ale isal suh nǝyalyalan siGot .
45004021	AApraham inau lǝboii ke aGot elǝboi b̃igol natideh tokel gati .
45004022	Ale husur nadǝlomian san , aGot eriŋi ke tovi vanuan nanoran .
45004023	Natosian enan toke “ aGot eriŋi ke tovi vanuan nanoran ” sǝpat m̃os aApraham ŋai .
45004024	Natosian enan ipat m̃os gidato am . Ikel gati ke aGot togol aYesu , aMasta sidato , tole mǝhat dan nǝmatan , datb̃eriŋ nǝlodato lan , dereh teriŋi ke dattonor len nǝhon .
45004025	AGot idam̃ hǝn nǝmatan siYesu sil nǝsaan sidato , ale igol aYesu ile mǝhat dan nǝmatan hǝn datb̃inor len nǝhon aGot .
45005001	Len nadǝlomian sidato , aGot eriŋi ke datunor len nǝhon . Imagenan , len aMasta sidato , aYesu Kristo , datukad natǝm̃at tǝban aGot .
45005002	Bathut nǝsa aYesu togole , len nadǝlomian sidato , datob̃is len navoian aGot toviol kǝmas hǝni , dattoil gǝgat lan . Imagenan datikemkem habat husur datuvatvat viri ke dereh datikad nǝyalyalan siGot .
45005003	Savi natenan ŋai . Datikemkem habat len na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an sidat am . Husur datolǝboii ke na-lǝŋon-isa-vǝsa-an iṽan hǝn nǝ-daŋ-b̃uri-an .
45005004	Nǝ-daŋ-b̃uri-an igol aGot ehǝhaṽur hǝn naṽide sidato . Ale datb̃elǝboi aGot tohǝhaṽur hǝn naṽide sidato , nǝ-vatvat-viri-an dattokade lan idaŋ am .
45005005	Ale datolǝboi buni ke nǝ-vatvat-viri-an sidato dereh tisarpoh . Husur aGot , len aNunun toviol hǝni mai gidato , aGot evur san na-lǝmas-buni-an san topul len nǝlodato .
45005006	Husur aKristo , nǝboŋ datsalǝboi datb̃igol navoian sal , len nǝboŋ tonor hǝni , aKristo imat m̃os gidat datsǝnau aGot .
45005007	Nǝvanuan evis ŋai ludam̃ hǝn lǝb̃imat m̃os nǝvanuan tile , be ludam̃ hǝn lǝb̃imat m̃os nǝvanuan nanoran ŋai . Ale hum ma tokad avan ideh tokad na-il-b̃uri-an hǝn b̃imat m̃os nǝvanuan tovoi .
45005008	Be len nǝsa togole , aGot igol ip̃arp̃ar ke tolǝmas masuṽ hǝn gidato maiegai ke : nǝboŋ dattovi vanuan nǝsaan sal , aKristo imat m̃os gidato .
45005009	Len nǝda hiYesu , aGot eriŋi ke datunor len nǝhon . A mǝhat hǝn natenan , len nǝmatan san , aYesu dereh tilav kuv gidato dan nǝlol paŋpaŋ siGot .
45005010	A m̃o , nǝboŋ dattovi enemi siGot sal , esǝvat aNatun ulum̃an hǝn b̃imat gel gidato . Nǝboŋ togol tomaienan , aGot igol datukad natǝm̃at mai navoivoian maii . Ale datb̃ikad navoivoian mai aGot , dattolǝboi buni ke , len nǝmauran san len gidato , dereh aYesu tilav kuv gidato dan nǝlol paŋpaŋ siGot .
45005011	Savi natenan ŋai , be datukemkem husur datsǝkad nǝsasaan am mai aGot . Len aMasta sidato , aYesu Kristo , datukad natǝm̃at mai aGot , gol datohǝhaṽur masuṽ .
45005012	Imagenan , nǝboŋ aAtam togol nǝsaan , nǝsaan eb̃is len navile a pan , ale naṽit nǝsaan evi nǝmatan . Imaienan len nǝsaan siAtam , nǝpasusan san p̃isi logǝm vi vanuan nǝsaan , lugol nǝsaan , ale nǝmatan ibar nǝvanuan p̃isi .
45005013	Sutuai , nǝboŋ nalo siMoses tob̃uer sal , nǝvanuan navile a pan lugol nǝsaan . Be husur lǝsǝkad nalo sal , aGot satos gat nǝsaan galenan ke tovi nǝkabut salito .
45005014	Be len nǝboŋ siAtam vǝbar aMoses , nǝmatan iwol hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi . Naut kǝmas lǝsab̃ur kotov nakelean todaŋ siGot hum a Atam tob̃ur kotovi , naut kǝmas natenan , lumat sum̃an aAtam . Datolǝboi datb̃enǝnoṽ hǝn aAtam mai atesua tohusuri , aKristo .
45005015	Be gǝlaru arotile , na-viol-kǝmas-an siGot etile masuṽ len nǝsaan siAtam . Husur len nǝsaan siAtam nǝvanuan isob̃ur lumat . Be a mǝhat hǝn natenan , len naviolan togǝm len aYesu Kristo , aGot eviol kǝmas hǝn narub̃atian dan nǝsaan mai nǝvanuan isob̃ur .
45005016	Ale naṽit na-viol-kǝmas-an etile masuṽ hǝn naṽit nǝsaan siAtam . Nǝsaan siAtam iṽan hǝn nǝpanismen . Be na-viol-kǝmas-an siGot iṽan hǝn nanoran aGot togol dattokade len nǝhon , naut kǝmas dattogol nǝsaan tosob̃ur .
45005017	Len nǝsaan sitenan , aAtam , nǝmatan iwol hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi , lumat . Be navoian aGot toviol kǝmas hǝni esǝhor masuṽ hǝn natenan . Husur len ategaii tovi aYesu Kristo , aGot eriŋi ke nǝvanuan lunor len nǝhon . Ale lǝb̃inor len nǝhon maienan , dereh likad nǝdaŋan mai nǝmauran vi sutuai .
45005018	Imasil ke naṽit nǝsaan sua siAtam evi nǝpanismen togǝm hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi . Len naṽide tomagenan , naṽit nategaii tonor aYesu togole , igol nǝvanuan p̃isi lolǝboi lǝb̃inor len nǝhon aGot mai lǝb̃ikad nǝmauran kitin .
45005019	Nǝboŋ aAtam togol nǝsa aGot tokai tasi , nǝvanuan isob̃ur logǝm vi vanuan nǝsaan . Ale nǝboŋ aYesu togol nǝsa aGot tokele , aGot dereh tigol nǝvanuan tisob̃ur linor len nǝhon .
45005020	Mitinau nalo siMoses . Nalo egǝm hǝn nǝsaan b̃egǝm tibau len na-lǝboi-sǝhoti-an sinǝvanuan . Be nǝboŋ nǝsaan togǝm tibau , navoian aGot toviol kǝmas hǝni egǝm tibau masuṽ am sǝhori ,
45005021	hǝn navoian b̃esǝhor nǝsaan . A m̃o , nǝsaan mai nǝmatan aruwol hǝn nǝvanuan p̃isi . Be gagai , navoian aGot toviol kǝmas hǝni , iwol hǝn gidato . Imaienan , len aYesu Kristo , aMasta sidato , aGot igol datunor len nǝhon , ale datukad nǝmauran vi sutuai .
45006001	Ale datekǝmabe ? Ivoi hǝn datb̃igol nǝsaan tabtab hǝn navoian aGot toviol kǝmas hǝni b̃etibau am a ?
45006002	Aoa ! Satimagenan ! Nǝmauran hǝn nǝsaan dattokade a m̃o imat ebun . Imabe datutoh lan sal ?
45006003	Gidat p̃isi dattobaptais hǝn dattotoh len aKristo aYesu , nǝboŋ dattobaptais , datumat b̃onb̃on maii len nǝmatan san . Mǝtsalǝboi natenan a ?
45006004	Nǝboŋ dattobaptais , datumat maii , datupat maii len nab̃ur nǝmatan hǝn datb̃ikad nǝmauran veveu hǝn datb̃itohtoh lan . Imaienan hǝn datb̃esum̃an aKristo tole mǝhat dan nǝmatan len nǝdaŋan seTǝman toyalyal .
45006005	Husur , datb̃ib̃on mai aKristo maienan len nǝmatan san , dereh datib̃on maii len na-le-mǝhat-an dan nǝmatan san .
45006006	Datolǝboii ke , nǝmauran sidato ta m̃o itahǝtah maii len nǝhai balbal . Ehum nǝlodato itahǝtah ei , imat maii . Imagenan , nǝdaŋan nǝsaan tokade hǝn towol hǝn nǝmauran sidato imasig . Datsavi slev am hǝn nǝsaan .
45006007	Husur nǝboŋ dattomat mai aKristo , datumakuv dan nǝdaŋan hǝn nǝsaan .
45006008	Ale husur dattomat mai aKristo , datodǝlomi ke len natohan dattokade maii , dereh datitoh tabtab .
45006009	Datolǝboi buni ke husur aGot togol aKristo tole mǝhat dan nǝmatan , edǝdas b̃imat tǝtas am . Nǝmatan asike iwol hǝni boŋ ideh am .
45006010	Nǝboŋ aKristo tomat , imat vǝha-vis ? Imat vǝha-sua ŋai hǝn tob̃ur kotov nǝdaŋan hǝn nǝmatan . Be ile mǝhat , imaur . Ale gagai len nǝmauran enan , itoh m̃os nǝyalyalan siGot .
45006011	Imagenan , gamit am , mitimasnau lǝboii ke , nǝmauran hǝn nǝsaan samit ta m̃o , imat ebun . Ale gagai van , len aYesu Kristo , mitimastoh m̃os nǝyalyalan siGot len nǝmauran veveu mǝttokade .
45006012	Imagenan , nǝsaan satiwol hǝn nibemito . Samtigol husur nalǝŋonian hǝn nibemito lotosa .
45006013	Samtidam̃ kas nahudhubemit ideh hum natesua tosa hǝn b̃igol nǝsaan . Aoa ! Mǝteviol hǝn gamito mai aGot hum alat lotomat be lotomaur dan nǝmatan . Mǝteviol hǝn nahudhubemit gail p̃isi mai aGot hǝn lǝb̃igol naṽide lotonor len nabunusian san .
45006014	Husur nǝsaan asike iwol hǝn gamit am , husur mǝtsatoh len navǝlan nalo be mǝtutoh len navoian aGot toviol kǝmas hǝni .
45006015	Datsatoh len nalo be datutoh len navoian aGot toviol kǝmas hǝni . Imabe ? Namilen ke inor hǝn datb̃igol nǝsaan a ? Satimagenan !
45006016	Nǝboŋ mǝttodam̃ hǝn mǝtb̃igol natit p̃isi avan ideh tokele , mǝtogǝm vi slev san . Mǝtsalǝboii a ? Mǝtb̃ilekis hǝn mǝtb̃igol nǝsaan , egǝm vi masta samito , ilav gamit vi lan nǝmatan . Mǝtb̃ilekis hǝn mǝtb̃igol nǝsa aGot tokele , ilav gamit vi lan nǝmauran hǝn nanoran .
45006017	Be sipa vi tǝban aGot ! A m̃o mǝttovi slev sinǝsaan , be gagai , len nǝlomit kavkav , mǝtugol husur nakitinan hǝn nap̃usanan mǝttokade .
45006018	AGot ep̃ur kuv gamito dan nǝsaan tia . Mǝtsavi slev sinǝsaan am . Mǝtogǝm vi slev sinanoran .
45006019	Nokǝmaienan len nasoruan kǝta hǝn mǝtb̃elǝboi sǝhot nap̃usanan sagw . A m̃o mǝtudam̃ hǝn gamit kavkav hǝn mǝtb̃evi slev hǝn naṽide tosa totaṽtaṽor mai nǝsaan m̃os mǝtb̃igol nǝsaan van am . Gagai mitimasdam̃ hǝn gamit kavkav hǝn mǝtb̃evi slev sinanoran m̃os mǝtb̃ikad nab̃oruan siGot .
45006020	A m̃o , nǝboŋ mǝttovi slev sinǝsaan , mǝtsatoh len nanoran , nanoran sawol hǝn gamito .
45006021	Be naṽit nǝmauran enan , imabe ? Gagai nahurumit isa len natgalenan mǝttogol gail . Naṽit natgalenan evi nǝmatan !
45006022	Be gagai aGot ep̃ur kuv gamito dan nǝsaan , hǝn asike nǝsaan b̃iwol hǝn gamit am . Mǝtovi slev siGot beti . Husur natenan , mǝtulav nab̃oruan siGot , ale naṽit nab̃oruan siGot len gamito evi nǝmauran vi sutuai .
45006023	Husur nap̃urp̃uran hǝn nǝsaan evi nǝmatan , avil len aKristo aYesu , aMasta sidato , na-viol-kǝmas-an siGot evi nǝmauran vi sutuai .
45007001	Bathudud nadǝlomian , gamit mǝtolǝboi nalo . Mǝtolǝboii ke nalo ikad nǝdaŋan hǝn na-il-a-m̃o-an nǝboŋ nǝvanuan tokad nǝmauran ŋai .
45007002	Len nalo , napǝhaṽut tolah itoh len navǝlan nǝhaṽut san nǝboŋ atenan tokad nǝmauran sal . Be atenan b̃imat , alitenan asike itoh len navǝlan am , imakuv dan nalo hǝn nǝlahan .
45007003	Imaienan , nǝboŋ ahaṽut san tomaur sal , alitenan b̃ilah mai togon , dereh lekis alitenan hǝn napǝhaṽut togol naitian tosa tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan . Be ahaṽut san b̃imat , aliten imakuv dan nalo enan . Ale naut kǝmas b̃ilah tǝtas mai nǝhaṽut tile , aliten sagol naitian tosa tob̃ur kotov nǝlahan .
45007004	Imagenan bathudud sagw , nokǝmaiegai ke : nǝboŋ mǝttob̃on mai niben aKristo len nǝmatan san , mǝtumakuv dan nalo .
45007005	Nab̃oruan dattokade a m̃o evi nab̃oruan hǝn nǝsaan . Nǝboŋ nab̃oruan enan towol hǝn gidato , natideh nalo tokai tasi , enan datolǝŋon masuṽ hǝn datb̃igole . Nalǝŋonian galen lotosa loum len nibedato ale natit p̃isi dattogole luṽan hǝn nǝmatan .
45007006	Be gagai , gidat dattob̃on mai aKristo len nǝmatan san , datumakuv dan nalo tobaŋis gat gidato . Imaienan datsahusur nap̃isal ta m̃o , datsagol husur na-tos-gati-an hǝn nalo am . Gagai , len aNunun aGot , datohusur nap̃isal veveu , datugol husur nalǝŋonian siGot .
45007007	Datekǝmabe beti ? Nalo isa a ? Sadatekǝmaienan ! Nalo tab̃uer , asike nǝtalǝboi sǝhot nǝsaan sagw gail . Nǝsalǝboii ke nalǝŋonian len nǝlogw tovi nǝsaan vǝbar nalo toke , “ Sa-nǝlom̃ tevǝnoh natideh . ”
45007008	Be ehum nǝsaan tolav nalo enan , ale igol nǝlogw epul hǝn nalǝŋonian tiltile gail . Husur nalo tab̃uer , nǝsaan asike tǝkad nǝdaŋan tomaienan .
45007009	A m̃o , len nǝmauran sagw , nalo savi natideh len ginau . Be nǝboŋ notosǝsǝloŋ hǝn nakelean todaŋ toke , “ Sa-nǝlom̃ tevǝnoh natideh , ” numadhalǝboii ke nugol nǝsaan , nǝsaan imaur len ginau .
45007010	Ale len nǝsaan nukad nǝmatan husur nǝsaan epǝpehun ginau dan aGot . Imaienan , nunau sǝhoti ke nakelean enan todaŋ topat hǝn b̃ilav nǝmauran mai ginau , ilav nǝmatan mai ginau !
